Epapras da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨsak. Uŋun ji da kabɨkon amɨn kɨnda, ae Yesu Kristo dakon oman amɨn. Ji da Piŋkop dakon galaktok morap nandaba pɨsaŋek tebai atni do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit tebai asak.
Wasok yokwi on kɨndap kalugɨ pakbini toŋon aŋ kaŋ, ae si kɨbɨdosagon niaŋ ani?”
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi 2 uŋun da joŋ kɨlap yokwisi mibɨltok nani dakon kɨla agak dakon tapmɨm kɨsisi yaŋ dagok aŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun tapmɨm naŋ joŋ kɨlap yokwisi mibɨltok nani da ɨŋamon pi agɨt. Uŋun tebaisi yoyɨŋakwan mɨktɨm gat ae mɨŋat amɨnyoni gat da joŋ kɨlap yokwisi mibɨltok nani gawak ɨmgwit. Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi si kɨmorɨ da tɨlak wudani taŋ ɨmgut mani wudani aeni kɨbɨdagɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatjok kɨnda pasak do manjɨŋ ɨmgwit uŋun butnikon da dɨma pakeŋ yaŋsi nandɨsak, ae amɨn da pasak dosi dɨma iyaŋ, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm dakon galaktok kɨla tagɨ abeŋ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun dɨma pasak. Uŋun da tagɨ asak.
Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋunyo yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Elaija gat Moses gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma, gak telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi. Yaŋ aŋaki Piŋkop da yo morap aneŋ do nandɨsak uŋun kɨndasok dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsisi aŋ mudoneŋ.” Yaŋban Jon da geni guramɨkgɨt.
Uŋun da yumabi aŋpak awit uŋudeŋ dɨma aneŋ. Uŋun da yaŋ aba gɨldat kaloŋ dogɨn amɨn 23 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋobɨŋ bɨkbɨknikon yɨpban agakwan kɨsirɨ da abɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Mibɨltok yo noman taŋ namdaŋ uŋun pɨndagek don Timoti tepmɨsi yabekgo opjak.
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl da arɨpmon aŋteban aŋaki egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki yo abɨdok do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat uŋun dɨma suŋ tosak.
Bɨlak 14 mudaŋakwa aeno Jerusalem wɨgɨgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon Banabas gat kɨsi wɨgɨgɨmak. Ae Taitus kɨsi abɨdoko wɨgɨgɨmaŋ.
Yaŋba Amɨn Tagɨ da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun mastat yet yombem monɨŋɨsisok taŋ damjak kaŋ, on kɨndap pɨlɨgɨ tap kagagwan pɨgɨsak do iyɨŋba genji tagɨ guramɨtjak.”
Kɨlɨ paret paŋmuwutdaŋ uŋun do nandak nandak dabeŋ. Apma bɨlak do ji pi uŋun wasaŋek paret ak do galagɨsi nandawit.
Don Pol Atens yɨpmaŋek Korin kokup papmon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ ani kaŋ, mɨŋat amɨn morap da dandaba gulusuŋji mɨni ae yokwisi mɨni da egɨpni. Mɨktɨmon yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun da binapmon egek Piŋkop dakon monjini gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨpni, ae gɨk da yaŋ tagɨsi teŋteŋoni. Mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugaŋek egɨp egɨp bamɨsi egɨpni do Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, don Kristo da tobɨl mɨktɨmon apjak bɨsapmon nak but galaksi nandakdɨsat. Nido pi madepsi jikon agɨm uŋun pi ɨsalɨ dɨma asak.
Tepmɨ madepsi pawit, ae gɨptɨmnikon wuda tawit, uŋun do nandaŋek Kwen Kokup dakon Piŋkop ɨbɨpgwit. Mani aŋpak yokwisi awit uŋun but tobɨl aŋek manji yom do dɨma nandawit.
But tobɨl asak do nandaŋek bɨkbɨk ɨmɨsat. Mani but tobɨl aŋek yumabi aŋpakni yɨpmaŋ det do dɨma nandɨsak.
Namɨn da Piŋkop da kabap madepmon tagɨ wɨgɨsak? Ae namɨn da iyɨ da telagɨ tamokon tagɨ atjak?
Asisi, nak uŋun amɨn do kuragɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun pɨndakgo nak dakon uwalno aŋ.
Bɨsit yaŋ aŋek namɨn da noman tosak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit. Tɨp wasok aba Matias da noman tagɨt. Noman taŋek yabekbi 11 kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Gɨldat 7 kabɨ palɨ mudaŋakwan Juda amɨn dɨ Esia mɨktɨmon da apgwit uŋun da Pol Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kawit. Kaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap muwukgwit dakon but sugaŋek Pol abɨdawit.
“Pi ɨsalni uŋun geni nandaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan egaki don gomango gabeŋ.’
“Nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Datno dakon oman monjɨ morapni uŋun japni arɨpmɨsi taŋ yomaŋakwa ekwaŋ, mani nak ɨdon egek jap do kɨmotdɨsat.
Yaŋ nandaŋek yagɨt, ‘Nak yaŋsi abeŋ: Jap yopyop yutno kɨsi tuwɨlek madepsi wutjɨŋek wit gat ae yo kabɨno gat kɨsi uŋun yutnon yopbeŋ.
Aŋpulugaŋaki amɨn yokwi da pat yɨpgwit uŋudon dɨma yokwalgeŋ.
“Nak ji gat sigɨn egek gen on dayɨsat.
Satu wasok aba mudaŋban mɨktɨmon pabɨŋ yɨgek kɨla aŋek kaŋ egɨpgwit.
Mani Jon da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ gabeŋ do abɨl, uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Gak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ asak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn morap dakon gen gat baŋ wasaŋek Piŋkop da papia morapmon gen iyɨ do mandabi uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da aŋkewal do awit uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Amɨn Tagɨ, gak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Nak tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni pakbi ɨdapmon pɨgɨwit.
Amɨn kɨsi da Demitius dakon aŋpak tagɨsi uŋun do yoŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ uŋunyo kɨsi aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun da aŋteŋteŋ asak. Ninyo kɨsi aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun do yomaŋ. Dɨsi nandaŋ, gen uŋun bamɨsi yomaŋ.
Nin uŋun gat kɨsi uŋun telagɨ ɨleŋon egek gen uŋun Kwen Kokupgwan da apban nandagɨmaŋ.
Gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep Peliks da Pol yaŋ ɨban wɨŋakwan Tetulus da Pol gulusuŋ agɨt dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ ɨmɨŋek Peliks yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madep Peliks, gak da nin paŋpulugaŋaki emarɨ mɨni yaworɨsi ekwamaŋ. Gak nandak nandakgo tagɨsi do nin da mɨktɨmon kulabɨk tagɨsi aŋaki abɨsok tagɨsi ekwamaŋ.
Gen tebango do nandaŋ gadasat. Do nandak nandak gat ae gen kokwin tagɨsi agak dakon nandak nandak do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Yaŋ do aŋek Telagɨ Wup da yaŋ yosok: “Ji abɨsok Piŋkop dakon gen nandani kaŋ,
Yaŋdo, kɨlɨ dayɨt, ji yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Ji nak Uŋun Amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni kaŋ, yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ.”
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo da manon da uŋun amɨn do gen tebaisi yaŋ yomamaŋ, uŋun egɨp egɨpni paŋkɨlek aŋek iyɨ dakon kɨla ak do pi aŋ kɨmotni.
Yaŋban Pol da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Sisa dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon akdat. Ɨdon gɨn gen yaŋ namgwit dakon geni nandagɨ. Nak Juda amɨnon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm uŋun gaga pakyaŋsi nandɨsal.
Nak yo kɨnda da dam aŋakwan dɨma egɨsat. Nak yabekbi kɨnda, ae Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu kɨlɨ kagɨm. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi agɨm dakon bamɨ kabɨ ji mani.
“Amɨn Tagɨ da toktogɨ manji namjak bo? Nak do saŋbeŋek dɨma galak tosak bo?
Yawe, oman amɨngo Dewit do nandaŋ ɨbi. Kɨla amɨn madep gaga manjɨgɨl uŋun manji dɨma ɨbi.
Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
Yawe, bupmɨgo uŋun madepsi. Gak kɨlegɨsi, do kɨlano aŋaki egɨpbeŋ.
Nido Yawe kɨla amɨn madep egek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn morap kɨlani asak.
Aŋek Juda amɨn Grik gen yawit uŋun gat gen emat aŋ aŋ awit. Aŋek Sol si aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit.
Yawe bɨsit aŋek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋapbo geno do mɨrak yopbi.
Nak yokwi asat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ yokwi asat uŋun ji da tagɨ aŋteŋteŋ ani. Mani gen bamɨ yosot kaŋ, nido geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak?
Kalɨp uŋun yo morap aŋapbo mano toŋ ae uŋun da aŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop da nandaban kɨlek tosok yaŋ nandagɨm, mani abɨsok koko yo ɨsalɨ asak. Abɨsok nak Kristo dogɨn nandɨsat.
Do Piŋkop gen papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Abraham uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat aban, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.” Ae amɨn da Abraham do Piŋkop dakon notnisi yaŋ iyɨwit.
Nin but kalɨpmɨ dakon galaktok yolgumaŋ bɨsapmon gen teban da gɨptɨmnin dakon galaktok yokwi yolneŋ do yabet aban yokwi agɨmaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨmot aŋalon agɨmaŋ.
Gak kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ man madepgo toŋ. Oskon yɨgek emaron kɨŋek teban toki. Yaŋ aŋaki amɨn da gen bamɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni. Ae amɨn da kosit kɨlegɨ naŋ yolek agɨpni do emat asal yaŋ nandani. Pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋaki gandaŋek tamtam yokdaŋ.
Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn dabɨlni paban pɨsaŋban sɨŋtoŋ. Ae jɨgɨ da tebai pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun jɨgɨni kukwaŋ yomɨsak. Yawe uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Meŋno da nak aŋalaŋban gak da kɨla aŋaki wɨk da abɨsok egɨsat. Yaŋ asal do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mango yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmokgeŋ.
Ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek yokwi aŋdamdaŋ, nido Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Aŋpak uŋun aŋek Piŋkop da apjak gɨldat do jomjom ani, aŋek uŋun gɨldat tepmɨsi noman tosak do aŋtep aŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kundu soŋ pasɨldɨsak, aŋakwan kɨndap tedepmɨni madepsi uŋun da yo monɨŋ monɨŋ morap Piŋkop da uŋun baŋ mɨktɨm wasagɨt uŋun soŋban pakbi dagokdaŋ.
Kanek da kundukon tosok, uŋun da tɨlak toktogɨsi yaŋ egɨ wɨgɨkdaŋ.” Uwal da kɨla amɨn madep abɨŋ yɨpgwit bɨsapmon kunam takgwit
Nak asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋek uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn pawɨl pawɨl dakon kɨla amɨn iyɨŋban os pabɨdaŋakwan Pilip gat amɨn uŋun gat mɨktɨmon maŋ pɨŋek pakbikon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgek Pilip da telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut.
“Iyɨŋba nandaŋek yo kɨla amɨni uŋun yaŋ ɨban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak niaŋ aŋaki gengo nandat? Gak kɨŋ yo morapno kɨlɨ niaŋ asal uŋun dakon but pɨso kɨnda mandaŋ nabi. Gak pi uŋun saŋbeŋek dɨma akdɨsal.’
Gen kɨlegɨsi baŋgɨn yoki kaŋ, amɨn da gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Ae uwal da gen yokwi kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma niyɨkdaŋ, nandak nandak yokwini do mayagɨ pakdaŋ.
Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt. Mani pi kɨla awit amɨn da oman monjɨ obɨsi aŋagek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yolba kɨgɨt.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpni.”
Ji nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimni. Nin amɨn kɨnda do yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨmaŋ. Nin amɨn kɨnda yokwi asak do dɨma iyɨgɨmaŋ. Nin amɨn kɨnda aŋkɨlɨgek yoni dɨ dɨma tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ.
Jɨgɨ tepmɨyo noman taŋ damdaŋ nin uŋun do nandaŋek Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugosak do bɨsit yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni amaŋ. Nin Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban aŋpak ani do yaŋ damgut uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ ani do nandamaŋ. Nandaŋ gadaron da pi morap ak do nandaŋ, ae aŋpak tagɨsi morap ak do nandaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da tapmɨm daban ani do bɨsit amaŋ.
Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi, do mani aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ. Mani wukwisi, do uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsogɨ.
Yaŋ aŋakwal Pol Sailas naŋ abɨdagɨt. Aŋakwan paŋmuwukbi da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon nandaŋ yawotni jilon tosak yaŋ yoyɨŋba kɨgɨmal.
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgakwan mɨrɨm yawokgɨt. Yawogakwan paŋdetni da tamtamsi yawit.
Gawak ɨmɨŋek tomno dabɨlni kokdaŋ, ae Piŋkop dakon mani oman amɨni da ɨŋamnikon tokdɨsak.
Uŋun sida kɨndapmon mɨnam da yutni aŋ. Ae bɨlak mɨnam uŋun kwat kwenon yutni uŋudon aŋ.
Kalɨp babɨknin da yo uŋun do kɨlɨ niyɨŋba nandaŋek tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Tap uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda. Mani galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ?
Gak mɨŋat amɨnyo aego butni pabɨ pɨsaŋba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon pɨŋbini egek geni guramɨk kɨmotni. Aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ pi tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morapmɨ ak do tagap toni.
Yaŋ nandagɨt, Kristo dakon man do mayaktok pakeŋ kaŋ, uŋun da Isip dakon yoni tagɨsi morap uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yaŋ nandagɨt nido Piŋkop da tomni do yo tagɨsi ɨmdɨsak uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpgut.
Ae ji da busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda kulabɨk aba kwakwagɨ bo pɨli uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma asak, do busuŋji da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
Amɨn da Jems, Pita ae Jon uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ pɨndakgwit. Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek pi uŋun namgut uŋun nandaŋek Banabas gat nit dakon kɨsit ɨlɨgek notninsi yaŋon da nit tɨmɨkgwit. Aŋek nit Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon pi aŋapdo uŋun da Juda amɨn nandaŋ gadat dɨma abi kabɨkon pi ani do but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ kɨsi but morap nandaŋek yawit, “Uŋun amɨn dukon keŋ?”
Egek wain naŋ mudaŋba Yesu meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Wain kɨlɨ mudaŋ.”
Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap dakon Amɨn Tagɨ.”
Aŋkɨ yɨpban Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwan gɨldat 40 ae pɨlɨn 40 mudagɨt, do jap do agɨt.
Kɨsit kandapyono do pɨndakgɨt. Nak naga akdat. Gɨptɨmno abɨdaŋek nandabɨt. Nak kɨdat sabamyono toŋ do nandani. Amɨn wup uŋun kɨdat sabamyoni mɨni.”
Mɨŋat uŋun kal, kokup pap madep uŋun kɨla amɨn madep morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun da kɨlani asak dakon tɨlak asak.”
Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.
“Nin abɨsok Jerusalem kɨŋapno amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok akdaŋ.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno uŋun namɨn?”
Tepmɨ paŋek Piŋkop da pi ɨmgut uŋun aŋ mudaŋek amɨn morap geni guramɨkgaŋ uŋun yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yomɨŋek egɨp egɨp teban yomyom amɨni dagagɨt. Ae Piŋkop da Yesu manjɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨnda Melkisedek yombem egɨpbi.”
Amɨn bamorɨ pigaga egakwal Piŋkop da kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak. Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
Piŋkop uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep yɨgek mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi kɨla asak. Kɨla Amɨn Madep yɨtyɨt tamoni telagɨ uŋudon yɨkdak.
Not kabɨ, nin bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨ ji depmaŋ degek dat kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyoni yopmaŋek dubagɨkon egɨsak uŋun dakon tɨlak egɨpgumaŋ. Nin ji dɨma dandagɨmaŋ, mani butninon da ji gat egɨpgumaŋ. Do aenin tobɨl kɨŋ ji dandak do pi madepsi agɨmaŋ. Nin ji dandakdosi nandamaŋ.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da uŋun aŋpak yopmaŋek gen ɨsalɨ baŋgɨn yaŋek ekwaŋ.
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨm, ‘Israel dakon kɨla amɨn madep noman taŋ noman taŋ ani uŋun gak da kabɨkon dagɨn noman tokdaŋ. Babɨkon da babɨkon gak da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨtdɨsak.’ ”
Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolakwa ɨsal dogɨn tepmɨ daba tepmɨ uŋun tagɨ pamaŋ yaŋ nandani kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun do tagɨsi nandakdɨsak.
Piŋkop da ji yumaŋ nagɨt, do yo morap gɨptɨm da ani uŋun Piŋkop man madep ɨm do ani.
Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda da top gen kɨnda dayɨŋban nandak nandakni dɨ yolbam. Uŋuden amɨn babɨkni gat ae wup yokwi kundu ae mɨktɨmyo kɨla aŋ dakon nandak nandak baŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Uŋun Kristo dakon nandak nandak dɨma yolgaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Agripa da Pestus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On amɨn yɨpbɨ ɨsal tagɨ kɨgɨgɨ, mani iyɨ Sisa da geni nandɨsak do yagɨt, do Sisakon yɨpno kɨsak.”
Bɨsit nayɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun gak do gabo mɨktɨm kɨsisi kɨla abi.
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da wasok kɨnda yaŋ agɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkdak uŋun mani yaŋakwa, Pailat da pulugaŋ yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Nandaŋ yawotni uŋun wagɨl tugok tugogɨsi. Kristo nin ae yumaŋ nip do kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, ae yawini baŋ Piŋkop da yokwinin kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk nimgut.
Nak dɨma kɨmagek sigɨn egɨpbeŋ kaŋ, Kristo dakon pi abo bamɨ tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Egɨpbeŋ bo kɨmokgeŋ? Ni kosit da tagɨ asak uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.
Asa uŋun Jeosapat dakon datni. Jeosapat uŋun Jeoram dakon datni. Jeoram uŋun Usia dakon datni.
Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek ninon yo tagɨsi uŋun agɨt. Nido, mɨŋat amɨnyo don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ uŋun da nandaŋ yawot madepni uŋun yolɨk do nandagɨt.
Namɨn amɨn da kalɨp Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek kwen wɨgɨk aŋek geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit? Mɨŋat amɨnyo Moses da tɨmɨkban Isip yɨpmaŋ opgwit uŋun dagɨn aŋpak uŋun awit.
Ae bɨgal morapmɨ yabekban ɨnjɨŋ yomgwit. Ae meŋgak morapmɨ yabekban yo morapni paŋupbal awit.
Agek Yesu obɨŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni!”
Ae notnin kɨnda gat yabetno uŋun gat kɨsi obamal. Uŋun amɨn paŋmuwukbi morapmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok dakon man bini toŋ amɨn kɨnda.
Telagɨ jap nomaŋ bɨsapmon kap abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek nomaŋ uŋun da yawini do aŋek nin Kristo gat kabɨ kaloŋ amaŋ. Ae bret pudaŋek nomaŋ bɨsapmon uŋun da gɨptɨmni do aŋek nin Kristo gat kabɨ kaloŋ amaŋ.
Nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn burɨkon da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop kɨnda dɨma egɨsak.” Uŋun amɨn yokwisi. Yo wagɨl yokwisi baŋ gɨn aŋ. Kɨnda da aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨma asak.
Maŋek ɨleŋɨkon kɨŋakwan notni boron da buŋon yolgwit. Yolek yɨkni tap kɨlap tugaŋbi walɨmbɨl ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit, nido bot uŋun pakbi dubagɨkon dɨma tagɨt, 100 mita uŋun da tɨlagon gɨn tagɨt.
Nak butnokon da yokwi dɨ dɨma abeŋ. Ae aŋpak dɨma agagɨ do nandak nandak dɨma abeŋ.
Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨk do nandaba kɨk aŋ. Mani Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da ji uŋun yo morap do wadaŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
Gɨldat 6 kabɨ taŋakwa don Yapyap Bɨlak altosak uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Betani kokupmon kɨgɨt. Betani kokup uŋun Lasarus Yesu da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt amɨn dakon kokupni.
Butno jɨgɨsi, do gen arɨpmɨ dɨma yokeŋ. Piŋkop gak da yum nandaŋaki dɨpmɨn dɨma pokdot.
Aŋakwa Pita uŋun yut da nagalgwan egakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda da opgut.
Nin Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun da paŋpulugosak do jomjom aŋek ekwamaŋ. Mani nin yo tagɨsi on mɨktɨmon gɨn tɨmɨt do jomjom amaŋ tam, nin bupmɨ amɨn dakon mibɨ amɨn wagɨl yokwisi ekwamaŋ.
Nido Piŋkop da mɨŋat dakon gɨptɨm naŋ wɨli dɨma wasagɨt, wɨli dakon gɨptɨm naŋ mɨŋat wasagɨt.
Ae Kristo yolyol mɨŋat kɨnda eni nandaŋ gadat dɨma asak, mani mɨŋatni gat egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, eni dɨma yɨpmaŋdetjak.
Pakbi aŋtobɨlban yawi dagaŋba arɨpmɨ dɨma noknogɨ agɨt.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Saiprus kaŋek uŋun gwandeŋ tetgɨn do taŋakwan nin amɨn tetgɨn da yapgumaŋ. Yapmaŋek Siria mɨktɨmon kɨŋ kokup Tair uŋudon tap wakga paŋkɨ akgɨt. Agakwan tap wakgakon pi monjɨ yɨk ɨlɨgakwa
Aŋakwan amɨn bamot yaŋ yagɨmal, “Kosiron Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ dakon mibɨlɨ niyɨŋakwan butnit madepsi pɨdaŋ.”
Nak jɨgɨkon egek Yawe do yaŋ tɨdoko bɨsitno nandaŋek jɨgɨ morapnokon naŋ pulugaŋ nepgut.
Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨkgo but tobɨl ani do pɨgɨm.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban nandaŋakwa Sol Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn gat Jerusalem egɨpgwit. Egek pasol pasolɨ mɨni agek Yesu da manon Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
“Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gep do gen yaŋ gaban kaŋ, jil gen pi tamokon kɨk do aŋek kosiron kɨŋek gen uŋun tepmɨsi aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma anjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Kalɨp Pita Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ nandaŋ gadat awit uŋun gat jap kaloŋɨ naŋ naŋ awit. Mani don Jems da Juda amɨn dɨ yabekban Antiok kɨwit. Uŋun amɨn yaŋ nandawit, nin Yesu nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek gɨptɨmninyo kɨsi mandaneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da kaŋban kɨlek tosak. Do abɨŋ altawit bɨsapmon Pita uŋun Juda amɨn da yokwi nandaŋ namni yaŋ do pasalek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yopmaŋ degek uŋun gat gadat gadat dɨma awit.
Uŋun nak dakon yo. Naga dakon galaktok yolek moneŋno tagɨ kokwinɨk dabeŋ. Nak amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋapbo gak nido nandaba yokwi tok asal?’ ”
Nak aŋpak morap ani do dayɨŋ dekgo nandawit, ae aŋpak morap abo nandawit, uŋun aŋpak morap ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋ kɨmotni. Aŋakwa Piŋkop but yawot ami da ji gat egɨpjak.
Yaŋ yaŋban pɨdaŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot dɨma pɨndakgwit, Yesu naŋgɨn kawit.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨmot do pasolgoŋ, aŋek mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ bɨsap morap kɨmot da pasol yoban dam tebangwan yaŋ ekwaŋ. Mani Yesu uŋun dam teban yɨpmaŋ detni do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da Pilip yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kosit kɨnda Jerusalem da Gasa kwaŋ uŋudon pɨgɨki.”
Aŋelo tapmɨmɨ madepsi kabɨ, ji Yawe dakon geni do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopmaŋek guramɨk kɨmokgoŋ kabɨ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Yolakwa Yesu ɨleŋon wɨkwan paŋdet kabɨni gat yɨkgwit.
Sailas, nak da koko uŋun Yesu yolyol notnosi, ae pi bamɨsi gɨn asak, uŋun da nak aŋpulugaŋban gen pɨsɨpmɨ on ji do mandɨsat. Nak ji dakon but paŋteban akdo, ae Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ jikon tosok uŋun dolɨk do aŋek papia on mandɨsat. Ji uŋun do nandaŋek tebaisi atni.
Nido yoyɨŋdet pi agɨt uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn yapmaŋ mudaŋek ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da pi uŋun asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi da tɨlak agɨt.
Yaŋdo, nin gapman da kobogɨ yokwi aŋnimdɨsak uŋun do pasalek geni guramɨtneŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, butningwan da suŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋek kɨlegɨsi ekwamaŋ yaŋsi nandaneŋ do aŋek geni guramɨtneŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yoyɨŋban mɨktɨmon yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa bret 7 kabɨ tɨmɨgek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek paŋdetni da kokwinɨk yomni do yomgut. Yoban mɨŋat amɨnyo do yomgwit.
Yɨgek Piŋkop da uwalni kandap mibɨlnikon yopban geni guramɨtni do jomjom aŋegɨsak.
Ji jap taŋ yokwi togɨ pak do pi dɨma ani, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni dakon jap uŋun pak do pi ani. Jap uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji da damdɨsak. Yaŋ asak do Piŋkop Dat da tɨlak agɨt.”
Uŋun da malni yopban mɨktɨm teŋteŋosok. Mɨktɨm da kaŋek nɨmnɨmɨkdak.
Aŋakwan amɨn morap gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋek aŋpak yokwi ak do madepsi galak tawit amɨn uŋun gen pikon atni bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Yo uŋun si kagɨt amɨn uŋun da iyɨ uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ae iyɨ bamɨsi yosot yaŋ nandɨsak, do jiyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat ani yaŋ do gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
Amɨn Tagɨ, nak gak dogɨn bɨsit asat, do oman amɨngo nak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nabi.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
Mani yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Nak dakon tapmɨm amɨn tapmɨmni mɨnikon pi tagɨsi asak, do nak nandaŋ yawok gamɨŋek tagɨ aŋpulugokdɨsat.” Uŋun da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, do nak abɨsok tapmɨmno mɨni da egɨsat uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asat, nido Kristo dakon tapmɨmni nagon tosak do nandɨsat.
Yaŋba Yesu da amɨn pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.’
Yaŋ aŋaki uŋun da gak kaloŋgɨn Yawe ae Piŋkop Wukwisi egek mɨktɨm morap kɨsi kɨla asal yaŋ nandaŋ gamni.
Yawe, nak dɨwarɨno mɨni yaŋ nandaki do kɨsitno pakbi naŋ sugosot. Nak gak dakon alta aŋgwasɨŋek
Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Wup dakon egɨp egɨp da mibɨltok dɨma altagɨt. On mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨp da mibɨltok altagɨt, aŋakwan wup dakon egɨp egɨp da don altagɨt.
Amɨn bamot gen uŋun yaŋek amɨn dakon but pabɨk do palɨ paŋtɨdok agɨmal. Mani dɨma, burɨ maŋakwa paret dɨma awit.
Aŋpak yokwi pasɨlɨkon da aŋ uŋun mayagɨsi, uŋun do dɨma yogogɨ.
“Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?’ “Iyɨko yagɨt, ‘Nak Yesu Nasaret amɨn naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.’
Piŋkop dakon kabap uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi ae dubagɨsi. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Saion Kabap do but galaksi nandaŋ. Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wukwisi dakon kokup pap uŋun kabapmon tosok.
Mata gen uŋun yaŋek tobɨl kɨŋ padɨge Maria iyɨndage tayaŋgok yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet da abɨk da gak do yosok.”
Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Saimon, nandaki. Wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨtni tarapmɨkgaŋ uŋudeŋ Sunduk da nandaŋ gadatgo aŋkewalban moki do yagɨt.
Ae dat, ji monjɨ gwayosi tebaisi yoyɨŋba ji do nandaba yokwi tok dɨ aŋ dabam. Yaŋ aba yo tagɨ dɨ nin da arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ yaŋ dɨ nandabam.
Asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun da gen teban yoyɨŋdet ae Parisi amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma yapni kaŋ, ji Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup Kɨla Asagon dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Yawe mango aŋkɨsisat. Gen tebango nayɨŋ dekgi.
Bulmakau da tegon amɨn da yɨk pawɨl kɨndap kɨrɨŋ paŋteban aba yo jɨgɨ ɨlɨkgaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak ji nak dakon kɨndap kɨrɨŋ pani. Nak dakon kɨndap kɨrɨŋ uŋun yaworɨ ae yɨk ɨmetni uŋun tagapmɨ. Nak amɨn yaworɨ ae butno pɨŋbi, do nak gat egek Piŋkop do dayɨŋ dekgo butji yaworɨ tosak.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Judas silwa moneŋ uŋun telagɨ yut da nagalgwan dapban pɨgakwa kɨŋ iyɨ tɨpgut.
“Uŋun do aŋek ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Ji yut dakon ami ni bɨsapmon apjak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Apjak bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo bo kalbi binap bo pup da gen yosok bɨsapmon bo wɨsa dagokdo uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Pita da yaŋ yaŋban amɨn bamorɨ do yaŋ yomgwit, kɨnda mani Josep uŋun Basabas yaŋ iyɨwit, ae mani kɨnda Jastus. Ae amɨn kɨnda uŋun mani Matias.
Yɨgek yo morap kwen toŋ uŋun dakon wukwisi egɨsak. Wup tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae kɨla amɨn morap, ae yo morap tapmɨmɨ toŋ dakon wukwisi egɨsak. Kɨla amɨn morap abɨsok ekwaŋ ae don egɨpdaŋ kɨsi dakon wukwisi egɨsak.
On mɨktɨm dakon teban tokni kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ yɨpgul da tosok. Ae kundukon yo morap toŋ uŋun gak dakon kɨsit kɨlda.
Yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon kɨŋ altaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma wɨgɨni do yoyɨŋek Pita, Jon, ae Jems gat, ae mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo gat tɨmɨkban yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun da arɨpmon ji manji namdaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip waseŋ kɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’
Amɨn kapmatjok akgwit da gen uŋun nandaŋek dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Kɨrɨrɨŋ asak” ae dɨwarɨ da “Aŋelo kɨnda da gen iyɨk” yaŋ yawit.
Yabekban kɨŋ kosiron pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo aeni kɨŋ Jopa kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋakwa gɨldat binap agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Pita bɨsit pi ak do yut kwenon wɨgɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn dɨpmɨn pak mudaŋakwa uwalni da abɨŋ jap yet tagɨ yopgut uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan joŋ yokwi dakon yerɨ tɨŋtɨŋaŋek kɨgɨt.
Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak amɨn uŋun napbɨ gwapbokon kɨsak. Do gak napbɨ gwapbo tagɨsi uŋudon tebaisi kɨŋek egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoki. Tebai agek nandaŋ gadatgo amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yaŋ teŋteŋagɨl bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da egɨp egɨp abɨdoki do kɨlɨ yaŋ gamgut.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi kokwin akdɨsak.
Nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ dɨma amɨn, gak nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋek aŋpak tagɨyo kɨsi dɨma abi kaŋ, nandaŋ gadatgo uŋun yo ɨsalɨ. Gak gen on dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do nandɨsal? Kaŋ, nandaki,
Piŋkop dakon monjɨ gwayoni uŋun gɨptɨm ae yawiniyo toŋ, uŋun amɨnsi gɨn, do Yesu uŋun kɨsi amɨn dagagɨt. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨmot yomɨsak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak amɨn Sunduk, uŋun aŋupbal ak do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Nak Pol, Piŋkop dakon oman monjɨ ae Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Nak mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da iyɨ do manjɨgɨt uŋun dakon nandaŋ gadatni paŋteban abeŋ do nak yabekgɨt, ae paŋpulugoko gen bamɨ nandaŋ pɨsaŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yolek ani yaŋ do nak yabekgɨt.
Ji amɨn dakon yokwini yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni pasɨl yomdaŋ, ae dɨma yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, dɨwarɨni taŋ yomdaŋ.”
Yesu yolyol amɨn morap amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon oman amɨni ekwaŋ, madepni man madep yomɨŋek pɨŋbini egɨpni. Yaŋ aba amɨn da Piŋkop dakon man ae paŋmuwukbi nin dakon nandaŋ gadat do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma ani.
Emat amɨn gat ae mibɨltok amɨn madepni gat, ae Juda amɨn dakon obip amɨn gat da Yesu abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ abɨsɨwit.
Moap mɨktɨm uŋun pakbi sogok ɨdapno. Ae Idom mɨktɨm uŋun kandap gwɨl yopyop tamono. Pilistia amɨn emaron pabɨŋ yopmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek yaŋ tɨdokdɨsat.”
Nak nandɨsat, ji amɨn paŋpulugok do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ, do Masadonia mɨŋat amɨnyokon manji pawɨgɨsat. Nak yaŋ yoyɨsat, “Apma bɨlagon da wɨŋ abɨsok Akaia paŋmuwukbi paret ak do tagap tawit da ekwaŋ.” Gen uŋun nandawit bɨsapmon burɨ pɨdaŋba iyɨyo kɨsi paret ak do tagɨsi nandawit.
Nak do bɨkbɨk naba nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋ gen dɨ dayɨkeŋ. Mani bɨkbɨk kɨlɨ namgwit.
Kalɨpsigwan ae don kɨsi toktok teban egɨpgul da egɨsal. Kabap morap dɨma noman tawit, ae mɨktɨmon yo morap dɨma wasagɨl, mani gak kɨlɨ egɨpgul.
Uŋun yo morap noman tawit da nin do mama gen kɨnda asak. Amɨn da Piŋkop da papiakon gen uŋun mandawit uŋun da mibɨ bɨsapmon ekwamaŋ amɨn nin do mama gen niyɨsak.
Mukwa sogok dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda abɨdaŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon binap amɨni egɨpjak do manjɨsak. Uŋun Piŋkop do but galak dakon yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ɨmɨm gat ae yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon paret mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agak dakon pi baŋ asak.
Nak da Juda amɨn yoyɨko iyɨ dakon gen tebani kɨnda yapmak do aŋek abɨdamaŋ yaŋ nayɨwit. Mani gen yaŋ ɨmgwit uŋun koko yo madep dɨma agɨt. Rom amɨn nin da si aŋatno kɨmotjak bo ae dam tebanon yɨpneŋ da arɨpmon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt.
Buŋonsi iyɨ dakon monji naŋ yabegek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Monjɨno kwan kɨla amɨn da uŋun do nandaba wukwan ɨmdaŋ.’
Ae kaŋapbo joŋ kɨlap yokwisi kɨnda tap kagagwan da noman taŋ wɨgɨt. Uŋun busuŋɨ 7 kabɨ. Aŋakwan jomɨ 10 kabɨ da busuŋɨkon kwawit. Aŋakwa kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt 10 kabɨ jomɨkon tawit. Ae busuŋɨkon man taŋ taŋ awit. Man uŋun Piŋkop jɨgɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ ɨmɨm dakon man da tawit.
Yaŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae obip amɨn gat da Yesu kaŋek tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakban!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak. Nak da gulusuŋni kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨma kat.”
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban nak da wasaŋek yaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup ninon mibɨltok pɨgɨt uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yaŋ gɨn pɨgɨt.
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda dabɨlni mɨni notni kɨnda kosit tagɨ yolɨsak? Kaŋ kɨsi bamot gapmagwan mokdamal.
Yawe da manon abɨsak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmjak. Yawe da yutnon nin mani aŋkɨsineŋ.
Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami uŋun Yawe. Uŋun da amɨn kɨsisi mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun yaŋ ɨlɨkdak. Gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da wasaŋek kɨŋ si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn amɨn ekwaŋ kɨsisi yaŋ ɨlɨkdak.
Piŋkop da oman amɨni Dewit manjɨŋek sipsip kɨla agɨron naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkban gen bamɨ nandaba pɨsoni do nandɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da kɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.”
Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Parisi amɨn kɨŋek Erot dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun gat muwugek “Niaŋ aŋek aŋatneŋ?” yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
Ae kɨsi morap Piŋkop dakon Wup da pakbi yomgut uŋun nawit. Asi, Wup dakon tɨp uŋun gat kɨsi agɨpgwit uŋun dakon pakbi nawit. Tɨp uŋun Kristo.
“Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek amɨn monɨŋ oden kɨnda but da abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ gɨn dɨma abɨdosok, Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ abɨdosok.”
Yaŋ yaŋek tepmɨsi wɨgɨ Maria gat Josep gat paŋalon aŋek, monjɨ ŋakŋak uŋun bulmakau ɨdapmon pakban kawit.
Yawe da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨt, do ya yaŋ iyɨŋek paret ak do wain kap aŋenokgeŋ.
Piŋkop da “amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ aŋpak awit da arɨpmon kobogɨ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ akdɨsak.”
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tɨp kɨnam yombem. Kwen da kwak soŋbi do kwakwagɨ tagɨsi asak. Mani mɨkgwan amɨn kɨdat gat ae yo garagɨ tɨgɨ morapmɨ toŋ.
Mɨktɨm uŋun oman amɨni Israel do yomgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
“Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ da pi monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Not, nak da gak yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋgamɨt. Nak moneŋ 1 danari gabeŋ do gayɨko gaga but kaloŋ al.
Mukwa sogok dakon mibɨltok amɨn morap Piŋkop do but galak yo paŋkɨ paŋkɨ aŋ, ae mukwa sogok dakon pi uŋun taŋ yomɨsak. Do Mukwa Sogok dakon Mibɨltok Amɨnin uŋunyo kɨsi mukwa sosaksi.
Mani mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat kɨsi tɨmɨgek kɨwit.
Uŋun but nandak nandaknikon da aŋpak yokwi ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋalon aŋ.
Yaŋ do aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop da dabɨlon ae amɨn da dabɨlon butnokon gulusuŋno mɨni egɨpbeŋ do kɨlani tebaisi asat.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni.
Ji abɨŋek Yawe da wasok asak uŋun do pɨndakgɨt. Mɨktɨmon wasok masɨ masɨmɨ asak uŋun pɨndatni.
Kɨla amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet tagɨsi, nak niaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Yawe, niaŋ egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsal uŋun nolɨki. Kositgo nolɨki.
Ji kɨla amɨn pi tagɨsi aŋ amɨn man madep yomɨŋek tagɨsi yumaŋ noni. Mibɨltoksi yomni amɨn uŋun: Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋ amɨn gat, ae Piŋkop gen yoyɨŋdet aŋ amɨn.
Aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop tebaisi aŋyomgut. Aŋek mɨŋatjok jap ɨmɨŋba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
Pol Sabat morapmon Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yutnikon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨkwan Juda ae Grik amɨn Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do gen emaron da nayɨŋbi gayɨko awit.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kalɨp Troas kokup papmon paŋkɨ egek nin do jomjom awit.
Babɨknin Jekop da pakbi gapma on nin do nimgut. Jekop iyɨ gat ae monjini gat on gapmakon pakbi koleŋ nawit, ae bulmakau sipsipyoni gat kɨsi nawit. Gak da Jekop yapmaŋdal, ma?”
“Yo on pɨndakgaŋ uŋun bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon uŋun dakon tɨp notni kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Aŋakwa Yesu da yagɨt, “Dat, dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yobi. Yo aŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwan emat amɨn da ɨmalni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit.
Yaŋgɨn kosit oba mɨŋat Reap da amɨn paŋman ak amɨn bamot uŋun uwal da dapni yaŋ do paŋkɨsɨbɨŋek yabekban kosit ŋwakŋwat naŋ tobɨl kɨgɨmal, do Piŋkop da mɨŋat kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Aso uŋun Sadok dakon datni. Sadok uŋun Akim dakon datni. Akim uŋun Eliut dakon datni.
Amɨn kɨnda kosit mɨŋaron saŋbesak uŋun gat gɨptɨm kaloŋ amal, ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Bamorɨ da gɨptɨm kaloŋ anjil.”
Gen yɨpba kwan apbal yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Asi on monjɨ jil dakon? Dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt yaŋ yomal amɨn on uŋun? Yaŋ kaŋ niaŋ aŋek dabɨlɨ kɨlektak?”
Kanek gat gɨk morap gat yopban pɨlɨn kɨla aŋ. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Ji da Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nandaŋakwan yo uŋun ais bɨsapmon bo Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut aŋtasɨk asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn aŋtasɨk akdɨsak. Nido, Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut uŋun telagɨsi. Telagɨ yut uŋun ji.
Nak da yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋ yomgum, mani nak abɨdok do pat yɨpgwit, ae nak da mokeŋ do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgwit.
Yawe kaloŋgɨn Piŋkop bamɨsi. Uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn tɨp madep da yaŋ dam aŋnimɨsak.
Aŋakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn yo uŋun pɨndagek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokup papmon amɨn gat ae kokup terɨ terɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun amɨn gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
Wigat, ji wɨtdal kɨni. Yoma kalɨpmɨ, ji madepsi pɨsoni. Aŋakwa Kɨla Amɨn Madep tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi da wɨgɨsak.
Gengo da nandak nandak tagɨsi namɨsak, do aŋpak yokwi morap do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Konilias uŋun kaŋek pasol pasol madep aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ yo kɨnda ni?” Iyɨŋban aŋelo da iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit pi asal ae yoni mɨni amɨn paŋpulugosol Piŋkop da uŋun aŋpak kaŋban tagɨsi asak.
Tiopilas, nak kalɨp papia kɨnda mandagɨm. Uŋun papiakon Yesu wasaŋek pi agɨt ae Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨron da kwen wɨgɨgɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ mandagɨm. Yesu yabekbi kabɨni manjɨgɨt uŋun altaŋ yomɨŋek Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan pi ani do yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
Yesu da Mata gat padɨge gat ae Lasarus gat do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut.
Nido, Kristo da tapmɨm namɨŋakwan yo morap tagɨ abeŋ.
Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da galak tosagon nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da jikon opbo kɨsin da tapmɨm paneŋ.
Yaŋba yagɨt, “Nak amɨn 4 tausen do bret 7 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 7 kabɨ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak gen kɨnda dayɨkdɨsat. Dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi kobogɨ tagɨ dayɨkeŋ.
Yawe da Israel mɨktɨm dakon kokup morap do galak tosok, mani Jerusalem do madepsi but dasi galak tosok.
Gak tap binap naŋ agɨpgul. Kosit tap ɨdap madep da binap tagɨt, mani gak dakon kandap tamo dɨma kawit.
Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido ‘ninon bret mɨni’ yaŋ yoŋ? Gen dayɨsat uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsosok, ma? Nandak nandak kositji sopgwit?
aŋakwa mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun da mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi yaŋ yoyɨwit, ‘Nin do pakbi dɨwatji nimgut, lamnin kɨmotdaŋ.’
Iyɨŋ mudaŋba amɨn morapmɨsi kɨŋ abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋakwa Yesu gat yabekbi kabɨni gat jap noknok dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut. Aban Yesu da yabekbi kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Opba mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨno. Uŋudon egek tapmɨm pani.”
Notno kɨnda kosit dubagɨkon da abɨk da yutnokon ɨsal yɨkdak. Japno mɨni.’
Nido nak Amɨn Tagɨkon gen tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ. Kalbi Judas da Amɨn Tagɨ uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut bɨsapmon uŋun kalbi Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da bret abɨdaŋek
Gɨldat binap 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt.
Kɨla amɨn madep aŋpulugaŋbɨ gɨldat ae kanek tonjil da arɨpmon egɨpjak.
Yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨŋ yoyɨŋba sotni toŋ amɨn wayɨk wamaŋek Yesu dukwan dukwan egɨpgut uŋudon paŋkɨwit.
Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo da dabɨlon nin yombem dagaŋek mani pawɨgɨk do kosit wɨsɨk aŋakwa nak da uŋun kosit sopmaŋ yom do pini asat, ae yaŋ sigɨn akdɨsat.
Ae amɨn morap kalugɨ egek nandaŋ gadaŋ namni uŋun amɨn wagɨl dɨma kɨmotdaŋ. Gen uŋun yosot uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asak, bo dɨma?”
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, alta gat ae yo morap altakon toŋ uŋun kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimaŋ ji yaŋ nandaŋ. Yaŋdo, ji pini tebaisi aŋek manjɨŋek nandaŋ kokwinɨk mudoŋ. Uŋun papia da nak do yaŋkwok asak,
Aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn kɨsisi yoyɨŋ mudoni.
Amɨn wup uŋun da tebaisi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, gak telagɨsi egɨsal, ae aŋpakgo wagɨl bamɨsi gɨn. Nin bɨsap niaŋdasi gak do jomjom aŋapno mɨktɨm amɨn gen pikon yopmaŋek yawinin dakon kobogɨ yobi?”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Wup da Yesu Sunduk da aŋkewaljak do mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon aŋkɨgɨt.
Nak uŋudon egɨp do but dasi madepsi galak tosot. Galak tok morapno kɨsi gak dakon yut do tosok. Gɨptɨm ae nandak nandakno kɨsi da Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yosot.
Yaŋ awit do Yesukon abɨŋek “Gak nin gat egɨpneŋ” yaŋ iyɨŋba gɨldat bamorɨ uŋun kokupmon egɨpgwit.
Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon burɨ kɨnda paret yopgwit uŋudon egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek gen uŋun yagɨt. Mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt, do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni tapmɨm yomɨsak. Kɨla amɨn madepni pini asak do manjɨgɨt uŋun aŋpulugok do tagap taŋek dam tebani arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ da yaŋ egɨsak.
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon kosit nolayɨki. Aŋkutnaŋaki yokwi kɨnda da nak abɨŋ nep do pi dɨma asak.
Sunduk da galaktokni yolni do iyɨ da paron depban yokwalgwit. Mani gen bamɨ nandani kaŋ, nandak nandakni ae pɨsaŋakwa Sunduk da paron da kukwaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Gak da jap yomɨŋaki noŋ. Gak da upmagaki burɨ tugoŋ.
Wɨsa dagokdo gen kokwin amɨn madep da obip amɨni yabekba kɨŋ dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak amɨn bamot uŋun yopbɨ kɨnjil.”
Kristo uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi ae kalugɨ ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨni egɨp do aŋek kɨmakgɨt da ae pɨdagɨt.
Pol Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ŋwakŋwarɨsi morapmɨ agɨt.
Kristo da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt.
Uŋun but dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun mɨŋat kɨnda da monjɨ kwapmɨ awɨldak yombem da don yokwi aŋalon aban noman tosok. Ae yokwi da si tagosok bɨsapmon kɨmot aŋalon asak.
Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak da pi tagɨsi kɨnda agɨl do aŋek tɨpbaŋ dɨma gɨtneŋ. Gak amɨn ɨsalɨ kɨnda da nak Piŋkop yaŋ yaŋek Piŋkop kulabɨsal uŋun do aŋek gɨtdamaŋ.”
Yaŋba Pailat da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji obip amɨn tɨmɨkba kɨŋ tɨp kɨnam uŋun niaŋsi aŋek kɨlani ak do nandaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon yoyɨŋba ani.”
Nandaŋ pɨsoni. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan yutni arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
Jiyo kɨsi butji yaworɨ taŋakwa jɨgɨ noman taŋ damaŋ uŋun guramɨtni, nido Amɨn Tagɨ da apjak bɨsap uŋun kwaŋ tosok.
Yawe emaron teban tagɨt uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok agɨt. Aŋpakni kɨlegɨ yolɨŋban mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi da kawit.
Amɨn kɨnda gulusuŋ agɨt dakon yokwini Piŋkop da wɨrɨrɨk ɨmɨsak, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Yesu Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Kapaneam uŋudon pɨgɨgɨt. Pabɨgɨ egek Sabat bɨsap morapmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Aeno kaŋek os kwakwagɨ kɨnda kagɨm. Uŋun da kwenon amɨn kɨnda obipni abɨdaŋek yɨkgɨt. Uŋun amɨn do kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt kɨnda ɨmgwit. Ɨba emaron teban tagɨt da tɨlagon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋek emat morapmɨ sigɨn aŋek teban tokeŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek kɨgɨt.
Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Mastat dakon yerɨ uŋun jap yet kɨsi morap dakon pɨŋbi, monɨŋɨsisok.
Nak dukwan kɨŋek Wupgo yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ? Nak pasal dukwan kɨŋapbo gak kapmatjok dɨma egɨpdɨsal?
Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon gen da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak do niyɨŋ dekdak. Amɨn kɨnda gen uŋun yɨpmaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo gen ŋwakŋwarɨ Yesu dakon geni kɨlegɨ yombem kɨnda naŋ dɨma yoyɨŋdetjak kaŋ,
Mani gen mandagɨm dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn kɨnda Kristo dakon man paŋek yumabi aŋpak asak, bo amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok asak, bo kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨsak, bo amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok asak, bo pakbi teban naŋek but upbal asak, bo amɨn dakon yo kabo tɨmɨkdak kaŋ, ji uŋun amɨn gat kaloŋɨ dɨma egɨpni. Ae uŋun gat jap pakbiyo kaloŋɨ dɨma ani.
Don Apolos Akaia mɨktɨmon kɨk do nandak nandak aŋakwan Epesas paŋmuwukbi da burɨ aŋteban awit. Yaŋ aŋek papia kɨnda Akaia paŋmuwukbi da Apolos kwan tagɨsi abɨdoni do mandawit. Aŋakwa Apolos kɨŋ Akaia mɨktɨmon altaŋek amɨn da dabɨlon Juda amɨn dakon top geni pabɨŋ yopgut. Aŋek Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun paŋteŋteŋ aŋek Yesu uŋun asi Kristo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek nandaŋ gadat awit amɨn uŋun madepsi paŋpulugagɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa nandaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨban apban iyɨgɨt, ‘Uŋun nibaŋ aŋ?’
Egɨpgumaŋ dakon bɨsap mudaŋakwan Yesu dakon paŋdetni gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyoni gat kɨsi kokup pap yɨpmaŋ degek tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon pɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Pɨgɨ uŋudon ŋwakbeŋ aŋek bɨsit agɨmaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda Kristo dakon gen yɨpmaŋek gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon kɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop uŋun amɨn gat dɨma egɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda Kristo dakon gen tebai abɨdosok amɨn uŋun Dat gat ae Monji gat uŋun amɨnon ekwamal.
Amɨn da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Yaworɨsi ekwamaŋ, ae yo dɨ da nin arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋupbal ani.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn mɨŋat da monjɨ paŋalak do but pɨsoni mɨni monjɨ sugaŋakwa tepmɨ paŋ uŋun da tɨlak tepmɨsi tasɨk tokdaŋ, ae arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pulugaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Mani Paŋpulugok, Telagɨ Wup, nak da manon Dat da yabekban pɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da yo morap do dayɨŋdetdɨsak. Ae ji paŋpulugaŋban gen morap dayɨgɨm da dayɨsat uŋun ae nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Amɨn yoyɨki kaŋ yaŋ gayɨkdaŋ, nak Piŋkop gawak ɨm do aŋek Jerusalem kɨŋ altaŋek gɨldat 12 kabɨ egɨpgum.
Piŋkop dakon Monji man madep pagɨt, do gen nandagɨmaŋ uŋun nandak nandakninon da tebai abɨdaŋek guramɨk kɨmotneŋ. Gen uŋun guramɨt do alek taŋek dɨ dɨwalɨk pɨkwam.
Ae Yesu da iyɨŋban kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan aeni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji. Gak but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal?” Pita uŋun Yesu da kosirɨ kapbɨ “Gak but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal?” yaŋ iyɨgɨt, do burɨ jɨk tagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yo morap uŋun nandaŋ mudosol. Nak but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsat, gaga nandɨsal.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak sipsipno upmokgi.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo nin da gen teban morapgo tagɨ nandaŋ gadaneŋ. Amɨn da ɨsal dogɨn yokwi aŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat.
Gen emat gat ae butjap ukwayɨtyo binapjikon noman toŋ uŋun mibɨlɨ nido noman toŋ? Uŋun yokwi dakon but sulɨgɨk dakon aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ butjikon emat aŋ, uŋun da gen emat ae butjap ukwayɨtyo paŋalon aŋ.
Babɨkni kabɨ toktogɨsi egɨ wugɨkdaŋ. Gɨldat da tosok uŋun da tɨlak uŋun dakon dɨwatni da mɨŋat amɨnyo bɨsap dubagɨ kɨla akdaŋ.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Busuŋ Kɨdat uŋudon Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek yokwi pakpak kɨnda amɨn tet do, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do yaŋ dapgwit.
Yaŋ aban kaŋek emat amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Asisi, on amɨn kɨlegɨsi egɨpgut.”
Piŋkop, uwal da gen yaŋ gamaŋ, do gak abɨŋek gen pikon gaga da tet kɨla tebai abi. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋsul yokwisi aŋ gamaŋ uŋun do nandaki.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ guramɨgek nak noljak.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨlɨ nandal, do nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal. Amɨn nak dɨma nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kaloŋɨ kɨnda agɨm uŋun do wɨrɨpdakgwit.
“On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ ekwamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat.
Yoyɨŋban yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 7 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap gat tɨmɨk Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek pudaŋ paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yoba nawit.
Amɨn egɨp egɨpni iyɨkon tosok yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨmotdaŋ. Uŋuden amɨn nandak nandak tagɨ mɨni. Uŋun amɨn yoni morapmɨ do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ, mani uŋun kɨmotdaŋ.
Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn monɨŋ dakon aŋeloni Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da ɨŋamon toktogɨsi ekwaŋ. Do amɨn monɨŋ do nandaba yo ɨsalɨ dɨma ani.”
Gɨptɨmji dakon galaktok yokwi dɨma yolni do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek telagɨsi egek amɨn bamɨsi da tɨlagon egɨpni.
Abɨsok gen on dayɨko jɨgɨsi nandaŋ.
Yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kɨnda do gen gɨreŋ kɨnda dɨma yoni, aŋek gen emat dɨma ani. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaworɨsi egek mɨŋat amɨn morap kabɨkon iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ aŋyomni.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit, mani Yesu suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt yaŋ kawit.
Saion kokup pap amɨn do galak taŋek paŋpulugoki. Jerusalem kokup pap dakon dam madep aego abɨ atjak.
Yaŋ yaŋban Sakius da tepmɨ pɨŋ but galak nandaŋek Yesu abɨdaŋban yutnikon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Butno madepsi yokwi tagɨt, mani Yawe do madepsi yaŋ tɨdagɨm. Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do yaŋ tɨdoko Telagɨ Yutnikon egek yaŋ ɨlɨtno nandagɨt. Aŋek bɨsitno do mɨrak yopgut.
Yesu uŋun bot kɨndakon mɨlkaŋ wɨgɨgɨt. Bot uŋun Saimon dakon. Uŋun boron wɨgek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bot ɨmɨŋdɨlbɨ tɨmɨsok dɨ pakbikon kwan.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek Yesu boron yɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Mani aeni wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Dɨma.” Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak asi Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Gak Galili amɨn kɨnda.”
Nak Piŋkop dakon gen awɨgɨsat. Asisi, Yawe dakon gen awɨgɨsat.
Tɨlɨm dɨma tasɨk togɨ baŋ but kagasi paŋtɨlɨm ani. Tɨlɨm uŋun aŋpak yaworɨsi ae tayaŋgok egɨp egɨp. Aŋpak uŋuden Piŋkop da dabɨlon tagɨsisi.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Anas ae dabɨni dɨwarɨ, ae Kaiapas gat Jon ae Aleksanda gat kɨsi muwukgwit.
Nak naga on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma, ae amɨn kabɨno uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨmon nani dɨma.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon teban tok tosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Uŋun do aŋek ji gen gulusuŋ yoŋ.
Sami bamot da Yesu do gen yɨpbal kɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, notgo but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsal uŋun sot asak.”
Kalbi emat amɨn gen uŋun guramɨgek Pol abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kokup pap Antiparis uŋudon aŋkɨwit.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nin yo dabɨl da si pɨndagek dɨma ekwamaŋ, nin nandaŋ gadaron dagɨn ekwamaŋ.
Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yabekban pi agɨt bo amɨn da yabekba agɨt?” Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “ ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Ɨleŋon egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Aŋakwan tomno dabɨlniyo gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Ae ɨmalniyo kɨsi kwakwagɨsi ae teŋteŋɨni toŋsi agɨt.
Mani, amɨn aŋpakni uŋuden mɨni, uŋun amɨn yo dubagɨkon toŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndakgaŋ ae uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Piŋkop da yokwi morap kalɨp awit uŋun wɨrɨrɨk yoban amɨn kɨlegɨsi awit, mani uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi agɨt uŋun kɨlɨ ɨŋtawit.
Yaŋdo, nak abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, nak ji paŋpulugok do aŋek tepmɨ pasat uŋun do butjɨk dɨma pani. Yo uŋun noman tak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Nido, uŋun da ji paŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop gat tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek dɨwarɨ da ɨlɨp sul ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek dabɨlɨ ɨmal naŋ wamaŋ sopmaŋek kɨsit da aŋakgwit. Kɨsit da aŋagek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da gɨkdak? Kombɨ gen ya!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwa obip amɨn da abɨdaŋek aŋakgwit.
Uŋun da yaŋ dayɨwit, “Mibɨ gɨldaron jɨgɨlak gen yogok amɨn noman tokdaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yokwi yoldaŋ.”
Yawe da amɨn kɨlegɨ ae amɨn yokwi kakgɨmansi kokwin asak. Emat do galak toŋ amɨn dɨmasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋek amɨn morapmɨ dakon nandak nandak pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun paŋteŋteŋ akdɨsak. Aŋek but yokwi da emat agak sɨba da yaŋ wamgo sugokdɨsak.”
Abɨŋ nandaba amɨn bamot da Yesu kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt ae amɨn kɨmakbi yaŋ gɨn pɨdokdaŋ uŋun do yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨmal. Yaŋ aŋakwal amɨn bamot do nandaba yokwi tok awit.
Aŋek Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn gat Yesu abɨdok do apgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji emat agak sɨba gat ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ gat tɨmɨgek kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda naŋ yaŋ abɨdok do abaŋ, ma?
Yesu da gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek aŋkewalgwit. Mani Yesu gawak pɨgek kɨsirɨ da mɨktɨmon kɨlda mandagɨt.
Telagɨ Wup da yaŋsi yosok, bɨsap kɨnda don apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadatni wɨtdal kɨkdaŋ, nido uŋun wup yokwi amɨn paŋkewalgaŋ uŋun dakon geni guramɨtdaŋ, ae koŋ dakon geni yoldaŋ.
Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoban apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ egɨpmamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do nak bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat. Jap dɨma yomɨŋek yabetno kɨni kaŋ, kosiron ɨŋam kɨmot aŋek maŋ potdaŋ.”
Pi madepsi aŋ uŋun do nandaŋek nandaba wukwan yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Ae not kabɨsi gat but kaloŋ aŋek yaworɨ egɨpni.
“Gak tobɨl yutgokon kɨŋek Piŋkop da gak aŋpulugaŋek yo madepsi ak uŋun do amɨn yoyɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun tobɨl kɨŋ kokupni dakon amɨn morap Yesu da aŋpulugaŋek yo morap agɨt uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Ae Piŋkop da namɨn do bɨlak 40 da arɨp butjap nandaŋ yomgut? Mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwi aŋek kɨmakgwit aŋakwa gɨptɨmni mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ mɨktɨmon tawit amɨn uŋun do butjap nandagɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep tɨmtɨm yaŋek apba pɨndagek koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ, gen kaga ae mɨrak sopsop amɨn, gak monjɨ on yɨpmaŋdet! Wagɨl kɨŋek buŋon on monjɨgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨki!”
Do Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ kwen wɨgɨk amɨn dakon gen do galak taŋek geni uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ.
Yawe, kɨla amɨn madep da tapmɨmgo do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandɨsak. Gak da aŋpulugaŋaki emaron teban tagɨt, do gak do but galaksi nandɨsak.
Uŋun kokupmon uwal dakon gobɨŋni gat, ae pasɨkni gat, ae emat agak sɨbani gat jokgalgɨt. Piŋkop da emat dakon yo morapni paŋupbal agɨt.
Wɨgɨkwan gawak ɨmɨŋek tobɨl kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandaŋek Jerusalem kɨwit.
Muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ ji dolek uŋun gat dɨma muwutni do yaŋsop aŋ damdaŋ. Bɨsap kɨnda apjak, uŋudon amɨn da dɨkba kɨmagakwa uŋun amɨn da nin da Piŋkop do yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmamaŋ yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
Ae ji dakon Madepji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kristo, do amɨn kɨnda do gawak ɨmɨŋek madepno yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
“Gen tebanin da yaŋ yosok, Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon mibɨlni dɨma yaŋban nandaŋek ɨsal dogɨn yokwi al yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.”
Ae jap yet joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandɨsak, mani mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk asak, ae moneŋ da aŋkɨlɨkban uŋun do galagɨsi nandaŋakwan uŋun da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋban bamɨ dɨma tosok.
Ji “Yumabi aŋpak dɨma ani” yaŋ yoŋ. Mani dɨsi yumabi aŋpak dɨma bo aŋ? Ae ji kokup kɨdat gawak yomyom do dɨmasi agagɨ yaŋ yoŋ, mani Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon kokup kɨdat gawak yomyom yutnon yoni kabo dɨma bo tɨmɨkgaŋ?
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Amɨn kɨnda nak noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma agɨpjak. Egɨp egɨp dakon teŋteŋɨ da uŋun amɨnon tosak.”
Yawe Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨsak, do mɨŋat amɨnyo ji Saion wɨgek mani aŋkɨsini. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon bumjot tamoni ji da paŋtɨlɨm aŋ. Yaŋ aŋ uŋun babɨknin da tagɨsi dapba kɨmakgwit yaŋ nandaŋ dakon tɨlak asak.
Yawe da yaŋ yosok, “Amɨn nak do but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgeŋ. Amɨn nak dakon man do nandaŋ teban toŋ uŋun paŋkutnokeŋ.
Pakbisi da wain dagagɨt do jap noknok kɨla amɨn da aŋkɨlɨk kok do naŋ nandaban galagɨsi agɨt. Oman amɨn pakbi kolewit uŋun da Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun kawit, mani kɨla amɨn dɨma kagɨt, do wɨli mɨŋat pagɨt uŋun yaŋ ɨban
Nak naga uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum. Mani Piŋkop da nak telagɨ pakbi soŋ yobeŋ do yabegek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak kaŋbɨ Telagɨ Wup amɨn kɨnda da kwenon pɨŋ yɨkban kaŋ yaŋ nandaki, uŋun amɨn da amɨn Telagɨ Wup naŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomdɨsak.’
Nido Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn kokwin asak.
Mɨktɨm amɨn morap da ji nandaba yokwi tok arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋ damni, mani nak aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun do yaŋ kwok asat, do uŋun do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, “Yokwi aŋ amɨn nandak nandak tagɨ dɨ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdaŋ. Bret naŋba mudoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak mɨŋat amɨno naŋ mudoŋ. Ae nak da paŋpulugokeŋ do bɨsit dɨma aŋ namaŋ.”
Yaŋdo, yo dabɨl da si pɨndarɨ uŋun do dabɨlnin uŋudon dɨma yɨpmaŋ gamaŋ. Nin yo dɨma pɨndarɨ uŋun do dabɨlnin kak gɨmansi uŋudon gɨn yɨpmaŋ gamaŋ. Nido yo dabɨl da pɨndarɨ uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn tokdaŋ, mani yo dɨma pɨndarɨ uŋun toktogɨsi tokdaŋ.
Yaŋ asak, nido amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsak uŋun da tɨlɨmni dakon yo tagɨsi morap uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandani do nandɨsak. Uŋun amɨn tɨlɨmnikon egɨpni do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.
Kabap morap nido meme da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit? Ae ɨleŋ monɨŋ monɨŋ ji nido sipsip da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit?
Nak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bupmɨ but yokwiyo aŋek butno madepsi jɨk tosok.
Amɨn kaloŋ kɨnda da gen kɨrɨŋɨt aban uŋun dakon yokwini da kɨmot aŋalon aban kɨmot da kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da yaŋ amɨn morap pabɨŋ yopgut. Mani Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawok gat ae but galak yoni gat dakon tapmɨm da kɨmot dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋek madepsi daman. Do nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, mɨŋat amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot uŋun abɨdoŋ Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kaloŋɨ Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek mɨktɨmon egɨpjak bɨsapmon tebaisi atdaŋ.
Piŋkopno kɨlegɨsi, gak do yaŋ tɨdokeŋ bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi. But yokwino wɨrɨrɨkbɨ pasɨlgɨt. Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek bɨsitno nandaki.
Eliakim uŋun Melea dakon monji. Melea uŋun Mena dakon monji. Mena uŋun Matata dakon monji. Matata uŋun Natan dakon monji. Natan uŋun Dewit dakon monji.
Jap arɨpninon naŋek tap wakga tagap tosak yaŋ do wit maba tap kagagwan pɨgɨwit.
Uŋun pi kɨnda awit do aŋek dɨma manjɨgɨt, uŋun nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek ɨsalsi manjɨgɨt. Uŋun pi kɨnda aŋakwa manjɨgɨt tam, uŋun da nandaŋ yawotsi dɨma asak.
Kandap gwɨl paŋek agɨpni, aŋek paba pɨgɨk kaloŋɨ gɨn ɨlɨkba pɨgɨsak.
Asisi, kombɨ amɨn Elaija da bɨsapmon sɨkak dɨma maŋakwan bɨlak kapbɨ ae kanek 6 yaŋ egek jap do madepsi awit. Uŋun bɨsapmon Israel mɨktɨmon sakwabat morapmɨ egɨpgwit.
Uŋun aŋelo bamot da buŋon ae kɨnda da abɨŋ gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda joŋ kɨlap yokwisi ae wupni gawak ɨmɨŋek tɨlakni ɨŋamɨkon ae kɨsirɨkon abɨdosak kaŋ
Yesu Kristo altagɨt uŋun dakon gen yaŋ. Meŋi Maria uŋun Josep da pasak do kɨlɨ manjɨwit. Mani dɨma paŋakwan Maria uŋun monjɨ kwap kɨlɨ awɨlgɨt. Monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da awɨlgɨt.
Sonda wɨsa dagokdosi mɨŋat kabɨ uŋun yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨlɨ paŋkosit awit uŋun tɨmɨgek tɨp kɨnamon kɨwit.
Mɨŋat amɨngo kɨnarɨm yombem tapmɨmni mɨni, do gak da nin nipmaŋ dekbɨ joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo da dɨma paŋupbal ani. Uwal da mɨŋat amɨngo nin obɨsi paŋupbal aŋ, do dɨmasi ɨŋtaŋ nibi.
Gen teban morap kɨsi on gen teban kaloŋgwan gɨn tosok: “Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Amɨn Tɨpdomon kwaŋ uŋun kɨbaŋ uŋun da kɨmot dakon kɨbaŋni asak, mani amɨn Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak uŋun kɨbaŋ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dakon kɨbaŋni asak. Namɨn dasi yabekbi pi arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak? Nin da arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ yoŋ, “Jap uŋun kwasop dakon, ae kwasop uŋun jap dakon tamo.” Gen uŋun bamɨ, mani Piŋkop da kɨsi bamot yaŋban pasɨldamal. Gɨptɨmnin uŋun yumabi aneŋ do dɨma tosok, uŋun Piŋkop dakon pi aneŋ do tosok. Aŋakwan Piŋkop uŋun gɨptɨmnin kɨla asak.
Damaskus kokup papmon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Ananias. Uŋun amɨn burɨ pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ananias!” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak oni.”
Uŋun amɨn da mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨŋat eyo dɨma ani, ae jap dɨwarɨ dɨma noni do gen teban yopmaŋ yomdaŋ. Mani Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek geni bamɨ nandaŋ amɨn da uŋun jap morap tɨmɨgek ya yaŋ iyɨŋek tagɨ noni do wasagɨt.
Not kabɨno, pakyaŋsi nandani. Ji morap gen nandak do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopni, mani gen tepmɨ dɨma yoni, ae butjap tepmɨ dɨma nandani.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba yo damjak. Pinisi aŋek wusɨŋ pɨndatni. Yoma domon tɨdaŋba Piŋkop da wɨtdal damjak.
Yaŋ aki kaŋ, nin gak dɨma gepmaŋ detneŋ. Gak da paŋpulugaŋbɨ tagɨ egek bɨsit aŋ gamɨŋek mango awɨgɨneŋ.
Pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki neŋak kagagwan dɨma pɨgɨ pasɨlgeŋ. Nak do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ amɨn da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki pakbi ɨlarɨgwan dɨma pasɨlgeŋ.
Piŋkop dakon gen da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn morap Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun mayaktok dɨma pakdaŋ.”
Nak yo kɨnda bo amɨn kɨnda dakon man dɨma awɨgɨkeŋ. Dɨmasi. Nak Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap naŋ gɨn awɨgɨsat. Kristo da tɨlak kɨndapmon pi agɨt do aŋek koko on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun ɨŋtaŋ mudagɨm, ae nak naga tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨm da on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap saŋbeŋek dɨma yoldat yaŋ asak.
Nin do nandaba wukwan nimɨŋek but galak do yo morapmɨ nimgwit. Ae tap wakga abɨdok do agɨmaŋ bɨsapmon kosit agek naŋ paŋyo aneŋ do yo uŋun tap wakgakon yopgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
Gen bamɨ ninon tosok, ae dagok dagogɨ mɨni tokdɨsak. Uŋun do aŋek but dasi galak taŋ damamaŋ.
Peliks uŋun Yesu Yolyol Kosit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ nandaŋ mudagɨt. Do Pol gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan Juda amɨn jomjom ani do yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Lisias da pɨŋakwan genji dakon yaŋ dagok don aŋ dabeŋ.”
Sɨtnok yaŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋakwa amɨn gen kokwinon yɨkgwit kɨsi da kaŋakwa Stiwen dakon tomno dabɨlyo aŋelo yombem agɨt.
Amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon mɨktɨm mɨŋat amɨni do yomɨŋek tapmɨmni madep aŋalon agɨt.
Nin Yesu Kristo nandaŋ ɨmamaŋ, ae iyɨ uŋun Piŋkop do tapmɨm madepnikon da egɨp egɨpnin paŋteban asak dakon yo morap gat ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak aneŋ dakon yo morap arɨpmɨsi nimgut. Nin da man madepni gat, ae tapmɨmni gat, ae aŋpakni tagɨsi gat tɨmɨtneŋ do aŋek, nin yaŋ nimgut.
Nandaŋ gadat dakon aŋpak kɨsi yaŋ gɨn. Nandaŋ gadat ɨsal taŋek aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨma noman tosak kaŋ, uŋun yo ɨsalɨ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt ae iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
Nandani, nak tɨlak kɨnda abeŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ sɨkak mosok, aŋakwan mɨktɨm da sɨkak abɨdaŋek pi awit amɨn paŋpulugaŋek jap tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ yomjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da on mɨktɨm do yo tagɨsi asak.
Aisak nandaŋ gadat aŋek Jekop gat Iso gat do gɨsam yomgut. Aŋek yo don noman taŋ yomdaŋ uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Apolos Korin egɨpgut bɨsapmon Pol koron tetgɨn agek don Epesas pɨgɨ altagɨt. Pɨgɨ altaŋek Yesu dakon paŋdetni dɨwarɨ pɨndakgɨt.
Uŋudon pakgɨmaŋ da wɨsa dagokdo uŋun kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Sisaria kokup papmon kɨŋ altaŋek Pilip da yutnon kɨno uŋun gat egɨpgumaŋ. Pilip uŋun yabekbi kabɨ paŋpulugoni do kalɨp amɨn 7 kabɨ manjɨkbi uŋun kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun amɨn Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn kɨnda.
Yesu gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Parisi amɨn kɨnda da yutnikon kwan yɨgek jap nonjil do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu kɨŋ yutnikon wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨkgɨt.
Yaŋdo, nin kɨsi yut yomayo da waŋga kɨŋek uŋun da mayagɨ pagɨt ninyo uŋudeŋ gɨn paneŋ.
Uŋun gɨptɨm dakon yo do wadaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon bɨsitni nandaŋ yomdɨsak. Bɨsit aba saŋbeŋek manji dɨma yomdɨsak.
Ji uŋun yumabi mɨŋat da amɨn do aŋpak yokwisi niaŋ aŋyomgut, uŋun aŋpak yaŋ gɨn aŋ ɨmni. Uŋun da pakbi teban tebaisi kapmon wasagɨt.
Nak paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn da mɨŋat gak gat ae gwakgo gat do papia on mandaŋ damɨsat. Piŋkop da gak iyɨ do manjɨgɨt. Nak asisi ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, ae nak gɨn dɨma, mɨŋat amɨn morap gen bamɨ nandaŋ uŋun kɨsi da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damaŋ.
Iyɨŋban Abraham butni yaworɨ taŋakwan jomjom aŋek don Piŋkop da yo morap ɨm do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tɨmɨkgɨt.
Yawe da gulusuŋni mɨni amɨn uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi asak. Ae yo tagɨsi yomɨsak uŋun toktogɨsi tɨmɨk wugɨkdaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa nak da aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ do yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ gak aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ tɨmɨk iyɨ baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Nin Jerusalem kɨkdamaŋ. Kɨŋapno gen morap kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji do mandawit uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Ae Aisaia yo kɨsi da yaŋ yagɨt: “Jesi da kabɨkon da gugɨ kɨnda wɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ kɨlani akdɨsak. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da uŋun amɨn da paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
Amɨn morap gat yaworɨ egɨp do pi tebaisi ani. Ae telagɨsi egɨpni. Telagɨ dɨma egɨpni amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dɨma kokdaŋ.
Ji butji sigɨn pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ, ma? Nak bret 5 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 5 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
Nak Taitus jikon opjak do tebaisi iyɨko opgut, ae uŋun notnin kɨnda gat kɨsi yabekgo opgumal bɨsapmon Taitus da galaktokni yolni do pasɨlɨkon da ji paŋkɨlɨgek yo kabɨsi tɨmɨkgɨt? Uŋun dɨmasi! Taitus gat nit nandak nandaknit kaloŋɨ ae aŋpaknit kaloŋɨsi gɨn.
Aŋakwan ji dɨsi do yo madep yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudomaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tatni. Yokwi agɨt amɨn uŋun yolba kɨŋakwan ji da bɨkbɨgon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpjak.
Kɨlek taŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak uŋun do amɨn dɨma yoyɨŋek mukwa sogogon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban monji mibɨltogɨ butjap nandaŋek yutnon wɨgɨk do kurak tagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan datni da yomakon pɨŋek butni maŋakwan yutnon wɨgɨsak do iyɨgɨt.
Yoyɨŋakwan Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Yesu gen yokwi kɨnda yaŋban kaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen tebanin da amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni tagɨ kwɨnɨtjak do yosok bo dɨma?”
Abɨsok but galak madepsi nandɨsat, nido ji da aŋpak kɨlegɨsi gɨn akdaŋ yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Nin amɨn da gɨldaron akwaŋ uŋudeŋ aŋpak kɨlegɨsi baŋ aŋek egɨpneŋ. Nin jap pakbiyo madep aŋek pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ. Ae yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat, ae aŋpak ɨŋani mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat dɨma aneŋ. Ae gen emat gat, ae pɨndak galaktok gat dɨma aneŋ.
Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn gat uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit: “Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn dakon paŋdetni gat uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwa gak dakon paŋdetgoni nido jap naŋek ekwaŋ?”
Piŋkop da yo morap agɨt uŋun nin da pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Nin uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun kɨsi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Piŋkop da amɨn morap iyɨ dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Wup yomɨsak.”
Nit asi yokwi agɨmak, do kobogɨ yokwi pamak, mani on amɨn yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt.”
Jems da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Do nak yaŋ nandɨsat, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kwaŋ uŋun nin da jɨgɨ dɨma yomneŋ do nandɨsat.
Gɨldat da wɨsak tetgɨn ae pɨgɨsak tetgɨn mɨŋat amɨn morap ekwaŋ kɨsi da Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Dat nak gagon egapbo gak nagon egɨsal yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kabɨ da but kaloŋsi egɨpni do bɨsit asat. Uŋun amɨn nit gat egapno mɨktɨm amɨn da asi gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandaba bamɨsi asak dosi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi bupmɨni yolɨk do nandagɨt, do yum pɨndagakwan amɨn kɨsi geni kɨrɨŋɨgek dam tebanon egɨpgwit.
Meŋi datniyo kaŋ wɨrɨpdagek meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, gak nido yaŋ aŋaki wusamak? Datgo gat nit gak do nandaba kɨk aŋek wusamak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, on akgaŋ kabɨkon dɨ dɨma kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni tapmɨmɨ toŋsi apban kokdaŋ.”
Yawe da iyɨ yo uŋun aban nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.
Tap wakga dakon kɨla amɨn pi madepsi aŋakwa Krit dakon tap kɨdɨpmɨŋ naŋ yolek kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨŋ don kokup kɨnda mani Tap Waga Tamo Tagɨsi uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Kokup uŋun kokup pap Lasia da kapmatjok tosok.
Uŋun kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala. Ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda Jems gat Josep gat dakon meŋi. Ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot uŋun dakon meŋi kɨsi akgwit.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨm, ‘Rom amɨn ninon gen teban kɨnda yaŋ tosok. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda gen yaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, amɨn uŋun da geni yaŋ ɨmjak amɨn da ɨŋamon agek gen yaŋ ɨban kobogɨ tagɨ yosak. Yaŋ aban asi yo yokwi kɨnda agɨt kaŋ, kobogɨ do yo yokwi tagɨ aŋ ɨmɨmɨ. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, Rom nin dakon gen teban yapmaŋgaŋ.’
Niniwe amɨn Jona da Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋban but tobɨl awit. Mani ji da binapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋun da Jona yapmaŋ mudosok, mani ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Niniwe amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.
Mani yo morap tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨgakwa wɨgɨ nak da opbeŋ dakon bɨsap asak.
Mani Piŋkop, gak da amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ amɨn gat, ae top yoŋ amɨn gat wɨrɨrɨkbɨ kɨmakbi kokupgwan pɨgek pasɨl mudokdaŋ. Kɨmot bɨsapni taŋakwa yawi kalɨk da tepmɨ kɨmotdaŋ. Mani egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ gabeŋ.
Pailat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat, ae amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoban opba
Kɨlɨ nak Piŋkop aŋkɨsisat. Tapmɨmni madepsi, do kɨlasi aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. Uŋun da tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depban iyɨ gat tɨlɨmnikon egek gulusuŋji mɨni ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi taŋ damdɨsak.
Wɨsa dagokdo obip amɨn da Pita wɨsɨŋba mudaŋban but morap aŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Pita dukwan kɨk?”
Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but kaloŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi, ae burɨ tagɨsi akdaŋ.
Mani ji nin paŋpulugaŋek bɨsit aba Piŋkop da amɨn morapmɨ dakon bɨsitni nandaŋek nin paŋpulugosak. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop da ninon paŋpulugok asak uŋun kaŋek ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Datnokon dɨma wɨgɨt, do nak dɨma abɨdoki. Kɨŋ notno kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨki, ‘Nak Datno ae ji dakon Datji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ. Piŋkopno ae ji dakon Piŋkopji uŋudon wɨgɨkeŋ.’ ”
Yaŋba Pailat da yagɨt, “Yum koni. Gen kɨlɨ mandat uŋun dagɨn tosak.”
Abɨsok nak amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ at, ae kuluno madepsi kwaŋ, do Piŋkop nak dɨma nepmaŋ dekgi. Nak gat egaki gak dakon tapmɨm madepgo do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo altaŋ altaŋ ani uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋyomɨŋ yomɨŋ abeŋ.
Not kabɨ, nin Esia provinskon jɨgɨ pagɨmaŋ uŋun ji da nandani do nandamaŋ. Jɨgɨ madepsi da nin pabɨŋ nipmaŋek uŋun da tapmɨmnin pabɨgɨt. Aban nin kɨmotdamaŋ yaŋsi nandagɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ kaŋek tɨp kɨnamgwan pɨgɨ wɨli gɨmoŋɨ kɨnda kawit. Uŋun ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kwakwagɨ dubagɨ kɨnda pabi da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kawit. Kaŋek wurɨpdagek pasalgwit.
Yawe, gengo uŋun guramɨk kɨmokdot. Aŋkutnaŋaki mayaktok dɨma pakeŋ.
Gɨptɨmji uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon telagɨ yut madepni, ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Piŋkop Wupni kɨlɨ damgut, uŋun ji da butgwan egɨsak. Gak gaga dogɨn dɨma egɨsal.
Telagɨ papiakon Isip dakon kɨla amɨn madep Pero Piŋkop da yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Nak da jɨgɨ madepsi gabo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo da tapmɨmno kaŋek man madep namni yaŋ do aŋek nak da kɨla amɨn madep man gamgum.”
Yaŋban kɨla amɨni gen uŋun nandaŋ kɨŋ mibɨltok amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ma, on amɨn Rom amɨn kɨnda. Gak niaŋsi akdɨsal?”
Piŋkop da Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨlani abi do gamgut, uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi aŋ kɨmokgi. Telagɨ Wup nin da butgwan yɨkdak uŋun da gak pi uŋun do tagɨ aŋpulugosak.
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Nak eno mɨni.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kalɨp amɨn paŋ kwɨnɨt abɨ kosirɨ 5 agɨt, da abɨsok amɨn yɨkgamal uŋun ego dɨma. Gak eno mɨni yaŋ bamɨsi yosol.”
Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn da yabekgwit’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da nindapdaŋ.”
Amɨn jap do aŋ uŋun yo tagɨsi morapmɨ yomɨŋakwan burɨ tugoŋ. Aŋek amɨn yoni morapmɨ uŋun yolban yoni mɨni da kwaŋ.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, mɨktɨm uŋun yokwi tokdɨsak. Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda da pudaŋ kɨŋek emat wamni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tagɨ dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak uŋun amɨn dakon paŋdetni, mani nin Moses dakon paŋdetni ekwamaŋ.
Yaŋdo, nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨm do nandɨsak kaŋ, bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda aban but teban asak do nandɨsak kaŋ, galaktokni yolek aban but teban asak.
Kɨŋ donki meŋi gat monji gat paŋabɨŋ ɨmalni donki bamot da kwenikon yopmaŋakwal Yesu pawɨgɨ uŋudon yɨkgɨt.
Gen yosot uŋun ji da dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Nido geno abɨdok do dɨma nandaŋ.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi 2 uŋun da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ madep madep baŋ agɨt. Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda agɨt uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn da dabɨlon wasok aban kɨndap si soŋek Kwen Kokup yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨmon pɨwit.
Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨsak uŋun yaŋ: nandak nandak yokwi, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, yo kabo, amɨn dapdap,
Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat, ae wup gat, ae tapmɨmgo gat, ae nandak nandakgo gat kɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi.’
Yaŋ aŋaki nak kap yaŋek Piŋkop dakon man awɨgɨkdɨsat. Aŋek ya yaŋ iyɨŋek man madepni do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo yutjikon dɨma aŋkɨ nepgwit, ae ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal dɨma namgwit, ae sot agɨm ae dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨm bɨsapmon kɨlano dɨma awit.’
Kaŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm: Moses da gen tebanon, ae kombɨ amɨn da genon, ae Kap Papiakon nak do gen mandabi da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ altaŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun dakon amɨn yaŋ yoyɨni, “Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Uŋun da mɨktɨm daman aŋteban aban wayɨŋ dɨma asak. Yawe da don gen kokwin pi kɨlegɨsi aŋek amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin akdɨsak.”
Nandak nandakni tagɨsi amɨn mɨni. Kɨnda da Piŋkop wɨsɨŋ kok do pi dɨma asak.
Sabat kɨndakon Yesu jap nok do Parisi amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda da yutnon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan yɨpba kɨk aŋek kaŋ yɨkgwit,
Nido, Piŋkop Adam naŋ mibɨltok wasaŋek buŋon Ip wasagɨt.
Piŋkop, nak mɨŋat amɨnyo da mango madepsi awɨgɨni do nandɨsat. Tɨlɨmgo yɨpbɨ noman taŋakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨktɨm morap kɨsikon ekwaŋ uŋun da koni.
Yoyɨŋban yaŋ yawit, “Nin Yesu Nasaret amɨn naŋ wɨsamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun mani.” Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas uŋun amɨn kabɨ gat kɨsi akgwit.
Uŋun da abɨŋ amɨn kɨsisi geni nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek teŋteŋɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen yagɨt.
Yawe, gak nak do tagɨsi nandaŋek aŋpulugagɨl bɨsapmon ɨleŋ kɨnda da yaŋ tebaisi akgɨm. Mani manji namgul bɨsapmon uŋudon yokwi tagɨm.
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun mɨŋat eyo aŋek ekwaŋ.
Amɨn gɨptɨmɨ pap tosak bo ae uŋudon gɨn maŋ pagek kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit. Mani bɨsap dubagɨ egɨ kaŋba Pol da gɨptɨmon yo kɨnda dɨma altaŋ ɨmgut yaŋ kaŋek nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yawit, “On amɨn uŋun piŋkop kɨnda.”
Yaŋban Pestus uŋun Juda amɨn da but galak nandaŋ ɨmni do aŋek Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Jerusalem wɨgɨ nak da ɨŋamon agaki gen on yaŋ gameŋ uŋudon nandakeŋ do tagɨ nandɨsal?”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek ae amɨn kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Mani amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golbeŋ.”
Do nin abɨsok on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Ae Moses dakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Ae on mɨktɨm dakon gen yogok amɨn tagɨsi do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Piŋkop da on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi morap paŋupbal aban nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen gɨn aŋ mudawit.
Ae amɨn morap da yo kabɨgo yobi do gayɨŋba kaŋ yobi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yogo kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨsak kaŋ, aŋtobɨl gamjak do tebai dɨma iyɨki.
Mani yo yokwi aŋ yomni amɨn nak da don kobogɨ yokwi aŋ yobeŋ. Yaŋ aŋapbo yawi dɨwatgo da mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋek obɨŋ on mɨktɨmon nak gawak namni.’
Nak dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun gak dakon. Ae gak dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun nak dakon. Amɨn da nak dakon amɨn kabɨno pɨndagek tɨlɨmno kaŋek man madep namaŋ.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da kaŋek tamtam yaŋ ɨmgwit.
Amɨn da Jon dakon gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
Pɨndagakwan gen kɨnda da yaŋ noman taŋban nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Pita, gak pɨdaŋ on dapmaŋ na.”
Nit Piŋkop Datnin, ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo, uŋun da nandaŋ yawot aŋ damɨŋek butji paŋyawot aban yaworɨ tosak do bɨsit amak.
Nido, amɨn dakon butjap da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ dɨma aŋalon asak.
Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon but paŋteŋteŋ aban Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ nandakdaŋ. Aŋek gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo Israel dakon tɨlɨmni egɨpdɨsak.”
Nak uŋun amɨn tepmɨsi kɨmagakwan amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da uŋun dakon pi tamo abɨdosak dosi nandɨsat.
Piŋkopnin, gak do ɨŋtaŋ gamgumaŋ, bo ae kɨsitnin amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon piŋkopni do yopno kɨŋakwa bɨsit agɨmaŋ tam gaga nandabim. Nin da butgwan nandak nandak morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosol.
Altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Gak mɨktɨmgo ae notgo dabɨgoyo yopmaŋek mɨktɨm kɨnda nak da golɨkeŋ uŋudon kɨki.’
Nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da arɨpmon dɨma agɨpni. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon galaktok uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani.
Kɨsitnokon abɨdaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki toktogɨsi gengo do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn yoyɨgɨmal. Abal nandaŋ yomɨŋakwa donki aŋkɨgɨmal.
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Telagɨ Yut Madep amɨn da awit uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan yut ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda abeŋ. Yut uŋun amɨn kɨsit da agagɨ dakon tɨlak dɨma abeŋ.’ ”
Yo uŋun noman taŋ yomɨsak uŋun gen bamɨsi kɨnda da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Pɨŋan wandɨtdɨt aŋek tobɨl kɨŋ wandɨtdɨtni nosok.” Ae gen kɨnda yaŋ yosok, “Bɨt pakbikon pakbi kɨlɨ sosok, mani kɨŋ neŋagon ae sosok.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni.
Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ. Piŋkop da ji yaŋ dagaŋ depban Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋakwa namɨn da pulugaŋ depjak?
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat tɨlɨmni gat noman tagɨmal. Noman taŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit. Yesu Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek Jerusalem kokup papmon on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ detjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
Betsaida kokupmon kɨŋ altaŋba amɨn dɨ da amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Aŋobɨŋek Yesu da kɨsitni da wɨtjɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
Mɨktɨm wudɨp aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun yaworɨ dɨma ekwaŋ. Mani mɨktɨm dakon mibɨlɨ tebai abɨdaŋapbo tebai tosak.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe Tapmɨm Ami, yum nandaŋaki yokwi dɨ abo gak da paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ gadat aŋek jomjom aŋ amɨn da mayaktok dɨ pabam. Israel amɨn nin dakon Piŋkopnin yum nandaŋaki yokwi dɨ abo gak wɨsɨŋ gandak do pi aŋ amɨn da mayaktok dɨ pabam.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo 7 kweŋni pɨsogɨt. Aŋakwan nandaŋapbo Kwen Kokupgwan da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Piŋkop Amɨn Tagɨnin gat ae Kristoni gat, uŋun bamot mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madep dagamal. Amɨn Tagɨ da kɨla amɨn madep dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wugɨkdɨsak.”
Yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwut do nandak nandak ani. Uŋudon yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ, ae maŋut maŋut dɨma akdaŋ, ae kabo noknok da yutji tuwɨlek arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nin nandamaŋ, gɨptɨmnin kaloŋɨ mani dɨwatni morapmɨ, ae pini kaloŋɨ dɨma aŋ.
Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ kɨlɨ tɨmɨkgɨt yaŋ nandani. Uŋun nandak nandak da busuŋ kutnokji asak. Yaŋ aŋek Telagɨ Wup dakon emat agak sɨba abɨdoni, uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
Yaŋ yaŋban monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun gen teban morap guramɨk mudosot. Mani yo kɨnda gat ninaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Mani gɨldat kapbɨ gat ae gɨldat terɨ kɨnda kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Piŋkop da egɨp egɨp mɨrɨm yɨpban amɨn bamot da butgwan pukwa pɨdaŋ akgɨmal. Agakwal amɨn bamot pɨndakgwit amɨn uŋun madepsi pasalgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu aŋaŋ Piŋkop dakon telagɨ kokup papmon Jerusalem aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Aŋkɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon kwensi yɨpgut.
Uŋun Juda amɨn da Sabat bɨsap dakon yo paŋtagap ak bɨsap, ae kɨmakbi tamo uŋun kapmatjok tagɨt, do amɨn bamot Yesu dakon bumjotni aŋkɨ uŋungwan yɨpgumal.
Maria kɨmakbi tamo da waŋga agek kunam takgɨt. Kunam tagek tagek pagadaŋek kɨmakbi tamogwan wɨsɨgɨt.
Ais bɨsapmon tap wakga uŋun tamokon tagɨ dɨma paŋkɨ akgaŋ. Do amɨn morapmɨ da but kaloŋ aŋek yum Piniks kokup papmon paŋkɨ egɨp do aŋkɨlɨk koneŋ yaŋ nandawit. Uŋudon ais bɨsapmon tagɨ egɨpneŋ yaŋ nandawit. Piniks uŋun Krit mɨktɨmon saut tet do tosok, ae uŋudon da gɨldat pɨgɨsak tetgɨn do noman tagɨ kokogɨ. Piniks uŋun Krit dakon tap wakga paŋkɨ akgaŋ tamo kɨnda. Uŋudon mɨrɨm madep dɨma asak.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek amɨn uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋek kɨ. Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek gɨptɨmgo kɨlek tak.”
Jap yet kwaokdak amɨn gat ae pakbi yomɨsak amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi bamot Piŋkop dakon pi naŋgɨn amal. Do kɨsi bamot pi agɨmal da arɨpmon tomni tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdamal.
Uŋun kalɨp mɨktɨm yumaŋ naŋek iyɨ do tɨmɨkgwit, mani kɨmakbi kokup da kokupsini aban uŋudon dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdaŋ.
Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma potni, ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ tagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma potni.
Abraham aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn aŋek uŋun kosiron da kɨlegɨ man pagɨt tam iyɨ mani tagɨ awɨkwan. Mani Piŋkop da dabɨlon uŋun kosiron da kɨlegɨ man dɨma pagɨt.
Ji da jɨgɨ madepsi paŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨsi egɨpni yaŋon da dɨma yosot. Nin kɨsi tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn egɨpneŋ do nandɨsat.
Asi, Yawe do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Paŋkutnosak do Yawekon kwaŋ, do amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨgakwan tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
“Mani Samaria amɨn kɨnda da uŋun kositnaŋ obɨŋ amɨn uŋun kaŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.
Yawe da yaŋban mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan tap pakbi da madepsi tamalɨkgwit.
Mani amɨn pasalek duwalɨk pukwaŋ, ae nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ, ae aŋpak yokwisi morapmɨ aŋ, ae amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ amɨn, ae amɨn yumabi aŋ, ae sot mawomyo aŋek yo tapmɨmɨ toŋ pawɨlgaŋ amɨn, ae kokup kɨdat do gawak yomaŋ amɨn, ae amɨn morap top yoŋ, uŋun iyɨ da kokupmon pɨgɨkdaŋ. Uŋun pakbi ɨdap kɨndap tepmɨni madepsi salfa tɨp da sosoŋ uŋun. Uŋun amɨn kɨmot kosirɨ kɨnda gat aŋ uŋun dakon tamoni.”
Yawe, pɨdoki! Uwalno da nagon emat tebaisi aŋ. Uŋun butjap nandaŋ yomɨŋek yo yokwisi aŋ yobi. Piŋkopno, aŋpak kɨlegɨ dogɨn galak tosol, do abɨŋek aŋpulugoki.
Aŋek Jon dakon paŋdetni da kɨŋ Jon yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn uŋun Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda gak gat egek mibɨlni yaŋbɨ nandagɨmaŋ, abɨsok amɨn kɨsisi da uŋun amɨnon kwa telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsak.”
Mani Piŋkop da nak kɨlɨ nandaŋ namgut. Asisi, tekno nandaŋek bɨsitno kɨlɨ nandagɨt.
‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Mibɨltok ji da Taitus dakon but aŋteban aba uŋun da ninon abɨŋ ji da aŋpak tagɨsi awit uŋun do niyɨŋban uŋun kɨsi da butnin paŋteban agɨt. Ae ji da nak nandak do madepsi galak toŋ, ae yokwi awit do bupmɨsi nandaŋ, ae nak aŋpulugok do madepsi galak toŋ, uŋunyo kɨsi do Taitus da niyɨgɨt. Niyɨŋban kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da butno tugagɨt.
Telagɨ ɨmal yut gat yo morapni gat uŋun yo Kwen Kokup toŋ dakon wupmɨ gɨn. Uŋun yo daŋgwi toŋ dakon yawini tɨmɨgek uŋudon tagalba Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni awit. Mani, yo Kwen Kokup nani paŋtelak ak do paret wagɨl tagɨsi yo daŋgwi toŋ yapmaŋdak uŋun baŋ awit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam dɨma telak taŋbam. Do uŋun agagɨsi awit.
Gen dayɨgɨm uŋun da ji kɨlɨ sugaŋ paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Nak Piŋkop do nandak nandak aŋek iyoŋ iyoŋ yosot. Nandak nandak aŋegek butno jɨk tosok.
Ji do nandɨsat bɨsap morapmon Piŋkopno ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Yaŋ yawit mani Sol dakon gen yogokni dakon tapmɨm saŋbeŋek madepsi tagagɨt. Aŋakwan Juda amɨn Damaskus egɨpgwit uŋun yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek asisi Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. Yaŋ yaŋban gen kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ kawit.
Uŋun dɨmasi! Nin kɨmakbi yombem do yokwi dakon yaŋ ɨlɨt arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋek yolyolɨ. Do niaŋon da yokwi sigɨn aneŋ?
Yo tagɨsi do galak tosot uŋun arɨpnokonsi namɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan nak aeno amɨn kalugɨ dagaŋek sɨŋgɨŋ da yaŋ tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨsat.
Yesu kɨmoron da pɨdaŋ paŋdet kabɨnikon on altaŋ yomgut uŋun da aban kosirɨ kapbɨ agɨt.
Mani ji da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Nin da kɨndap obikon saŋbeneŋ do aŋek kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun Piŋkop da paŋsanɨkgɨt.”
Aŋwa Yapyap Bɨlak do nandaŋek jap paŋkosit ak bɨsap, gɨldat binap 12 kilok agɨt. Pailat da Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, kɨla amɨn madepji oni.”
“Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ mɨni da kɨmagakwan mɨŋatni ɨsal egɨpjak kaŋ, padɨge da paŋakwan monjɨ paŋalasak.’
Do mɨŋatjok sakwabat egɨpni uŋun amɨn paŋek monjɨ paŋalaŋek yutni kɨla ani do nandɨsat. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, uwal da aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun kaŋek gen yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ ɨmni.
Pɨgɨ uŋun kalbi Pol da burɨ pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋakwan Masadonia amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak tap pɨdaŋek Masadonia mɨktɨmon obɨŋ nin paŋpulugoki.”
Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandakji paŋtagap aban Piŋkop da amɨn do but dasi galak tosok aŋpak gat, ae Kristo da tebaisi agek jɨgɨ pagɨt uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaba pɨsosak dosi nandamaŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, gak wɨli gɨmoŋɨ paŋteban abɨ uŋunyo kɨsi nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni dakon kɨla tagɨsi ani.
Egɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋdet 72 gat manjɨgɨt. Aŋek iyɨ kokup dukwan dukwan kɨk do agɨt, uŋudon mibɨltok uŋun da kalɨp kɨni do bamot bamot yabekgɨt.
Oman amɨngo gat saŋbek saŋbek agɨmal uŋun paŋdagagɨl. Gak da kɨla amɨn madep pelɨtni mabɨ mɨktɨmon maŋek yo ɨsalɨ agɨt.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: Kristo uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon yawi dɨwat kabɨkon da altosak. Uŋun kalɨp Dewit da egɨpgut kokup Betlehem uŋudon altokdɨsak.”
Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
