Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nak ji do nandaba kɨk aŋek Timoti yabekgo ji dakon nandaŋ gadat pɨndat do opgut. Paŋkewal Amɨn da ji paŋkewalban maŋakwa pi agɨmaŋ uŋun ɨsalɨ asak yaŋ do pasalgɨm.
Yaŋ aba kɨnda gat yabekban kwan madepsi aŋagek maba wain pi da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt.
Bulmakau joŋ nosok dakon wupmɨ kɨnda gawak ɨmgwit. Uŋun aŋpak aŋek Piŋkopni tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi abɨŋ yɨpgwit.
Mani dɨma. Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ mukwa uŋun soŋek yokwini do sigɨn nandaŋ,
Nak kalɨp gen yagɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak Kristo dɨma. Piŋkop da nak yabekban mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek abɨsat.’
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da nak abɨŋ nep do nandaŋ kokwin aŋ uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jamba but amɨn ji nak nido aŋkewalgaŋ?
Nak yaŋsi nandɨsat, Piŋkop uŋun paŋpulugokno, do bɨsit aŋ ɨbeŋ bɨsapmon uŋun da uwalno yolban kɨŋ mudokdaŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt. Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdagɨt da gwak teban akdak. Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da iyɨ aban nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’
Kɨlɨ Yesu pakbi ɨdap yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋ kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgek yabekbini dagoni do nandagɨt amɨn yoyɨŋban iyɨkon abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Uŋun telagɨ yutnikon Saion kokup papmon egɨsak. Uŋun da gak aŋpulugaŋek aŋteban asak dosi nandɨsat.
But yokwi morapmɨ yokwi pakpak amɨnon noman toŋ. Mani Yawe si nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da nandɨsak, bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn yokwi pasɨl mudokdaŋ, do Yawe da jɨkgo yanjaŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋ nandaŋek tap pakbi ɨlarɨ bo ae kwen yaŋ kok do tɨlak yɨpba pɨgɨ 40 mita abɨdagɨt. Yaŋ kaŋek ae tɨmɨsok dɨ gat kɨŋ tɨlak aeni yɨpba pɨgɨ 30 mita abɨdagɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda uŋun aŋpak yolek Kristo dakon pi asak, uŋun Piŋkop da kaŋban tagɨsi aŋakwan amɨn da nandaba wukwan ɨmdaŋ.
Aŋek samɨni kabɨ bɨkbɨk ninon ekwaŋ. Yo morap uŋun dukon tɨmɨkgɨt?”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da nak do ae Gen Bin Tagɨsi do nandaŋek yutni, peni padɨk padɨkyo, sami, meŋi, datni, mɨŋat monjɨyoni, ae mɨktɨmni yopmaŋ detjak kaŋ,
Amɨn yokwi da amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon mɨktɨm toktogɨ kɨlani dɨma ani. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, amɨn kɨlegɨ yokwi akdaŋ.
Gak do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abeŋ. Piŋkop Wukwisi, mango awɨgɨk do kap yokeŋ.
Aŋakwan don paŋdetni iyɨ gɨn obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin nido koŋ uŋun yol do aŋtɨdok amaŋ?”
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da yo tagɨ don noman toni do yagɨt. Yaŋ teban tok uŋun Piŋkop da Abraham gat monji gat do aŋ yomgut. Piŋkop gen papia da “gak dakon gwakgo do” yaŋ dɨma yosok. Monjɨ morapmɨ do dɨma yosok. Kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn yaŋek yaŋ yosok: “Gak dakon monjɨ do.” Uŋun Monjɨ uŋun Kristo.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Notgo do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek uwalgo do nandabɨ yokwi toni.’
Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Yum kaŋba koneŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ aŋpulugaŋban koneŋ bo dɨma?”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
Kɨŋ Samaria dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Sika uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨt. Sika uŋun da kapmatjok mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tosok, uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm kalɨpsigwan Jekop da monji Josep do ɨmgut.
Kɨlɨ ae Sipsip Monɨŋ da kendol pakbi baŋ papia aŋteban abi 3 uŋun pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 3 uŋun da yagɨt, “Gak op.” Yaŋakwan os pɨlisi kɨnda kagɨm. Uŋun da kwenon amɨn kɨnda yɨkgɨt, uŋun jap kokwin agak yo kɨnda kɨsirɨkon abɨdagɨt.
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ da Telagɨ Yut Madep kaŋek yawit, “Amɨn da tɨp kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi gat, ae yo dɨwarɨ yo kɨldani tagɨsi Piŋkop do paret awit uŋun baŋ aŋtɨlɨm awit.” Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt,
Agripa da Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨkbɨk gabo gaga do gen ya.” Iyɨŋban mɨrak yopni do Pol kɨsirɨ aŋenagek iyɨ kutnok do gen yaŋ yagɨt,
Kabo noknok bamorɨ Yesu gat kɨsi dapgwit. Kɨnda amɨnsi tetdo, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do tɨlak kɨndapmon dapmaŋ dapmaŋ awit.
Yesu gɨldat dɨ egɨ aeni Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋek yutnikon wɨgakwan kokup amɨn da abapni dakon gen nandawit.
Yaŋdo, nin Amɨn Tagɨ do pasolgomaŋ, do mɨŋat amɨnyo nandak nandak kulabɨk aŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do pi tebai amaŋ. Piŋkop da nin dakon but pɨndakdak. Ae jiyo kɨsi butjikon da nin pi kɨlegɨsi amaŋ yaŋ nandani do nandɨsat.
Dɨwarɨ da kokup dubagɨkon da apgwit, do yabekgo kɨni kaŋ, kosiron jap do aŋek dabɨlɨ upbal taŋba maŋ potdaŋ.”
Tap Gami tebai iyɨŋban mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨm dagagɨt, do amɨn da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak mɨŋat amɨnyo mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek tap ɨdap pudaŋek paŋpaŋ kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, uŋun da tɨlagon uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit.”
Nak Dat dakon pi dɨma asat kaŋ, geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nipmaŋ dekgɨl? Iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋapbo nido dubagɨkon egek jɨgɨkon naŋ dɨma aŋpulugosol?
Aŋakwa amɨn da Yesu gat paŋdetni gat dɨma ekwaŋ yaŋ pɨndakgwit, do bot tɨmɨgek Kapaneam kokupmon Yesu wɨsɨŋ kok do kɨwit.
Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen kɨnda! Gak jap yet kwaokdal uŋun mibɨltok kɨmot aŋek don kwosok.
Mɨktɨm galegɨ ae kabap mɨktɨm kɨsi uŋun iyɨ dakon.
Aŋpak aŋ uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma nandaŋ. Yokwi ak do mibɨlɨsigwan pɨgek aŋ, ae aŋpak ɨŋani mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do burɨ pɨdoŋ.
Gen bin tagɨsi ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨmasi tosok. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da ji dakon nandak nandak paŋduŋgam aŋek Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi kulabɨk aŋek aŋtasɨk aŋ.
Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do ji da dɨma manjɨŋ nepgwit. Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do manjɨgɨm. Aŋek ji kɨŋ pi aba bamɨ dɨma yokwi taŋek toktogɨ toni do manjɨgɨm. Do nak da manon yo nido bɨsit ani uŋun Dat da tagɨ damjak.
Aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da silwa moneŋ uŋun tɨmɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Moneŋ on yawi dakon tomni. Do telagɨ yut dakon moneŋ gat kɨsi yopneŋ kaŋ, gen tebanin yapdamaŋ.”
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋudon opba paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yawe da saŋbek saŋbekni ae gen tebani yolgaŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek dɨma yopmaŋ dekdak.
Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma taŋban kaŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yaŋ niyɨmal, ‘Nin kɨŋ dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋapno aŋelo da yaŋ niyeŋ “Uŋun kalugɨ egɨsak.” ’
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn notni dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Amɨn uŋun dakon wupni butnigwan yɨkdak uŋun dagɨn pɨndakdak. Yaŋgɨn, amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Piŋkop iyɨ dakon Wupni da iyɨ gɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo asak.
Yo morap akdɨsat uŋun uwal da paŋupbal ak do pi aŋ. Toktogɨsi nak aŋupbal ak do kosit wusɨk aŋ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋdet aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesukon abɨŋ
Aŋakwan amɨn dakon tek yombem kɨnda nandaŋapbo yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 4 kabɨkon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda gɨldat daman kɨnda dakon pi asak dakon tomni tɨmɨtjak uŋun wit yɨgɨ monɨŋɨsok kɨnda gɨn abɨdosak, bo bali kwoba kapbɨ gɨn tɨmɨtjak. Mani gak olip nelak gat ae wain gat dɨma paŋtasɨk abi.”
Aŋakwan Pita da ɨlɨkban pɨdaŋakwan yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pɨdaŋ at! Nak madepgo dɨma.”
Pita yaŋ yaŋban amɨn muwuk yɨkgwit kɨsi tayaŋgok yɨgek Pol gat Banabas gat do mɨrak yopgwit. Mɨrak yopmaŋakwa Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋakwan Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨmal uŋun do yoyɨgɨmal.
Piŋkop da mukwa sogok amɨn don yabekgɨt amɨn, uŋun Israel amɨn kabɨ ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon altagɨt. Ae uŋun da kabɨkon amɨn kɨnda kalɨp altakon mukwa sogok pi kɨnda dɨma agɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmonsi ni gen baŋ yoyɨni uŋun Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ detdɨsak.”
Dat da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo namɨsak uŋun da nagon apdaŋ. Amɨn morap nagon abaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yolbo kɨni.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, “Namɨn amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨkdak, uŋun manjɨkeŋ bɨsapmon, Isip ae Babilon kɨsi manjɨkeŋ. Aŋek Pilistia, Tair ae Itopia do yaŋ yokdɨsat, ‘Uŋun yo kɨsi Jerusalem amɨn gɨn.’
Gɨldatno tagɨ Ubanus do ɨmni. Uŋun pi ɨsalno Kristo dakon pi kaloŋɨ amak. Ae notnosi Stakis kɨsi do gɨldatno tagɨ ɨmni.
Ji nin gat but kaloŋ aŋek egɨpneŋ do aŋek yo kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmaŋ uŋun do dayamaŋ. Nin Dat gat ae Monji Yesu Kristo gat but kaloŋ aŋek ekwamaŋ.
Bɨsap mɨni abɨsok gɨn ekwamaŋ, do gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ ji kaloŋ kaloŋ paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do gen tagɨsi baŋ yoyɨni, aŋek burɨ paŋteban ani. Aŋpak yokwi da jikon kɨnda aŋkewalban but teban dɨ aban.
Ae uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Pilipai kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Pilipai uŋun Masadonia mɨktɨm dakon kokup pap madepni. Uŋun Rom da kɨla agɨt. Rom amɨn morapmɨ da kalɨp kɨlɨ apgwit da uŋun kokupmon ekwaŋ. Nin uŋudon gɨldat kabi dɨ egɨpgumaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani da tagɨsi nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen do but galaksi nandawit. Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdoni do manjɨŋ yopgut uŋun da nandaŋ gadat awit.
Emaron teban taŋek geno guramɨgakwan wɨgɨ bɨsap madep apjak amɨn uŋun yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbo mɨktɨm morap kɨla akdɨsak.
Yokwi da kɨmot tapmɨm ɨban amɨn tepmɨ madep yomɨsak. Ae yokwi uŋun gen tebanon tapmɨm pasak.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek dubagɨsok amɨn da tɨp maba kwaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋek bɨsit aŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨron da kombɨ amɨn morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nak Masadonia mɨktɨm naŋ kɨk do nandɨsat. Uŋunaŋ kɨŋek don jikon abɨŋ altokeŋ.
Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek madepsi pasal nɨmnɨmɨkgwit.
Iyɨŋba Yesu yaŋ yagɨt, “Jiyo kɨsi nandak nandakji mɨni aŋakwan uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Yo kɨnda amɨn kwasopgwan pɨgɨsak uŋun da amɨn dakon but arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal asak.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ kɨnda kɨla amɨn madep man paŋek tobɨl abɨŋ don amɨn kabɨni kɨla asak do kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do agɨt.
“Mani uŋun yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa amɨn da ji tɨmɨk yo yokwisi aŋdamdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon gen yaŋ damɨŋek dam tebanon depdaŋ. Ae nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat da ɨŋamon atdaŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon bret niaŋ da toŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “7 kabɨ.”
Aŋpulugaŋaki man madepni madepsi tosok. Kɨla amɨn madep dakon tɨlɨmni wagɨl tagɨsisi gak da ɨmgul.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak dasi pulugaŋ nepdɨsal yaŋ nandaŋek egɨsat. Nak monɨŋɨsogon da nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨŋ aŋaŋ wɨgɨm.
Wɨsa dagokdo Juda amɨn muwugek Pol aŋakba kɨmotjak do wagɨl yaŋ aŋteban awit. Aŋek yawit, “Jap pakbiyo dɨma aŋek Pol aŋatno kɨmagakwan don noneŋ. Yaŋ dɨma aneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da nin tagɨ nindapjak.”
Uŋun Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋudon altokdɨsak. Piŋkop uŋun aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋsi. Uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn yo morap kɨla asak. Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep morap dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madepni, ae amɨn tagɨ morap dakon Amɨn Tagɨni.
Gen uŋun bamɨ. Do gak aŋpakni paŋmɨlɨp aŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmotni do gen tebaisi yoyɨki.
Dat kabɨ, amɨn uŋun wasok wasogɨkon egɨpgut da egɨsak uŋun nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat. Wɨli gɨmoŋɨ, ji Yokwi Ami kɨlɨ abɨŋ yɨpgwit. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat.
Uŋun do aŋek Parisi amɨn da aeni iyɨwit, “Dabɨlgo niaŋsi aŋek kɨlek taŋban sɨŋtal?” Yaŋba yagɨt, “Uŋun da neŋak dabɨlnokon wɨrɨrɨkban pakbikon sugaŋek sɨŋtat da yo pɨndakdat.”
Not kabɨ, nak ji dakon nandak nandak paŋpulugok do aŋek Apolos gat nit do gen on dayɨsat. Ji nit do nandaŋek aŋpak kɨlegɨ Piŋkop gen papia da yosok uŋun gɨn yolni. Yaŋ aŋek pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋek amɨn kɨnda awɨgek ae kɨnda dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni.
“Pi monjɨni uŋun gen aŋaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨkon aŋkɨwit, mani geni nandak do kuragɨ nandaŋek iyɨ da galak togon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Kɨnda uŋun pigagani kɨgɨt, ae kɨnda moneŋ ɨlɨt pinikon kɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da tɨp baŋ nindapdaŋ.”
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan kɨla amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ Yesu burɨkon gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano ongwanjok kɨmokdok, mani gak da kɨŋ kɨsitgo da kwenikon wutjɨŋbɨ pɨdosak.”
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨldat kɨlɨ abɨk dakon gen dɨ nandani kaŋ, dɨma wɨrɨpdagek pasolni. Amɨn kɨnda da kombɨ gen yaŋek, bo ae Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek, bo ae nin da papia kɨnda mandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨ abɨk yaŋ yɨpgumaŋ yaŋ amɨn da dayɨŋba kaŋ, geni dɨma nandaŋ yomni.
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek telagɨ pakbi sosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup do amɨn asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun do tɨlak kɨnda ako mibɨlɨ nandani. Amɨn kɨnda kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek pi monjɨni yaŋ yoban opba yo kabɨni kɨla ani do yoyɨgɨt.
Uŋun kundu wɨtdalek pɨgɨt. Aŋakwan gɨkwem pɨlisi da kandapni da mibɨlgwan tawit.
Amɨn Tagɨ, gak da nak dakon galaktok teban nandɨsal. Butno da kunam yokwisi takdak, uŋun gak da dabɨlon pasɨlɨ dɨma.
Gɨldarɨ ae kalbiyo amɨn da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkopgo dukon egɨsak?” Yaŋ nayaŋ, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kunam tagegɨsat. Gɨldarɨ ae kalbiyo kunam baŋ japmɨ do naŋegɨsat.
Yesu da amɨn 12 kabɨ uŋun yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon bo ae Samaria amɨn da kokupmon dɨma kɨni.
Nak Yawe yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “Gak Amɨn Tagɨno. Yo tagɨsi morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun gak da kɨsiron dagɨn abaŋ.”
Piŋkop Yawe Tapmɨm Ami, bɨsitno nandaki. Jekop dakon Piŋkop, mɨrak pak yaŋsi yopmaŋek geno nandaki.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Tipina gat ae Tiposa gat do yomni. Uŋun mɨŋat bamot Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi madepsi amal. Gɨldatno tagɨ notnosi Pesis do ɨmni. Uŋun mɨŋatyo kɨsi da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi madepsi agɨt.
Nin telagɨ egɨpneŋdo, kalɨpsigwan mɨktɨm Piŋkop da dɨma wasaŋban noman taŋakwan Yesu gat gadat gadat aneŋ do kɨlɨsi manjɨgɨt. Telagɨsi egek Piŋkop da dabɨlon mɨŋat amɨnyo gulusuŋni mɨni da egɨpneŋ do agɨt.
Nin monjinin wɨli kɨndap da yaŋ tebaisi tagoni do nandamaŋ. Ae gwanin da kɨla amɨn madep dakon yut dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi da egɨpni do nandamaŋ.
Uŋun yoyɨŋdet toptopmɨ pakbi dabɨl da yaŋ wagɨl kɨbɨdaŋ mudaŋ, ae gɨkwem madepsi baŋ mɨrɨm da pɨsoŋban dukwan dukwan kwaŋ uŋun yombem. Uŋun Piŋkop da kokup pɨlɨn tuk pɨlisi uŋun kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt, do uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpdaŋ.
Aŋakwal Simeon da gɨsam yomɨŋek Monjɨ dakon meŋi Maria yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, Israel amɨn morapmɨ da on Monjɨ do aŋek maŋ potdaŋ, ae morapmɨ da pɨdokdaŋ. But tobɨl ani do Piŋkop da yabekgɨt, mani yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmdaŋ.
Nido yo morap Piŋkop da wasagɨt uŋun da Piŋkop da gwakni nomansi paŋteŋteŋ akdɨsak dakon bɨsap tepmɨ noman taŋban yaŋ do aŋtep aŋ.
“Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon yaŋ gaban kɨki kaŋ, tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon dɨma yɨkgi. Tamo uŋun amɨn madep kɨnda gak gwapmaŋdak uŋun do manjɨkbi naŋ dɨ yɨkbɨm.
Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum, mani Israel amɨn kabɨ da uŋun amɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨŋek apgum.”
Piŋkop mɨktɨm dɨma wasagɨt bɨsapmon, Kristo da ji yumaŋ nosak do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, ae abɨsok mibɨ bɨsap on ekwamaŋon, Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosak do Kristo yɨpban kɨlɨ altaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Yesu Betani kokupmon altaŋek Lasarus uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt da gɨldat 4 kabɨ kɨmakbi tamogwan tosok yaŋ nandagɨt.
“Nak naga wain obi ae ji kɨlɨŋno morap. Amɨn kɨnda nagon saŋbeŋban nak uŋun amɨnon saŋbekeŋ kaŋ, bamɨ morapmɨ tokdɨsak. Ji nak nipmaŋ degek yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Kɨlɨ Yesu Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek Saidon kokup kɨŋ yapmaŋek Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋun kɨsi yapmaŋek Galili Pakbi Ɨdap uŋudon kɨgɨt.
Yawe dakon aŋelo da Yawe do pasal ɨmaŋ amɨn da kapmatjok egek yokwikon baŋ paŋpulugosok.
Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨno, do yo kɨnda do wadak wadak dɨma asat.
Yaŋ aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek pi asak uŋun koni.’ ”
Yokwi pakpak mɨŋat amɨnyo ji nepmaŋ dekgɨt. Piŋkopno dakon gen teban guramɨt do nandɨsat.
Mani egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨnikon kɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni uŋun gɨtnisi, uŋudon kɨgɨk dakon pini jɨgɨsi. Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dagɨn wigat uŋun kaŋ kwoŋ.”
Do gen teban yolek uŋun kosiron da nin amɨn kɨlegɨ dɨma amaŋ. Pi kɨnda aŋek dɨma, nandaŋ gadat kosiron dagɨn amɨn kɨlegɨ amaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ do dɨma nandaban wɨgɨsak.
Nak aeno kaŋapbo ae aŋelo kɨnda kwen binap kwan kagɨm. Uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi dagok dagogɨ mɨni amɨn mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋosak do yabekbi. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap, ae geni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yoŋ, ae gɨptɨm kɨldani mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun kɨsi do yabekbi.
“Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ yosok, ‘Saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ nak da don uŋun gat abeŋ uŋun yaŋ. Nak da gen tebano butnikon yopdɨsat, aŋek gen teban dakon geni nandak nandaknikon mandakdɨsat.’ ”
Amɨn kabɨ madepsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gɨldat da si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn do meŋi wamaŋdak yaŋ pɨndagek ‘Sɨkak mokdɨsak’ yaŋ yaŋakwa asi sɨkak mosok.
Yaŋakwa amɨn madep uŋun da bɨkbɨgon Parisi amɨn dɨ akgwit uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, paŋdetgoni kɨrɨŋɨk yom.”
Aŋkɨ wasaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yawit, “On amɨn da Israel amɨn kabɨ nin paŋupbal aŋek nin da Sisa do takis dɨma ɨmneŋ do yosok. Ae iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, nak Kristo yaŋ yosok.”
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ tɨlɨmni gat ae yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn, uŋun kɨmoron da mibɨltaŋ pɨdagɨt. Ae uŋun kɨla amɨn madep morap mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon Amɨn Tagɨni. Uŋun kɨsi da but yawot nandaŋ damaŋakwan butji yaworɨ tosak. Yesu da nin but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae iyɨ dakon yawi da yokwinin wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt.
(Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn da don Telagɨ Wup abɨdoni do gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu man madep dɨma pagɨt, do Telagɨ Wup dɨma yobi.)
Juda amɨn nin da mibɨltok butnin Kristokon yɨpmaŋek yolgɨmaŋ. Ae nin da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsineŋ do nin manjɨgɨt.
Mani Monji do yaŋ yagɨt: “Piŋkop, gak kɨla amɨn madep toktok teban egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsal. Gak da aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kabɨgo kɨlani akdɨsal.
Gen pikon nepgwit dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Piŋkop da babɨknin do yo ak do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun asi altokdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ teban tosot.
Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak da pino ani do yabekgɨm bɨsapmon, moneŋ sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋ, ae yɨk madep, ae kandap gwɨlyo dɨma tɨmɨkgwit. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji yo kabɨ do wadak wadak awit bo dɨma?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban iyɨwit, “Dɨma.”
Nin Piŋkop gat uwal sigɨn egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkop dakon Monji da kɨmagek uwal uwal tagɨt uŋun mosak dakon pi aŋek paŋmuwukban Piŋkop gat but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ. Yaŋ agɨt do yaŋsi nandamaŋ, abɨsok Monji kalugɨ egɨsak do aŋek Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Aŋelo 6 kweŋni pɨsoŋakwan gen kɨnda noman taŋban nandagɨm. Alta gol baŋ wasaŋbi, Piŋkop da ɨŋamon tosok, uŋun dakon kodɨgɨ 4 kabɨkon jom 4 kabɨ tawit uŋudon da yagɨt.
Nak Pol da naga gɨldat tagɨ on mandɨsat.
Uwal da jɨgɨ morapmɨ yomɨŋakwa uŋun dakon tapmɨm da yoŋgamgwan egɨpgwit.
‘Piŋkop da uwalnin gat ae amɨn morap nin do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ nimaŋ amɨn da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nipdɨsak.’
Ae yo kɨnda tap ɨdap madep yombem kagɨm. Uŋun tap ɨdapmon glas gat kɨndap gat ɨktagɨlbi. Tap ɨdap glas yombem uŋun da kɨdɨpmɨŋon amɨn morapmɨ akgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ emaron teban taŋek joŋ kɨlap yokwisi gat ae wupni gat ae mani dakon nambani abɨŋ yɨpgwit amɨn. Uŋun gita Piŋkop da yomgut uŋun tɨmɨkgwit.
Ais madep yopban tɨp da yaŋ mɨktɨmon moŋ. Aŋek uŋun da aba kokup mɨrɨmɨsi aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm abɨŋ yɨpmɨ mɨni.
Gɨptɨmnokon wuda toŋ dakon tabani uŋun madepsi, ae mɨktaŋbi. Nak nandaŋ kokwini mɨni amɨn da arɨpmon aŋpak gulusuŋ agɨm do aŋek uŋun noman taŋ nameŋ.
Nandak nandak abɨsok yolgaŋ, uŋun Piŋkopmon da dɨma abɨsak. Piŋkop da ji iyɨkon kɨni do yaŋ ɨlɨkdak.
Pita uŋun wawi Saimon uŋun da yutnon egɨsak. Wawi uŋun bulmakau gɨp paŋkɨlek ak amɨn kɨnda. Yutni tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon tosok.”
Gɨptɨm dɨwat kɨnda tepmɨ pasak kaŋ, gɨptɨm dɨwat kɨsi morap tepmɨ paŋ. Ae gɨptɨm dɨwat kɨnda man madep pasak kaŋ, gɨptɨm dɨwat kɨsi morap kɨsɨk kɨsɨk paŋ.
Amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun yoni tɨlɨmɨ tagɨsi toŋ gat ae man madep ɨmɨm aŋpakni kɨsi tɨmɨgek uŋudon paŋopdaŋ.
Meŋ datyoni kɨmakgwit amɨn gat ae uwalon jɨgɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ amɨn gat dakon bɨsitni nandaŋ yomdɨsal. Paŋpulugaŋaki gen pikon atni bɨsapmon teban tokdaŋ. Ae mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo da saŋbeŋek yo yokwi dɨma aŋyomdaŋ.
Amɨn bamot do papia yomgwit uŋungwan gen yaŋ mandawit, “Nin yabekbi kabɨ ae paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn, nin ji dakon notji da papia on mandamaŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Antiok ae Siria ae Silisia Provinskon ekwaŋ ji gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamaŋ.
Ae kandapgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, kandapgo mandaŋ dagoki. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kandapgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
Erot yokwi kɨnda gat sigɨn saŋbeŋ aŋek Jon dam tebanon yɨpgut.
Piŋkop da Israel amɨn yopmaŋ dekgɨt bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun tɨmɨkban iyɨ gat but kaloŋ awit. Yaŋ agɨt do Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak kaŋ, nin nandamaŋ, uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit baŋ egɨp egɨp ae yomɨsak yaŋ asak.
Mani Piŋkop but paŋteban agak amɨn da Taitus yabekban abɨŋ nin dakon but paŋteban agɨt.
“Kokup madep kɨndakon gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun Piŋkop do dɨma pasalgɨt. Ae amɨn do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ aŋakwa egɨpgut.
Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae kɨla amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ morap gat da muwugek gen kɨnda aŋteban awit. Aŋek Yesu nap teban naŋ wamaŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailat da kɨsiron aŋkɨ yɨpgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, jobɨt tagɨ tɨmɨkgeŋ.”
Uŋun da wasok aban Kedes dakon mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ uŋun wudɨp madepsi asak.
Liwai da kabɨkon nani, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Mɨŋat amɨnyo Yawe do pasolgoŋ amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Yaŋdo, nin aŋpak but kaloŋ paŋalon asak, ae aŋpak notnin tagɨ paŋteban agagɨ uŋun baŋ yolek aŋ kɨmotneŋ.
Pol gat Banabas gat Antiok egakwal amɨn dɨwarɨ Juda mɨktɨmon da pɨŋ paŋmuwukbi yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Moses dakon gen guramɨgek gɨptɨmji dɨma mandani kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da ji dɨma tɨmɨtjak.”
Kap wasok amɨnji kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uŋun da egɨp egɨp nimɨsak ae tapmɨm nimɨŋakwan kosit akwamaŋ.’ Ae kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Ninyo kɨsi uŋun dakon monjini ekwamaŋ.’
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ man madepni do yoŋ. Ae pɨlɨni pɨlɨni mibɨlni yaŋakwa nandamaŋ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon gɨldat tobɨl do aŋakwan Pita gat Jon gat bɨsit agak bɨsapmon Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨk do kɨgɨmal.
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu wit pi binap kɨnda naŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨ jɨmɨk kɨsit da mɨsɨŋɨkba gɨpmɨ maŋakwa bamɨ si nawit.
Uŋun kaloŋ gɨn tɨp madepno ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Uŋun kaloŋgɨn dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ, do uwalno da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da yaŋ mudaŋ namgut da pi asat uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, mani ji da nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Nak namɨn amɨnsi kɨnda Datno da manon pi morap asat uŋun da tagɨ dolɨsak.
Josep uŋun Pailaron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban emat amɨni yoyɨŋban bumjotni Josep do ɨmgwit.
Do gak moneŋgo abɨdaŋek kɨ. Naga da galaktogon amɨn buŋon abeŋ uŋun gat moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨkon damɨsat.
ae uŋun da nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namgwit ae jiyo kɨsi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk damgwit. Uŋuden amɨn da pi madep aŋ uŋun do but galaksi nandaŋek man madep yomni.
Mani, moneŋ morapmɨ tɨmɨt do nandaŋ amɨn, kɨlap da paron yokwalgaŋ da arɨp, paŋkewal da altaŋ yomɨŋek tɨmɨtdɨsak. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da but sulugɨk morapmɨ aŋek uŋun da obɨsi paŋɨŋtok akdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek wagɨlsi tasɨk taŋ mudokdaŋ.
Gak gen on mɨŋat amɨnyo yoyɨŋdekgi. Gak yaŋ mudaŋ gabi, do gen on guramɨtni do paŋtagap abi, ae gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun aŋpakni paŋmɨlɨp ak do gen tebaisi yoyɨki. Gak yum pɨndagaki amɨn da gengo do yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ dɨma yoni.
Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek jap nokeŋ kaŋ, mibɨlɨ nido amɨn kɨnda da gak suŋ asal yaŋ nayɨsak?
Nido kɨla amɨn madep da mɨŋat tagɨsi yaŋ gandaŋek but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsak. Uŋun amɨn tagɨgo, do man madep ɨmɨŋ kɨmokgi.
Paŋkewal morap noman toŋon jɨgɨ guramɨgek tebai akdak amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak. Nido paŋkɨlɨt morapmon tebai atjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun do egɨp egɨp dakon pelɨt tɨm tɨlɨmɨ toŋ yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt, uŋun ɨmdɨsak.
Aŋakwan aŋelo 7 kabɨ uŋun kweŋ 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgwit uŋun pɨsok do tagap tawit.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon Monji do nandaŋ gadasak uŋun Piŋkop da gen yagɨt uŋun abɨdaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak. Mani amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop da Monji do gen yagɨt uŋun nandaban bamɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop do top amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yosok.
Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn Mibɨltogɨ da altaŋ teŋteŋosak bɨsapmon tomni wagɨl tagɨsi uŋun abɨdokdaŋ. Tomni toktok teban tosak ae dɨma tasɨk togɨ uŋun naŋ abɨdokdaŋ.
Uŋun nak do kuragɨsi nandaŋek gen yokwisi nayaŋ, mani uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ mɨni.
Dewit da Israel amɨn dakon Yawe, Piŋkop tapmɨmɨ toŋ, uŋun do yaŋ teban tok kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
Kalɨp Epraim amɨn obip gobɨŋyo taŋ yomgwit, mani emat noman taŋban pasal kɨwit.
Ae Abraham uŋun gɨptɨmɨ mandabi amɨn kabɨ dakon dat yo kɨsi egɨsak. Mani amɨn gɨptɨmni mandaŋek nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ amɨn uŋun dakon datni dɨma egɨsak. Amɨn morap gɨptɨmni mandaŋek Abraham da gɨptɨmni dɨma mandaŋek nandaŋ gadat agɨt yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ gadat aŋ amɨn dakon datni egɨsak.
Do iyɨ do nandaba wɨgakwa kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ, ae nomansi amɨn dɨwarɨ dapmaŋek paŋupbal aŋ.
Yawe gak kɨlegɨsisi. Ae gen teban morapgo kɨsi kɨlegɨ gɨn.
Gak da egɨp egɨp dakon mɨrɨm yobɨ egɨp egɨp kalugɨ abɨdoŋ. Yo morap paŋkaluk aŋaki mɨktɨmon kalugɨsi toŋ.
Wain napni gat ae pik kɨndapni gat paŋupbal aŋek kɨndap dɨwarɨ dapban sulugɨ tɨmɨ morapmɨ awit.
Bo amɨn da ‘Oni obɨk’, bo ae ‘Asoni obɨk’ yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.”
Gak toktogɨsi Yesu Kristo do nandaki. Uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep Dewit da kabɨkon nani, uŋun kɨmagek aeni pɨdagɨt. Nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi on naŋ yaŋ teŋteŋosot.
Yoyɨŋ dek mudaŋek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨsok dɨ gat kɨŋek pakbi ɨlarɨkon kɨŋek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl do yɨk yopba pɨgɨni.”
Gen bin yokwi nandɨsak bɨsapmon pasol pasol dɨma asak. Yawe tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
sot amɨn da Yesu dakon paba pɨgɨk dɨwatni ɨgayɨk do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
Yoyɨŋbal kalbi binap uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn da amɨn bamot tɨmɨk paŋkɨ gɨptɨmni obip amɨn da baljaŋba dagawit uŋun pakbi baŋ sugagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek uŋudon gɨn iyɨ ae gwakni kɨsi telagɨ pakbi sowit.
Wɨsɨŋek aŋelo bamorɨ ɨmalni kwakwagɨ pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun aŋelo bamot Yesu dakon bumjotni da tagɨt uŋudon yɨkgɨmal. Kɨnda busuŋɨ da tagɨron yɨkgɨt, aŋakwan kɨnda kandapni da tagɨron yɨkgɨt.
Israel amɨn do but dasi galak taŋek dɨma yopmaŋ det do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun do sigɨn nandɨsak. Piŋkopnin da emaron teban taŋek nin yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipgut, uŋun mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun da kɨlɨ kawit.
Do butjikon da kokwin tagɨsi aŋek bret gat wain kapmon noni.
Aeni dabɨlɨ sɨŋtagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn wasok aban dabɨlgo sɨŋtak amɨn do niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋba yagɨt, “Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda.”
Gɨkwem tɨmɨ kɨnda dubagɨsi wɨgɨsak uŋudon egek gen tebani yomgut. Yoban gen teban morap Piŋkop da yomgut uŋun guramɨkgwit.
Yaŋ aŋek Yesu yut kɨndakon wɨgakwan paŋdetni da iyɨ gɨn egek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nido koŋ uŋun nin da yol do aŋtɨdok amaŋ?”
Nak yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, gak dakon gen teban do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ.
Aŋek amɨn dakon galaktok yolek amɨn uŋun kalɨp gapman gat emat wamgut, ae amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakban dam tebanon yɨpgwit, uŋun yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae galaktokni yolek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpgut.
Ae babɨkni dakon binap gen gat ae babɨkni dakon mibɨlɨ gat do dɨma yoni do tebaisi yoyɨki. Gen uŋudeŋ da gen emat paŋalon asak. Uŋun da Piŋkop dakon pi dɨma joŋɨkdak. Nandaŋ gadat aŋek Piŋkop dakon pi arɨpmɨ tagɨ aneŋ.
Amɨn da kɨsiron jap dɨ ɨsalsi dɨma tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ. Nin si yumgumaŋ. Jɨgɨ dɨma damneŋ yaŋ do gɨldarɨ ae kalbi pi tebaisi agɨmaŋ.
Gak da pi morap namgul, uŋun pi aŋ mudoko mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlɨmgo kɨlɨ kawit.
Epraim ae Benjamin ae Manase da bɨkbɨgon tapmɨm madepgo nolɨki. Abɨŋ nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi.
Ji kɨndap gelɨ yopba pɨgakwa mɨktɨmon tebai akgaŋ, ae yut da gwak tebai da kwenon tebai akgaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tebai atni. Aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn da dayɨŋ dekgwit uŋun tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmotni. Aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋ kɨmotni.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da gen yaŋban dɨma nandabo pɨsosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak do kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ namɨŋakwan nak da uŋun amɨn do kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ ɨbeŋ.
Abɨsok amɨn dɨ yabekbɨ amɨn kɨnda Jopa kokup papmon egɨsak uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋop do kɨni. Amɨn uŋun mani Saimon ae mani kɨnda Pita yaŋ iyaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgakwan paŋdetni kɨsi yolek wɨgɨwit.
Yaŋdo, on mɨktɨm gɨptɨmon ekwamaŋ, bo ae on gɨptɨm yɨpmaŋek Amɨn Tagɨkon kwamaŋ, nin bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ iyɨ aŋpak galak tosok uŋun yol do madepsi galak tomaŋ,
Sipsip Monɨŋ da kendol pakbi baŋ papia aŋteban abi 2 uŋun pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 2 uŋun da yagɨt, “Gak op.”
Yawe Piŋkop, gak da lamno yɨpbɨ teŋteŋosok, aŋek nagon pɨlɨn tuk yoldal.
Yo 4 kabɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ da kabɨkon kɨnda da ɨdap madep gol baŋ wasaŋbi 7 kabɨ aŋelo 7 kabɨ do yomgut. Piŋkop, dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ aŋaŋ kɨsak teban, uŋun dakon butjapni uŋun ɨdap madepmon tugaŋ tawit.
Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kalɨpsigwan gen mandagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Iyɨ sotnin mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ iyɨ do tɨmɨgakwan kɨlek tagɨmaŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kwen Kokup Datno yo iyɨ dɨma kwaokgɨt uŋun gelɨmbɨl pɨlɨk mudokdɨsak.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Jiyo kɨsi wain pinokon kɨŋ pi aŋakwa pi ani da arɨpmon moneŋ dabeŋ.’ Yaŋban nandaŋek wain pinikon kɨwit.
Piŋkop, gak nido toktogɨsi manji nimɨsal? Nido sipsip kabɨgo tagɨsi pawɨldal nin do butjap tebaisi nandaŋ nimɨsal?
Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋ kɨmotni. Bɨsit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do pi tebaisi aŋek Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni. Kɨla tebai aŋek uŋun aŋpak dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn morapyoni do bɨsit ani.
Nido gen morap namgul uŋun yoyɨko abɨdawit. Aŋek asi nak gagon da apgum ae gak da nak yabekgɨl, yaŋsi nandaba bamɨsi asak.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham do gɨsam ɨmgut uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Yesu Kristo da pi uŋun agɨt do aŋek uŋun gɨsam kɨlɨ abɨdaŋ. Do nin kɨsi morap Yesu do nandaŋ gadat aŋek kalɨp Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok agɨt da arɨpmon Telagɨ Wup abɨdoneŋ.
Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan tamo kɨnda Solomon Dakon Kɨŋ Ap Tamo yaŋ yawit uŋudon agɨpgut.
Yaŋban yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ gat yaŋ yomno nido apni? Iyɨ dakon gen kaga da kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋban nandamaŋ.”
Nido nak abɨŋ dandako aŋpak nak da si galak tosot uŋudeŋ aŋ amɨn dɨ dɨma ekwa pɨndakgeŋ yaŋ do nak tɨmɨsok dɨ pasoldot. Ae jiyo kɨsi da nak nandaba aŋpak ji da si galaktoŋ uŋudeŋ agak amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ dɨma dɨ egɨpbom. Nak obɨŋ dandako gen emat, ae amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok, ae butjap, ae dɨsi dogɨn nandaŋek egɨp egɨp, ae amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok, ae manji gen, ae pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋpak, ae pi paŋupbal ak aŋpak, uŋun aŋpak morap jikon taŋba pɨndakgeŋ yaŋ do pasoldot.
Namɨn da butjap madepgo dakon tapmɨm uŋun nandɨsak? Butjapgo uŋun madepsi, do amɨn da gak do pasol pasol madepsi nandani kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ asak.
“Not kabɨ, nandani. Nak ji gat egek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon gen dayɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Nak abɨsok nandɨsat, ji depmaŋ kɨŋapbo jikon da kɨnda da nak ae buŋon dɨmasi nandakdaŋ.
Nak yabekbi kabɨ mibɨltok noman tawit uŋun pɨndat do Jerusalem dɨma kɨgɨm. Dɨma, nak uŋudon gɨn Arebia mɨktɨmon kɨgɨm. Ae don Damaskus kokupmon tobɨl kɨgɨm.
Nak kaloŋgɨn ji dakon Yawe ae Piŋkopji egɨsat. Nak naga Isip mɨktɨmon baŋ ji tɨmɨk paŋopgum. Gen kagasi aŋtaŋ kɨŋakwa upmokgeŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨm, mani ji kabɨkon da kɨnda uŋun Sunduk yombem.”
Amɨn da nin da gɨptɨmon Yesu dakon kɨmot uŋudon koŋ. Do amɨn da Yesu dakon egɨp egɨpni kɨsi nin da gɨptɨmon koŋ.
Jikon amɨn dɨwarɨ nak dɨma opdɨsat yaŋ nandaŋek kwen wɨgɨk aŋ.
Yabekbi kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat ae paŋmuwukbi morap gat da iyɨkon amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakba Pol Banabas gat Antiok kɨni do yawit. Yaŋ yaŋek Judas mani kɨnda Basabas gat ae Sailas gat yaŋ manjɨwit. Uŋun amɨn paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn bamot egɨpgumal.
Mani, Amɨn Tagɨ Dakon Gɨldat uŋun kabo noknok da but pɨsoni mɨni abaŋ uŋun da tɨlak noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun gɨldaron kundukon wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋek yo morap kundukon toŋ uŋun kɨndap da soŋban wagɨl soŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun kɨsi kɨndap da soŋban saŋbeŋek dɨma tokdaŋ.
Mani, Amɨn Tagɨ da nak da ɨleŋonjok agek nak aŋteban agɨt. Do nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi arɨpmɨsi yaŋapbo Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ morap kɨsi da nandawit. Aŋapbo Piŋkop da nak laion da gen kagakon naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Yaŋ aban Yesu da datni iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap niaŋ da yaŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban datni da yagɨt, “Ŋakŋagɨkon da altaŋ ɨmgut da tosok.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
Mani Piŋkop da yabekbi nin baŋ mibɨ amɨn nipgut yaŋ nandɨsat. Nin gen pikon nipmaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap da dabɨlon ae aŋelo da dabɨlon kɨmotneŋ do yaŋ dagok aŋ nibi yombem da ekwamaŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pita, nak yaŋ gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
Laion kɨlap wɨsɨŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdoŋ. Piŋkop gak da kɨlap wɨsaŋ uŋun yomɨsal.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo wagɨl yokwisi kɨnda don Telagɨ Yut Madepmon akban kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Daniel da uŋun do kɨlɨ yagɨt.” (On gen manjɨsak amɨn uŋun da pakyaŋsi nandɨsak.)
“Not kabɨ ae dat kabɨ nandani. Nak gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm do dayɨkdɨsat.”
Amɨn Tagɨ gak aŋteban ak do gak da kapmatjok egɨsak. Butjap nandɨsak bɨsapmon kɨla amɨn madep madep gat emat wamaŋek obɨsi pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Mani amɨn mɨrakni mɨni yombem geni dɨma nandaŋ yomɨsat. Nak kadɨm yombem, do aŋtaŋ yok kɨnda dɨma asat.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi uŋun kalɨp egɨpgut da abɨsok dɨma egɨsak, uŋun kɨla amɨn madep uŋun 8. Mani kɨla amɨn madep 8 uŋun 7 kabɨ da kabɨkon nani. Uŋun wagɨl pasɨldɨsak.
Uŋun paŋkɨlɨron ji Kristo da tepmɨ pagɨt uŋudeŋ paŋ, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Ae Kristo dakon tɨlɨmni altaŋ teŋteŋosak bɨsapmon ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek butji tagɨsi tokdɨsak.
Pailat da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpban abɨdaŋ aŋkɨwit.
Moses yaŋ aŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Piŋkop da nak aŋpulugaŋban Israel amɨn uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsat yaŋ nandaŋ namdaŋ.’ Mani Israel amɨn Moses do yaŋ dɨma nandawit.
Mɨrɨm uŋun galaktokni yolek dukwan dukwan tagɨni kɨsak. Wuwɨgɨ nandamaŋ mani dukwan da abɨsak ae dukwan kɨsak uŋun dɨma kaŋ pɨsomaŋ. Amɨn morap Wupmon da altoŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn.”
Ae ni bɨsapmon sot asal yaŋ gandaŋek kɨlago agɨmaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon dam teban yutnon yɨkdal yaŋ gandaŋek abɨŋ gandagɨmaŋ?’
Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdokeŋ bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi. Bɨsit aŋek kɨsitno paŋenokgo telagɨ yutgo da tet do wɨgɨsak.
Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda uŋudon kɨgɨt. Uŋudon egakwan mɨŋat amɨn madepsi apgwit. Apba Yesu iyɨ aŋ aŋ agɨt uŋudeŋ ae Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋek gɨldat wɨsak tet da mɨrɨm yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae tapmɨm madepnikon da saut tet da mɨrɨm yɨpban kɨgɨt.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Sekaraia gat mukwa sogok amɨn notni gat Piŋkop da dabɨlon mukwa sogok pi awit.
Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji sigɨn dɨma nandaba pɨsosok, ma?”
Aŋek amɨn bamot tɨmɨgek gen pikon yop do nandawit, mani pɨlɨn tok do agɨt do aŋwa don yaŋ nandaŋek dam teban yutnon yopgwit.
Yaŋdo, aŋpak kɨnda da egɨp egɨpnokon pi tebaisi asak uŋun yaŋ. Aŋpak tagɨ ak do nandɨsat bɨsapmon yokwi da kosit sopsop aŋ namɨsak.
Uŋun da aŋ pulugaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨpgum. Tagɨsi nandaŋ namgut do aŋek nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Muwugek yaŋ nandat morapmɨsi aŋek Pita da pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji kɨlɨ nandaŋ. Piŋkop da pi kokwinɨk nimɨŋek nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon yaŋapbo nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat ani do nak kɨlɨsok manjɨgɨt.
Nak uwal paŋsopmaŋek tɨmɨkgɨm. Yo yokwisi aŋyomɨŋek wagɨl kɨsisi dapbo pasɨlgwit.
Mani dɨsi dakon man pawɨgek dɨsi pi madep akdaŋ uŋun do yoŋ. Uŋun yokwisi.
Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋ donki bɨlagɨ uŋun kosiron kagɨmal. Uŋun amɨn kɨnda da yoma kagakon gwɨlɨkba akgɨt. Napmɨ wɨtdalbal,
Mani Israel amɨn da Piŋkop Wukwisi aŋkewalek kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen tebani dɨma guramɨkgwit.
Bo pup kwap do dayɨŋban skopion kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
yaŋ yagɨt, “Nin abɨsok Jerusalem kɨŋapno amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok akdaŋ. Yaŋ dagok aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.
Gen uŋun mandabi uŋun yaŋ: “Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt” gen uŋun Abraham dogɨn dɨma mandabi.
Not kabɨ, nak ji da gen pasɨlɨ kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsosak do nandɨsat. Yaŋ kaŋ dɨsi do dɨma nandaba wɨgɨsak. Gen pasɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Israel amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da but yomani sopgut uŋun yaŋ egɨ wɨgakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ niaŋ da iyɨkon apni do tɨlak yɨpgut uŋun da arɨpmon iyɨkon apdaŋ.
Mani nandaŋ damɨsat, ji Piŋkop do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ ɨmaŋ.
Juda amɨn kabɨkon egek uŋun tɨmɨt do Juda amɨn yombem dagosot. Naga Moses dakon gen teban da yoŋgamgwan dɨma egɨsat, mani gen teban da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ amɨn uŋun tɨmɨt do aŋek uŋun amɨn gat egɨsat bɨsapmon gen teban da yoŋgamgwan yombem egɨsat.
Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknok bɨsap dɨma altaŋakwan Yesu on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandagɨt. Yesu on mɨktɨmon paŋdetni egɨpgwit uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomgut. Sigɨn yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ yomɨŋakwan wɨgɨ bɨsapni mudagɨt.
Nandak nandakno dakon yoma wɨtdalaki nawa gengokon gen wagɨl tagɨsi morap toŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ.
Gaga yagɨl uŋun da arɨpmon yo morap tawit da abɨsokyo kɨsi toŋ gɨn. Nido yo morap kɨsi da gak dakon pi aŋ.
Antiok pi aŋ mudaŋek Banabas uŋun Sol wɨsɨŋ kok do Tasas kɨgɨt.
Yo ni da gen teban yapyap amɨn kosit sopmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan tepmɨ dɨma noman tosok uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Ni bɨsapmon noman togɨ uŋun bɨsapmonsi noman tokdɨsak.
Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ do dɨma galak tawit. Yaŋ awit do Sisa dagɨn geno nandɨsak do yagɨm. Mani nak naga dakon amɨn kabɨno gen pikon yopbeŋ yaŋon da dɨma agɨm.
Yaŋ teban tokgo da egɨp egɨp namɨsak. Jɨgɨ pasat bɨsapmon uŋun da butno aŋteban asak.
Uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, nido Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ gak on amɨn yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨ!”
Mɨktɨm gat tap gat kɨsi iyɨ wasagɨt, do kɨsi bamot iyɨ dakon gɨn.
Ae abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek gen yokwi morapmɨ dɨ gat kɨsi iyɨwit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa paŋmuwukbi morap dakon nandaŋ gadat teban tagɨt. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ amɨn da paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbeŋba amɨn kabɨ madepsi awit.
Yawe, gak da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi do gayamaŋ. Gak da nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ yo morap ano tagɨsi gɨn noman toni.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ kalɨp nin gat egɨpgumaŋ da nipmaŋ kɨwit. Mani uŋun nin da kabɨkon nani dɨma. Nin da kabɨkon nani tam nin gat sigɨn egɨpnom. Mani kɨlɨni kɨwit uŋun da nolɨsak, uŋun nin da kabɨkon nanisi dɨma.
Ae uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da notni gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni yo yoyɨŋ degek “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ ɨmni” yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nido kɨsi morap nak nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn. Uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ bo ae man madepni toŋ uŋun nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn.
Amɨn yokwi nak aŋupbal ak do pasulɨkon da gen yaŋ paŋkosit aŋ. Aŋek nak nɨt do muwukgaŋ, do kɨlano aŋaki yo yokwi dɨma aŋ namni.
Nak ji da binapmon Krispus gat Gaius gat baŋgɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgum. Amɨn dɨ gat dɨma soŋ yomgum. Uŋun do nak Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Do amɨn kɨnda da “Nak Pol da manon telagɨ pakbi sogɨm” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yogogɨ.
Jikon aŋpak agɨm uŋudeŋ gɨn paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨkon yaŋ gɨn agɨm. Yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn jikon dɨma agɨm, ji da nak paŋpulugok ani do jɨgɨ dɨma damgum. Uŋun suŋ agɨm yaŋ nandaŋ? Yaŋ kaŋ dɨwarɨno yɨpmaŋ namni.
Amɨn kɨnda jikon da mibɨltok amɨn egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon oman amɨni egek mibɨltok amɨn asak.
Yapyap Bɨlagon amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨm do Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan Grik amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi egɨpgwit.
amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda ekwan kagɨt. Amɨn yɨkgwit uŋun da Yesu gen teban kɨnda yapmaŋakwan gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da notni kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp asak kaŋ, uŋun gen teban yapmaŋdak?”
Bɨsitno da mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi da yaŋ gagon opjak dosi nandɨsat. Ae gak do kɨsitno paŋenokdot uŋun da pɨlɨndo dakon paretno yaŋ asak.
Nido, kombɨ amɨn dakon gen kɨnda kombɨ amɨn da galaktoknikon da yoni do dɨma noman tagɨt. Telagɨ Wup da amɨn paŋtagap aban Piŋkop gen yomgut uŋun baŋ yaŋ teŋteŋok awit.
Piŋkop dakon aŋeloni da yaŋ nayɨk, do ji dɨma pasolni. Piŋkop top dɨma yosok. Gen nayɨk uŋun yaŋsi altaŋban kokdamaŋ.
“Amɨn butdasi galak taŋ damaŋ baŋgɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun kɨsi amɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ baŋ butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ.
Piŋkop, gak Piŋkopno. Nak pi madepsi aŋek gak wɨsisat. Nak mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon egek tapmɨmno mɨnisi aŋakwa amɨn da pakbi do aŋ uŋudeŋ wupno da gak do tepmɨsi nandɨsak. Aŋek gɨptɨmno da gak gat egɨpdosi nandɨsak.
Gak top amɨn. Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal ak dakon gen dogɨn galak tosol.
Uŋun yut da kosit gwagagon monjɨ bɨlak kɨnda yɨkgɨt mani uŋun Yutikus. Pol da gen saŋbeŋek yaŋakwan monjɨ uŋun yɨk dɨpmɨn pagek uwagat aŋek waŋga mɨktɨmon maŋ aŋakgɨt. Maŋ aŋakban kɨmakgɨt naŋ pɨgɨ abɨdawit. Uŋun yut notni kwen kwen awit dakon kɨdɨŋɨ kapbɨ kwen nani egɨpgwiron da magɨt.
Amɨn mɨrakni toŋ da Telagɨ Wup da paŋmuwukbi do gen yosok uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani.”
Bo ae Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mukwa sogok amɨn do yosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit? Mukwa sogok amɨn Sabat bɨsap morapmon gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ, mani dɨwarɨni mɨni ekwaŋ.
Pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki toktogɨsi pasal kɨmotni do nandɨsat. Paŋmayak aŋek dapbɨ kɨmotni dosi nandɨsat.
Ae wɨliyo kɨsi mɨŋat eyo aŋpak yɨpmaŋek wɨli notni gat aŋpak dɨma agagɨ ak do but kɨndap madepsi pawit. Aŋek aŋpak yokwisi awit uŋun da arɨpmon kobogɨ do yo yokwisi tɨmɨkgwit.
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da Masadonia paŋmuwukbi do nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek paŋpulugagɨt uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat.
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgwit uŋun da arɨpmon Piŋkop gat egɨpni.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn 120 yaŋ da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Pita uŋun kabɨkon da pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ yagɨt,
Yawe uŋun tagɨsi, do Yawe aŋkɨsineŋ. Mani uŋun tagɨsisi, do kap yaŋek aŋkɨsini.
Amɨn morapmɨ da nɨkgaŋ, mani gɨptɨmno dɨma yokwi taŋ, nido Piŋkop da jɨgɨkon naŋ pulugaŋ nepmaŋek kɨlano aŋakwan tagɨsi egɨsat.
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok awit uŋun yapmaŋgaŋ, do gulusuŋni taŋ yomɨsak.
Pol da uŋun kaŋek Piŋkop da iyɨ Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨŋ yoyɨneŋ do yaŋ nimɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn Masadonia kɨk do tagap tagɨmaŋ.
Do pi yopbeŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da but galagon da yaŋ naba yutnikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akeŋ do niaŋ abeŋ uŋun kɨlɨ uŋun nandɨsat.’
Jon da gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep Erot tebai kaŋ yagɨt, nido Erot da padɨge dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt, ae aŋpak yokwi dɨ kɨsi agɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut, uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi ae ɨmalni gami baŋ paŋek yoni arɨpmɨsi taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egɨpgut.
Uŋuden gɨn notni dɨwarɨ kɨsi mɨŋat uŋun paŋek monji mɨni da kɨmakgwit. Kɨmagakwa mɨŋat uŋun don kɨmakgɨt.
Piŋkop gen nandak nandak tɨmɨkgaŋ amɨn, ji yo kabɨsi morap kokwinɨk yoyɨŋdetji do dɨwarɨ ɨmni.
“Amɨn kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek amɨn tebai kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨ yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak? Mibɨltok amɨn tebai uŋun nap teban naŋ wamaŋ yɨpmaŋek yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
“Gak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ amɨn dɨma yoyɨki. Aŋek mukwa sogok amɨnon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Nak naga dakon egɨp egɨpno kɨla tebaisi agɨm, ae butno gwaljɨgɨ mɨni tosok, ae yokwi dɨ dɨma agɨm. Uŋun ɨsal dogɨn agɨm, ma?
Yaŋ awit bɨsapmon Juda mɨŋat amɨnyo Yawe dakon telagɨ yut dagawit. Israel amɨn Piŋkop da kɨla agɨt.
Piŋkop yo morap noman toni do yagɨt uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do amɨn kɨnda da on kombɨ gen paŋmuwukbi do manjɨŋ yomjak kaŋ, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak. Ae gen on mandabi uŋun nandaŋek guramɨtni amɨn, uŋunyo kɨsi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
ae madepni dakon yo kabo dɨma tɨmɨtni. Madepni dakon gen tagɨsi yol kɨmagakwa, madepni da aŋpak ani do but galaksi nandɨsak uŋun aŋakwa pɨndakban gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi ani. Yaŋ aba yo morap anikon amɨn da oman amɨn pɨndagek gen on yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ uŋun do galak toni. Uŋun gen uŋun Piŋkop yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin dakon gen bamɨsi.
Piŋkop dakon Wup da pi asak bo dɨma yaŋon da kaŋ nandaŋyo ani: Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu Kristo uŋun amɨnsi dagagɨt yaŋ yosak kaŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da yabekdak yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
Gen kaga da gen galagɨ yosok, mani butnikon da emat ak do nandak nandak asak. Geni da aban but yawot ekwamaŋ, mani geni uŋun geni tepmɨsi, emat agak sɨba yombem da nin mandaŋ nimɨsak.
“Uŋun tepmɨsi amɨn dapba kɨmotni do kwaŋ.
Nido eni nandaŋ gadat dɨma asak mani mɨŋatni do aŋek eni uŋun telagɨ. Ae mɨŋatni nandaŋ gadat dɨma asak mani eni do aŋek mɨŋatni uŋun telagɨ. Yaŋ dɨma tam mɨŋat monjɨyosi uŋun telagɨ dɨma. Mani abɨsok uŋun telagɨ.
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni gak aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.
Kɨŋ Damaskus kokupmon Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn egɨpgwit uŋun do papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmjak do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun papiakon gen yaŋ tagɨt, “Sol da obɨŋ pɨndakban mɨŋat ae wɨli morap Yesu Yolyol Kosit naŋ yolek akwa kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ tɨmɨk dam teban yutnon yop do Jerusalem paŋopjak.”
Yawe, gen yogokno ae nandak nandakno kɨsi gak da pɨndakbɨ tagɨsi ani dosi nandɨsat. Yawe, gak tɨp madepno, ae yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋ nepnep amɨno.
Uŋun pi yaworɨsi aŋek geni pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn dakon nandak nandakni paŋmɨlɨp asak. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban but tobɨl aŋek gen bamɨ do nandaŋ pɨsoni.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi mibɨltok kɨwit ae buŋon yolgwit kɨsi da gen pap yaŋek yaŋ yawit: “Osana! Dewit Dakon Monji aŋkɨsino! Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak. Piŋkop Wɨkwisi aŋkɨsino!”
Aŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gen on yaŋ gamaŋ uŋun asi yoŋ bo top?”
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsi, do ya yaŋ iyɨni. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mani ji dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, Piŋkop da yabekban apgul.”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ jap arɨpninon nibi.
Amɨn Piŋkop do pasolgoŋ uŋun amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsak. Abɨsok ae don mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yaŋ gɨnsi bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak.
Aban Yesu da tobɨl kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, dɨma pasolgi. Nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, do kɨlek tosol.” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Aŋek kosit ɨleŋon pik kɨndap kɨnda akban kagɨt. Kaŋek kapmatjok da kɨŋ bamɨ dɨ dɨma pɨndakgɨt. Tamɨ gɨn pɨndagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak buŋon ae bamɨ dɨmasi toki dosi nandɨsat!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wagɨlsi kɨbɨdagɨt. Tamɨ kɨsi alek taŋ mudawit.
Gak da Isip dakon tapmɨm madepni tuwɨlek obɨsi aŋupbal agɨl. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgokon da uwalgo pabɨŋ yopgul.
“Nak dakon amɨn kabɨno, nawa dayɨko nandabɨt. Israel amɨn, nak dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni do madepsi nandɨsat.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ni bɨsapmon sotni yɨpmaŋ dek?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Apma gɨldat tobɨl do 1 kilok gɨptɨmɨ kɨndap sogɨt uŋun yawokgɨt.”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da nak do yabekbi kɨnda yaŋ dɨma bo nandaŋ namaŋ, mani ji da nak do asi yabekbi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ namaŋ, ma? Ji da Yesu yolyol amɨn dagawit uŋun da tɨlak kɨnda da yaŋ taŋakwan uŋun da nak Amɨn Tagɨ dakon yabekbini kɨnda yaŋ yolaŋakwan koŋ.
Yawe da saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun yolek geni guramɨkgaŋ amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋ yomdɨsak.
Ae amɨn tapmɨmɨ mɨni wadak wadak ekwaŋ uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek paŋpulugosak.
Yo morap gwɨlɨgwan toŋ uŋun altaŋ teŋteŋaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun amɨn da nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ nandaŋakwa yo noman taŋ namɨŋakwa yaŋ nandaŋ, gak kaloŋ dagɨn tagɨsi aŋkutnosol.
Aŋek gɨldat kɨnda do tap wakga dakon pi monjɨ da tap wakga dakon yoni dɨwarɨ maba pɨgɨwit.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ pɨsaŋek yutnon wɨgek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kosiron ji ni gen naŋ yaŋ?”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da kabap yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, ‘Ji tuwɨl kɨ maŋ nin wɨtjɨŋba pasɨlneŋ!’
Pi morap uŋun asat uŋun Gen Bin Tagɨsi da ɨreŋ tosak do asat. Nido Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon yo tagɨsi kɨsin da tɨmɨk tɨmɨk aneŋ do nandɨsat.
Ji mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, mɨktɨm amɨn da notnin dɨ yaŋon da but dasi galak taŋ damdaŋ. Mani ji on mɨktɨm dakon amɨn dɨma. Nak da ji on mɨktɨmon baŋ kɨlɨ manjɨŋ depgum. Uŋun do aŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamaŋ.
Ae aŋpak mayagɨ dɨma asak, ae iyɨ dogɨn dɨma nandɨsak, ae butjap tepmɨ dɨma nandɨsak, ae amɨn da yokwi aŋ ɨba yokwini do dɨma nandaŋ egɨsak.
Mani gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Tair gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ paŋakwa ji da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.
Mani mɨktɨmni kalɨpmɨ uŋun yapmaŋek mɨktɨm wagɨl tagɨsisi uŋudon egɨp do galak tawit, mɨktɨm uŋun Kwen Kokup. Uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop do, “Gak nin dakon Piŋkop,” yaŋ iyɨŋakwa Piŋkop mayagɨ dɨma pasak, nido uŋun amɨn do kokup pap kɨnda kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
Jɨgɨ morapmɨ nagon noman toŋ, mani gengo do but galaksi nandɨsat.
Uŋuden amɨn tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ, ae monjɨ gwayoni uŋun da mɨktɨmni abɨdokdaŋ.
Mani geno dɨma guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma, do yutni mɨktɨm yaworɨkon wɨtjɨgɨt.
Kombɨ amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon gɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon dɨma dapba kɨmokgoŋ, do nak abɨsok ae aŋwa ae pɨdaŋɨ do sigɨn kɨkeŋ.
Uŋun da kwenon aeno kaŋapbo Kwen Kokupmon yoma kɨnda wɨtdal kɨgɨt da taŋban kagɨm. Kaŋapbo amɨn uŋun kalɨp nak do kweŋ da yaŋ tebaisi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ namgut uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨdon wɨŋaki yo morap don altokdaŋ golɨko.”
Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yoyɨŋ dek mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨm dakon kokup pap tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Nak sipsip kabɨno nandaŋ yomɨsat. Uŋun tekno nandaŋek nolgaŋ.
Yesu Kristo Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin pi agɨt uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wupni madepsi ninon tagalgɨt.
Ji dakon nandak nandak paŋupbal ak do pi aŋ amɨn uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋpak yokwi aŋ. Dɨpmɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ pɨndagek uŋun da paŋtagap aban yumabi aŋpak aŋek gɨptɨm tɨmni paŋupbal aba ɨŋanisi aŋ, ae Piŋkop kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ.
Nak Onesimus yabekgo Tikikus gat kɨgɨmal. Onesimus uŋun notnin tagɨsi. Uŋun pi do but dasi nandaŋek aŋ kɨmokdok. Uŋun ji da kabɨkon amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun bamot da yo morap ɨdon noman tawit uŋun do dayɨkdamal.
Mani gak telagɨ egɨsal. Gak kɨla amɨn madep yɨgaki Israel amɨn da mango aŋkɨsaŋ.
Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Gen kagani sopni kaŋ, tɨp da iyɨ yaŋ tɨdokdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kalɨp gen yaŋ yawit: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mɨŋatni do mandaŋ ɨmjak.’
Ae sot teban kɨnda da kalbi altaŋ gamjak, bo gɨldat binap yo yokwisi kɨnda da gak aŋupbal asak yaŋ do pasol pasol dɨma abi.
Pakbi madep uŋun ɨgek tɨmɨkban tagɨ kɨmak mudonom. Mani dɨma.”
Yutni telagɨ uŋun kabapmon agɨt. Kwen kundu wasagɨt, ae mɨktɨm wasagɨt da tebai tomal, uŋudeŋ yutni aŋteban aban tebaisi toktogɨsi tokdɨsak.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit asaron, nak gak do nandaŋek Piŋkopno ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Amɨn da gen teban yapmaŋakwa Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋ yomɨsak. (Mani gen teban mɨni kaŋ, gen kɨrɨŋɨt dakon dɨwarɨni mɨni.)
Pakbi uŋun da telagɨ pakbi sogok dakon tɨlak asak. Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do telagɨ pakbikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak. Telagɨ pakbi uŋun gɨptɨm garak wɨrɨrɨtjak do dɨma, uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨp do dakon tɨlak asak. Ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do Piŋkop da Yesu Kristo kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt.
Gak kwen kokupmon da uwal da kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtni do yagɨl, aŋaki mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo da pasalek tayaŋgok egɨpgwit. Piŋkop gak pɨdaŋ agek amɨn yokwi dakon aŋpakni kokwin aŋek jɨgɨni toŋ amɨn pulugaŋ yopmaŋdal.
Juda amɨn Beria egɨpgwit uŋun amɨn tagɨsi. Aŋpakni da Juda amɨn Tesalonaika egɨpgwit uŋun yapgut. Pol dakon gen do galagɨsi nandaŋek gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Piŋkop dakon gen uŋun pakyaŋsi manjɨŋ nandawit. Manjɨŋ nandaŋek Pol da gen asi yosok bo suŋ yosok yaŋ do kokwin awit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
Kɨŋ pagadaŋek kɨmakbi tamogwan wusɨgɨt. Wusɨŋek ɨmal tagɨsi Yesu dakon bumjotni wamgwit uŋun taŋba pɨndakgɨt. Mani dɨma wɨgɨgɨt.
Ji amɨn dakon yo tɨmɨt do tebai dɨma yoyɨni. Ji amɨn paŋkewalek kabokon da yo tɨmɨt tɨmɨt uŋun aŋpak tagɨ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moneŋ ae yo kabɨyosi ɨreŋ taŋba uŋun do butjikon da uŋun yo madep yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Do ji kobogɨ dɨmasi yomni. Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Uwalgo jap do aban kaŋ, jap ɨbi. Ae pakbi do aban kaŋ, pakbi ɨbi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, aŋpak yokwini do nandaŋek mayagɨ pakdɨsak.”
“Niaŋ nandaŋ? Monjɨ bamoron da jɨt amɨn da datni dakon gen guramɨkgɨt?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi yosot, takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yokwi gat ae kosit oba mɨŋat gat da ji gwapmaŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kwaŋ.
Paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Piŋkop da Kristo da manon dɨwarɨsi yopmaŋ damɨsak, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni.
Tapmɨmno mɨni aŋakwan melno tɨptaŋ gen kaganogwan tegosok. Gak da nepbɨ kɨmot da tamokon pokdot.
Yesu bɨsit aŋ mudaŋban paŋdet kabɨni gat kɨsi Kidron Pakbi Kɨdat yapmaŋek kɨwit. Uŋun pakbi da usugap da pigaga kɨnda tosok. Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigagagwan pɨgɨwit.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨ muwukgwit kɨsi da pɨdaŋ Yesu iyɨŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailaron kɨwit.
Juda amɨn Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn ae Liwai amɨn yabekba Jonon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak niaŋen amɨn kɨnda?”
Piŋkop da iyɨ yo morap wasagɨt, ae uŋun da yaŋakwan tamonikon toŋ. Ae yo morap da mani aŋenokgoŋ. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni tɨlɨmni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak teban. Uŋun asi.
Kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdaŋ dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Teŋteŋɨ da mɨktɨmon teŋteŋaŋban amɨn da aŋpakni yokwi noman toni do pasalek teŋteŋɨ manji ɨmɨŋek pɨlɨn tuk do galak tawit.
Amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesukon sigɨn obɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
Piŋkop Monji dakon man do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn, ji da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni kɨlɨ abɨdawit yaŋ nandani do aŋek gen on mandaŋ damɨsat.
“Bɨsap morapmɨ apban gen kokwin amɨn madep da aŋpulugok do kurak tagɨt. Mani don yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Nak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldot ae amɨn do nandako yo ɨsalɨ aŋ.
Yawe, gak da yo morapmɨ wasagɨl. Gak nandaŋ kokwin aŋek yo morap uŋun wasagɨl. Gak da yo morap wayɨŋ aŋek ekwaŋ wasagɨl uŋun on mɨktɨmon tugaŋbisi.
Abɨdaŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Israel amɨn ji abɨŋ nin paŋpulugaŋba on amɨn gen pikon yɨpno. On amɨn da kokupmɨ kokupmɨ amɨn morapmɨ dakon but paŋupbal asak. Aŋek Israel amɨn kabɨ nin do, ae Moses dakon gen teban do, ae on Telagɨ Yut Madep kɨsi do yaŋba yokwi tok asak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Grik amɨn tɨmɨkban on Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon wɨŋek telagɨ tamo on aŋupbal aban yo ɨsalɨ asak.”
kalɨp babɨkji da kwen wɨgɨk awit bɨsapmon geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit, uŋudeŋ ji but teban dɨma ani.
Tɨpbaŋ aŋagakwa Stiwen bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu, wupno abɨda.”
Kokup kɨndakon amɨn da uwal aŋdaba kaŋ, kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek pasal kokup kɨndakon kɨni. Nak asi dayɨsat, ji Israel amɨn dakon kokup morapmon pi wasɨp dɨma aŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun do japmɨ nandawit. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Osana! Dewit Dakon Monji aŋkɨsino!” Yaŋ yaŋba uŋunyo kɨsi do japmɨ nandawit.
Uŋun mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo da kokup wasawit. Gak yogo morapmɨsi uŋun baŋ wadak wadak amɨn paŋpulugaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpgwit.
Yaŋdo, nak yaŋ dayɨkdɨsat. Israel amɨn yokwikon maŋek wagɨl tasɨk taŋ yaŋ nandaŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi! Uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit, aŋakwa Piŋkop da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Israel amɨn da uŋun kaŋek ninon yaŋsi asak tam tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ yomni do aŋek Piŋkop da uŋun agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋba amɨn bamot da yo kosiron altawit uŋun do yoyɨŋek yagɨmal, “Bret pudaŋakwan uŋudon kaŋ nandaŋyo amak.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pita da pɨdaŋ pɨgɨ amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn wɨsaŋ uŋun nak mani. Ji mibɨlɨ nido abeŋ?”
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Abraham Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut, do Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.”
Maŋakwa naŋek arɨpmɨsi tugawit. Yo uŋun do galak tawit uŋun Piŋkop da yomgut.
Ji notji paŋteban ak do gen on notji yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ ani.
Jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
Aŋek kabap aŋyoŋgam aŋek uŋun dakon kɨlɨŋɨ da sida kɨndap madepsi uŋun kɨsi wɨtjɨgɨt.
Mani Piŋkop mɨŋat amɨnyo geni guramɨkgaŋ amɨn gat egɨsak, do amɨn yokwi uŋun madepsi pasoldaŋ.
“Kɨŋakwa amɨn mɨŋat pak do agɨt uŋun apgut. Apban mɨŋat tagap taŋek egɨpgwit uŋun gat soŋnok ak do yutnon wɨgakwa yoma sopgwit.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da kabɨkon mɨŋat wɨliyo iyɨ dage dɨma ekwaŋ. Mɨŋat uŋun wɨli dakon paŋpulugokni, ae wɨli uŋun mɨŋat dakon paŋpulugokni.
Do gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ abɨsok yo pɨndak nandaŋyo amal uŋun do Jon iyɨnjil. Dabɨlni mɨni amɨn sɨŋtoŋ, ae kandapmɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kosit akwaŋ, ae wuda tebani toŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlek toŋ, ae mɨragɨ mɨni amɨn da gen nandaŋ, ae amɨn kɨmakbi pɨdoŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋ.
Dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Asi, on uŋun amɨn.” Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Kagɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun yombem, mani on uŋun amɨn dɨma.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun mani.”
Nandaŋ gadatji uŋun paret yombem kɨnda naŋ Piŋkop do ɨmaŋ. Ae naga jɨgɨ pasat uŋun da Piŋkop do paret aŋek wain tagalgaŋ uŋun yombem asak. Yaŋ do aŋek but galaksi nandɨsat.
Aŋek Yut Burɨ Telagɨ da pomon ɨmal madepsi kɨnda abɨsɨŋba magɨt. Aŋek ɨmal uŋun da manjigwan yut burɨ kɨnda tagɨt uŋun Yut Burɨ Telagɨsi yaŋ yawit.
Ae amɨn morapmɨsi da yaŋ, gen yaŋba nandagɨm. Wuwɨkni uŋun pakbi madepsi pokdok uŋun dakon wuwɨk yombem. Ae uŋun kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ madepsi yawit. Uŋun da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! Amɨn Tagɨnin Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami kɨla amɨn madep egek pini asak.
Yo madep ji da si nandaŋ pɨsoni uŋun yaŋ: Mibɨ gɨldaron yaŋsul amɨn noman tokdaŋ, aŋek butni dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun yoldaŋ.
Nin jap tɨmɨt do nandaba kɨk aŋek wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan pɨdaŋ pi gɨn aŋegapno wɨgɨ pɨlɨn toni kaŋ, pi uŋun ɨsal dogɨn amaŋ. Nido, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun yɨk yawot yomɨsak.
Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
“Nak yaŋ dayɨt, ji nak kɨlɨ nandawit mani sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
Aŋek gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨ uŋun Parisi kabɨkon nani uŋun da pɨdaŋ agek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni mɨnisi komaŋ. Wup bo aŋelo kɨnda da gen bo iyɨgɨt? Uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Nido, toktogɨsi amɨn da yaŋ nayaŋ, gak Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmokdol, ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmokdol.
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Apolos uŋun namɨn? Ae nak Pol uŋun namɨn? Nit pi amɨn gɨn. Amɨn Tagɨ da nit do pi ŋwakŋwat ŋwakŋwat nimgut. Aban nit pi uŋun ando ji Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Yaŋban sot amɨn da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, pakbi da wayɨŋ asak bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da nak aŋpulugaŋ pakbi ɨdapmon abɨgɨ dɨma nepmaŋdak. Nak pɨgɨk do aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da ŋwapmaŋek pɨgɨ pɨgɨ aŋ.”
do nandak nandakni bamorɨ kɨsi tomal. Ae mɨŋatjok ae sakwabat ae mɨŋat eni da kwɨnɨkbi uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi do nandaŋ. Uŋun wupni ae gɨptɨmni Piŋkop do paregek telagɨ egɨp do nandaŋ. Mani mɨŋat amɨn pagɨt on mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk asak, ae eni dakon galaktok yol do nandɨsak.
Do ji bamɨ pakpak dakon Amɨn Tagɨni bɨsit iyɨŋba pi amɨn paŋalon aŋ yopban pinikon kɨŋ jap paŋ paŋmuwutni.”
Moses da gen teban morap mɨŋat amɨnyo do yoyɨŋ mudaŋek bulmakau monɨŋ gat ae meme gat dakon yawini tɨmɨk pakbi gat ɨktagɨlgɨt. Aŋek isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨ nap gami baŋ wabi uŋun sipsip daŋgwan baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun yawikon sɨbɨgɨt. Aŋek abɨdaŋ awɨlakwan yawi dakon mumumɨ da Piŋkop dakon gen teban papia ae mɨŋat amɨn morap da kwenon mawit.
“Ji on amɨn kabɨ but upbal aŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Dɨmasi! Bɨsap apmeŋon wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok gɨn asak. Pakbi teban noknok bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo.
Yaŋ aban egek kalbi binap Piŋkop do bɨsit aŋek ae kap yaŋakwal dam teban yutnon amɨn yɨkgwit da nandawit.
“Uŋun yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt, ae top genyo kɨsi kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.”
Dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agɨpgwit. Kokup pap kɨnda aŋalon aŋek uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpni dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit.
Nido ji nandaŋ, yo noman taŋek nandaŋ gadatji paŋkɨlɨkdak, uŋun da tebai agek jɨgɨ guramɨtneŋ dakon aŋpak paŋalon asak.
Yaŋ yaŋek Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsoni do paŋpulugagɨt.
Laion da amɨn dakon gɨpni paŋdagoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak dɨ aŋupbal abam. Ɨlɨk aŋaŋ tɨmɨ kɨndakon aŋkɨŋakwa amɨn da nak yokwikon naŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma dɨ abɨdaŋbam.
Dabɨlni uŋun kɨndap dakon mɨleŋ asɨp yombem, ae busuŋɨkon kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit. Gɨptɨmɨkon man kɨnda mandawit. Iyɨ gɨn kaloŋ da man uŋun nandɨsak, amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma nandaŋ.
Nandani. Saŋbek saŋbek kalɨpmɨ uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi tam, Piŋkop da saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma aban.
Amɨn kɨnda Yesukon kaluk saŋbesak uŋun da kɨla amɨn pi dɨma asak. Uŋun iyɨ do nak amɨn madep kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek kwen wɨgɨk aban Piŋkop da Sunduk gen pikon yɨpgut, yaŋ gɨn gen pikon dɨ yɨpban.
“Nak abɨsok gagon opbeŋ, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨkno da uŋun amɨn kabɨkon tugosak yaŋ do mɨktɨmon sigɨn egek gen on yosot.
Timoti yombem amɨn dɨ nak gat dɨma ekwamaŋ. Uŋun ji niaŋ ekwaŋ ae ji paŋpulugok do nandak nandak madepsi asak.
Oman monjɨ, ji kɨla amɨnji dakon gen morap guramɨk kɨmotni. Nindaba tagɨsi asak yaŋ do aŋek kapmat egek dandɨsak bɨsapmon pi tagɨsi dɨ abam. Dɨma. Ji Amɨn Tagɨ do pasal ɨmɨŋek pi ani uŋun but dasi nandaŋek ani.
Piŋkop da nak do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ namɨŋek pi namgut, do ji kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ dayɨsat. Ji dɨsi do dɨma nandaba wɨgɨsak. Piŋkop da nandaŋ gadat damɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon aŋpakji kokwinɨgek dɨsi do “nin niaŋen amɨn?” yaŋ do nandani.
Ae kɨsi morap da Piŋkop dakon Wup da jap yomgut uŋun nawit.
Ji Amɨn Tagɨ da kalɨp yo agɨt uŋun kɨlɨ nandawit, mani butji pabo pɨsaŋban uŋun do sigɨn nandani do dayɨsat. Amɨn Tagɨ da kalɨp Israel amɨn uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkban Isip yɨpmaŋ kɨwit. Aŋek don nandaŋ gadat dɨma awit amɨn uŋun paŋtasɨk agɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda yo morap ani do yagɨm uŋun nandaŋek guramɨkdak, uŋun amɨn da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun amɨn do Datno da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae nakyo kɨsi uŋun amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek naga naŋ yolɨko kokdɨsak.”
Gen teban yolgaŋ amɨn dagɨn Piŋkop dakon yaŋ teban tokni tɨmɨtni kaŋ, nandaŋ gadat uŋun yo ɨsalɨ asak, aŋakwan yaŋ teban tokni uŋun bamɨ mɨni aŋ mudokdaŋ.
Nagon tobɨlek bɨsitno nandagɨt, do mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon bɨsit dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ.
Jon dam teban yutnon yɨpba yɨgakwan Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Yaŋ yoyɨŋbal ɨleŋ Olip yɨpmaŋek tobɨl Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨwit. Ɨleŋ Olip uŋun Jerusalem da kapmatjok tosok.
Uŋun amɨn kobogɨ yokwisi yaŋ baŋ pakdaŋ: Amɨn Tagɨ gat ae tɨlɨmni tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun da dubagɨsikon egek bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni wagɨl yokwisi egɨpdaŋ.
Neri uŋun Melki dakon monji. Melki uŋun Adi dakon monji. Adi uŋun Kosam dakon monji. Kosam uŋun Elmadam dakon monji. Elmadam uŋun Er dakon monji.
Uŋun da mibɨlno nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn geno guramɨkgaŋ. Mɨktɨm dubagɨkon amɨn da nak do pasalek abɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ namaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Epesas kokup pap dakon kɨlda mandakni da gen sopmaŋ yomɨŋek nawa gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Epesas amɨn, amɨn morap kɨsi nandaŋ, Atemis daman dakon telagɨ yut ae tɨpni kundukon da magɨt uŋun kɨsi nin da kokup papmon taŋakwal nin da kɨlani amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ nimaŋ.
Isip amɨn morap kɨsi dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ dapban kɨmakgwit.
Mani wadak wadak aŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋban mɨŋat monjɨyoni uŋun sipsip da yaŋ ɨreŋ toŋ.
Ji da papia on manjɨŋek nin da genin paŋteban ak do mandamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi. Nin egɨp egɨpnin Kristokon tosok, ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon gen bamɨsi dayamaŋ. Notnonisi, yo morap amaŋ uŋun ji dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋteban ak do amaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda Monji do wasɨp yosok uŋun Dat do kɨsi yosok. Mani amɨn kɨnda Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat yaŋ yosok uŋun Datyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Nido Kristo yo kɨsi iyɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk pak do dɨma nandagɨt. Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Piŋkop, gak do yaŋba yokwi tok awit uŋun gen da nak yo kɨsi abɨdosok.”
Mani nak dɨma. Nak olip kɨndap da yaŋ Piŋkop dakon yut kɨdɨpmɨŋon tagɨsi kwosot. Nak Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun do toktogɨsi nandaŋ dagokeŋ.
Pol da sɨŋtaŋban gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkonsi kɨŋakwan pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, abɨkikon da wɨŋ abɨsok egɨsaron nak Piŋkop da dabɨlon butnokon da tagɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ wɨt yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat kɨnda da silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ baŋ kaloŋɨ da yutnon maŋ pasɨljak kaŋ uŋun niaŋ asak? Uŋun da lamni koleŋek yutni ɨkdɨgaŋek tebaisi wɨsɨŋek don kosak.
Yaŋ do aŋek not kabɨ ji yaŋ ani. Disi da kabɨkon amɨn 7 kabɨ manjɨŋba uŋun da jap kokwin pi ani. Amɨn nandak nandakni tagɨsi, ae amɨn da dabɨlon tagɨsi ekwaŋ, ae Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi uŋuden amɨn baŋ pɨndagek tɨmɨtni. Tɨmɨkba uŋun amɨn do jap kokwin pi yomɨŋek
Egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat, do aŋpulugaŋbɨ wɨsa dagokdo gak da amɨn nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun do nandakeŋ. Nak bɨsit gayɨsat, do kosit nolɨŋbɨ uŋun naŋ kɨkeŋ.
Imenius gat Aleksanda gat da yaŋ abal nak da Sunduk da kɨsiron yopgum. Uŋun nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek buŋon Piŋkop do gen yokwi dɨma yonjil do aŋek uŋun agɨm.
“Yaŋ yaŋban kɨlegɨ kabɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, ni bɨsapmon jap do abɨ gandaŋek jap gamgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon pakbi do asal yaŋ gandaŋek pakbi gamgumaŋ?
Ae yomaŋ nok dakon yoni dɨwarɨ kɨsi taŋ yomgwit, uŋun sinamon, ae jap paŋgalak ak yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi sogok dakon yo, ae bɨt nelak kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae wain, ae olip dakon nelagɨ, ae plaua tagɨsi gat, ae wit. Ae bulmakau, ae sipsip, ae os, ae oskon da amɨn pawɨl tamo, ae oman monjɨ kɨsi. Uŋun yo morap amɨn dɨ da saŋbeŋek yumyumɨ mɨni.
Pi ɨsalno Timoti da gɨldatni tagɨ damɨsak. Ae nak dakon dɨwatno Lusias, ae Jeson, ae Sosipata uŋunyo kɨsi da gɨldatni tagɨ damaŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn kɨnda da don abɨŋek on amɨn da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asak uŋun yapmaŋek morapmɨsi asak? Arɨpmɨ dɨma, do on Kristo bo?”
Ji morap da pi tebaisi yaŋ gɨn sigɨn aŋkɨmagakwa wɨgɨ mibɨ bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak dosi nandamaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, nandaŋ gadatji abɨdaŋ kɨmagek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋnim do yagɨt ae uŋun do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋ uŋun abɨdokdaŋsi.
“Amɨn da man madep damaŋ amɨn, awa! Kalɨp babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ do yaŋ gɨn aŋ yomgwit.”
Yawe Piŋkopno, gak aŋpak kɨlegɨ asal. Do nak aŋpulugaŋbɨ uwalno da nak aŋpak kɨlegɨ asat yaŋsi nandani. Yum pɨndagaki nak da yokwi toko nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani.
Nak yaŋ nandaŋek yagɨm, “Piŋkop Wukwisi, gak abɨsok nak dɨma aŋpulugosol, do nak uŋun do butno obɨsi jɨk tosok.”
Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak niaŋsi aŋnam do abɨsal? Piŋkop da manon tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi do yaŋ teban ta.”
Kɨlɨŋno morap bamɨ dɨma toŋ uŋun Dat da mandaŋ maban kwaŋ. Aŋek kɨlɨŋno morap bamɨ toŋ uŋun Dat da bamɨ madepsi toni do paŋmɨlɨp asak.
Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek datni ni man naŋ yok do nandɨsak yaŋ do kɨsit tɨlak aŋ ɨmgwit.
Don aeni kwa Josep da notni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Nak naga ji dakon notji Josep.’ Yaŋ aban kɨla amɨn madep Pero da Josep dakon yawi dɨwatni dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨndakyo agɨt.
Uŋun tepmɨsi tasɨk toŋ. Ae kɨmotni uŋun pasol pasolɨsi ae yokwisi.
bo ae geno do manji ɨmɨŋek gen tebano dɨma guramɨtni kaŋ,
Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Piŋkop.”
“Pak mudaŋakwa kalbi binap aban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn mɨŋat pak do asak kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak! Opba kɨŋ abɨdono!’
Bɨsap kɨnda uŋun gat egek yaŋsi ani do yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Jerusalem kokup pap dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Datno da yo dam do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun abɨdok do jomjom ani. Nak kalɨp yo uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm.
Uŋudon kanek kapbɨ egɨpgut. Egek don tap wakgakon da Siria mɨktɨmon kɨk do tagap tagɨt. Mani Juda amɨn da Pol aŋat do aŋek yaŋ nandat aŋ dakon geni nandagɨt. Do yum pɨndagek Masadonia mɨktɨmon ae tobɨl kɨk do nandagɨt.
Yawe da paŋpulugosak do jomjom aŋ amɨn morap ji butji paŋteban aŋek atni.
Yaŋsi ani, nido Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok. “Ji bulmakau wit gɨp golek do bamaŋ mɨsɨŋɨkgaŋ bɨsapmon jap noni do gen kagani dɨma sopni.” Ae kɨnda yaŋ yosok: “Pi amɨn yumaŋ nogɨni arɨpmɨ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.”
Nak Kristo dakon aŋpak uŋun kɨlɨ abɨdaŋek arɨpnosi aŋapbo Piŋkop da gulusuŋno kɨnda dɨma kosok yaŋ dɨma nandɨsat. Mani Yesu Kristo pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmɨm aŋpak uŋun naŋ yoldat. Nido, nak iyɨ do manjɨgɨt bɨsapmon aŋpak uŋuden abeŋ do manjɨgɨt.
Uŋun amɨn dakon nandak nandakni yo dɨkon dɨ yopmaŋ yopmaŋ asak, aŋek aŋpak morap asak uŋun kosit naŋ gɨn kaŋek dɨma agɨsak.
Tambarin tɨdaŋek kap aŋek aŋkɨsini. Gita tɨdaŋek kasɨsɨŋ pɨsoŋek aŋkɨsini.
Yut uŋudon but yawot amɨn kɨnda ekwan kaŋ, but yawot genji dakon bamɨ uŋudon tosak. Mɨnini da egɨpjak kaŋ, but yawotji dakon bamɨ jikon aeni tobɨljak.
Mɨŋat bamorɨ da plaua wasaŋek yɨgakwal kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
Yawe, mɨŋat amɨnyo gak wɨsɨŋ gandak do pi aŋ amɨn manji dɨma yomɨsal. Yaŋ asal, do mango nandaŋ amɨn egɨp egɨpni gagon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ.
Yoyɨŋban Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga abɨsal kaŋ, yaŋbɨ pakbi kwenon da bamaŋ bamaŋ gagon opbo.”
Mani nin Kristo tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon geni dayɨŋ teŋteŋomaŋ. Aŋapno Juda amɨn da gen uŋun do nin da dɨma galak taŋek abɨdogɨ gen kɨnda naŋ yoŋ yaŋ nandaŋ. Ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da gen uŋun do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ do yaŋ yosot. Gen on Amɨn Tagɨ dakon dɨma, naga yaŋ yosot. Kristo yolyol amɨn not kɨnda mɨŋatni nandaŋ gadat dɨma asak, mani eni gat egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, mɨŋatni dɨma kwɨnɨtjak.
Kristo da iyɨ aban nin but yawot egek kaloŋɨ ekwamaŋ. Kalɨp Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ uwal uwal aŋek egɨpgwit. Uŋun uwal uwal aŋpakni da Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da binapmon dam da yaŋ tagɨt. Mani Kristo gɨptɨmni paregek dam uŋun wagɨl tuwɨlek uwal uwal aŋpak uŋun aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Aŋek uwal gat emat aŋek yolban kɨŋ mudawit. Pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan mayaktok toktok teban pawit.
Ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsap madep gat, ae kanek kalugɨ dakon bɨsap madep gat, ae bɨlak kalugɨ dakon gawat gawat bɨsap madep uŋun yol kɨmotdosi nandaŋ.
Bɨsit aba Judia mɨktɨmon nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ amɨn da nak dɨma abɨdoni. Ae bɨsit aba telagɨ paŋmuwukbi Jerusalem ekwaŋ uŋun da nak da paŋpulugok do pi asat uŋun do galagɨsi nandani.
Gen teban da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn mɨktɨm amɨn tapmɨmni madep dɨma amɨn baŋ manjɨgɨt. Mani gen teban da manjikon Piŋkop da gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek Monji manjɨgɨt. Uŋun Monjɨ uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi, ae uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsak.
Nin kɨlɨ abɨŋ Jerusalem dakon wigat yapmaŋek nagalgwan pɨgɨmaŋ da akgamaŋ.
Piŋkopno da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae uŋun da abɨŋ aŋpulugokdɨsak. Piŋkop da nak yum nandaŋek nepban pɨndagapbo uwalno pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Yum pɨndagaki uwalno da emaron dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋtobɨlbɨ iyɨkon noman toni.
Amɨn da yokwi aŋdaba kaŋ, tamoni do kobogɨ yokwi dɨma aŋyomni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨsikon ae amɨn kɨsikon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyom do pi tebaisi ani.
Yawe da amɨn kɨnda do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn aŋteban aŋakwan kosit kɨlegɨsi agɨsak.
Amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn. Gɨptɨm wayɨkgamaŋ uŋun mɨktogɨ, mani gɨptɨm pɨdosak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma mɨktogɨ.
Mani nak amɨn dɨma, nak waleŋ yombem yo ɨsalɨ. Amɨn morap da nandaba yokwi tok aŋnamɨŋek manji namaŋ.
Aŋakwa Pol amɨn da binapmon kɨk do nandagɨt mani paŋmuwukbi da dɨma kɨsak do kosit sopsop awit.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban yolek paret ak do kɨgɨmal. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Kɨnarɨm bamorɨ bo ae yɨgɨ yɨgɨ bulagɨ bamorɨ baŋ mukwa soni.”
Gɨptɨm dakon galaktok da piŋkopni asak. Ae aŋpak dɨwarɨ amɨn da mayaktok pakpagɨ uŋun baŋ aŋek iyɨ do nandaba tagɨsi asak. Uŋuden amɨn mɨktɨm dakon yo morap dogɨn nandaŋ, do Piŋkop da paŋupbal aban Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ.
Ji notji baŋgɨn gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Ji on amɨn do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. On amɨn kosit yolɨk amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda da notni kɨnda kosit yolɨsak kaŋ, kɨsi bamot gapmakon mokdamal.”
Piŋkop, gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, do nandaŋ yawok nabi. Bupmɨgo madepsi do nak dakon dɨwarɨno yɨpmaŋ nabi.
Moses gat Aron gat Yawe dakon mukwa sogok amɨn egɨpgumal. Ae Samuel yo kɨsi mani yaŋek gawak ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun da Yawe do bɨsit aba bɨsitni nandaŋ yomgut.
Uŋun amɨn da yaŋ yoŋ, “Top gen yaŋek teban toneŋ. Nin da galak togon gen yokdamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da kosit dɨma sopmaŋ nimjak.”
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji mibɨltok tepmɨ madepsi paŋakwan abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn da manji ɨmdaŋ.
Gak da kanek wasagɨl da uŋun da bɨlak dakon kanek morap dakon tɨlakni asak. Ae gɨldat dabɨl ni bɨsapmon pɨgɨsak uŋun gɨldat da iyɨ nandɨsak.
Nido Gen Bin Tagɨsi wasaŋek nandawit gɨldaron da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon ji da nak aŋpulugaŋba Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok pi amaŋ.
Piŋkop da iyɨ uŋun egɨp egɨp abɨdoneŋ do aŋnoman agɨt. Ae Wupni nin do nimgut, do nin yaŋ nandamaŋ, yo tagɨsi morap dɨwarɨ nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun gat kɨsi don nimdɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn nandaŋ gadat aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨla amɨn madep morapmɨ dakon emat amɨni pabɨŋ yopgwit. Uŋun amɨn aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨla aŋek Piŋkop da yo yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tɨmɨkgwit. Ae laion dakon gen kagani sopgwit.
Piŋkop da nin do yo tagɨsi aŋ nimɨŋek monjɨ gwayo but galak do nimɨsak. Uŋun gɨsam tagɨsi Piŋkopmon tɨmɨkgamaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋaki amɨn kɨsi da gak dakon aŋpakgo nandani. Ae gak da amɨn yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨkdal dakon tapmɨm mɨktɨm amɨn kɨsi morap da nandani.
Yaŋban meŋi da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo kɨnda do dayɨŋban kaŋ uŋun ani.”
Amɨn pi aŋek tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun do but galak dakon yo yaŋ dɨma yomaŋ. Uŋun tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ yaŋ yomaŋ.
Nido amɨn kɨnda amɨn do bupmɨ dɨma nandagɨt kaŋ, Piŋkop da gen pikon kokwin asak bɨsapmon bupmɨsok kɨnda dɨma nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn do bupmɨ nandagɨt amɨn uŋun gen pikon teban tokdɨsak.
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan Datni do yosok yaŋ dɨma nandawit,
Amɨn madepsi Piŋkop gawak ɨm do muwutni bɨsapmon gak aŋkɨsikeŋ. Mɨŋat amɨnyo gak do pasolgoŋ uŋun da dabɨlon kalɨp gak do paret ak do yaŋ teban tagɨm uŋun akdɨsat.
Ji Moses dakon gen teban dɨma yapni do aŋek monjɨsi dakon gɨptɨmni Sabat bɨsapmon kɨsi mandaŋ gɨn. Ji yaŋ aŋ, do nak da Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp agɨm uŋun do butjap nido nandaŋ namaŋ?
Tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt: “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun mastat yet yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da mastat yet pinikon kwaokgɨt.
Jap do iyɨŋba mɨnam yopban apba nawit. Ae Kwen Kokup dakon bret yoban naŋek tugawit.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Sakius. Sakius uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dakon amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut.
Not kabɨ, amɨn dɨwarɨ da ji da gen abɨdawit uŋun abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek jikon pɨdok pɨdok ae jɨgɨyo paŋalon aŋ. Uŋun amɨn do kaŋ kɨmotni do tebaisi dayɨsat. Ji uŋun da dubagɨkon egɨpni.
Amɨn kɨnda jikon da mibɨltok amɨn egɨp do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon oman amɨni egek mibɨltok amɨn tagɨ egɨpjak.
Gak da amɨn yokwi morap sɨbɨt sɨbɨt gɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomɨŋek mabɨ kwaŋ, do gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
Nido Piŋkop uŋun yo morap upbɨlapmon da agak amɨn dɨma. Nin da but kaloŋon da egɨpneŋ do nandɨsak. Telagɨ paŋmuwukbi morap nin da amaŋ uŋudeŋ jiyo kɨsi muwut muwutjikon mɨŋat gen dɨma yoni. Gen yaŋba tagɨ dɨma akdɨsak. Moses dakon gen teban da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon gawat gawaron da yɨtni.
Kɨndap da koron sosoŋ, ae ɨleŋ gurɨgɨ toŋ da madepsi sosoŋ,
Parisi amɨn moneŋ do galagɨsi nandaŋ, do Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit.
Yawe dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni, Yawe aŋkɨsini. Mani telagɨ aŋkɨsini.
Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Butdasi galak taŋ gamɨsat. Butno gak do tagɨsi asak.”
Bɨsap morapmɨ nak kosit dubagɨkon kɨŋapbo pakbi da palɨ aŋkɨwit, ae kabo noknok da jɨgɨ namgwit, ae naga dakon amɨn Juda amɨn da jɨgɨ namgwit, ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da jɨgɨ namgwit. Ae kokup papmon, ae mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon, ae tap kwenon palɨ kɨmakgɨm. Ae paŋmuwukbi toptopmɨ da jɨgɨ madepsi namgwit.
Sela uŋun Kainan dakon monji. Kainan uŋun Apaksat dakon monji. Apaksat uŋun Siem dakon monji. Siem uŋun Noa dakon monji. Noa uŋun Lamek dakon monji.
Ji nagon gadaŋek butji yaworɨsi taŋakwa egɨpni, yaŋ do aŋek gen on dayɨsat. Mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsapmon jɨgɨ noman taŋ damdaŋ. Mani ji pasol pasolɨ mɨni tebaisi atni. Nak da mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm kɨlɨ abɨŋ yɨpgum.”
Paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsawit. Mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ tagɨt, do gen uŋun mibɨlɨ nido yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap kapmatjok akwaŋ uŋun da yo kabɨni kabo tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae amɨn kapmatjok ekwaŋ da yaŋsul aŋ ɨmaŋ.
Mal da gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da teŋteŋaŋ kɨŋ gɨldat pɨgɨsak tetgɨn noman taŋban komaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun apban amɨn kɨsi da kokdaŋ. Do amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo uŋun mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, uŋudon dɨma kɨni. Bo amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo yut uŋudon pasɨlek egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, top yosok yaŋ nandani.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!”
Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Datno yɨk nandarɨ mɨni pi agɨt da aŋaŋ obɨsak, ae nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asat.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban obip amɨn da Pol da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋun aŋaŋ gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ yoyɨwit. Yoyɨŋba Pol gat Sailas gat Rom amɨn bamorɨ yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek si pasalgwit.
Mibɨltok abeŋ amɨn uŋun moneŋ 1 danari tɨmɨgek pi uŋun dakon ami do nandaba yokwi taŋban
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Meŋ, gak da nak dɨwat dɨma nayɨki. Abɨsok uŋun nak dakon bɨsap dɨma.”
Uŋun babɨknin 12 kabɨkon da dɨwarɨ da Josep do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek amɨn do yomɨŋek tomni tɨmɨkgwit. Tɨmɨkba uŋun amɨn da Josep oman monjɨ egɨpjak do Isip mɨktɨmon aŋkɨwit. Mani Piŋkop uŋun Josep gat egek
Yo si nono pɨkwaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi dɨma asak. Mani gen yomaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi tosok.”
Yaŋba Pol da yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Ji kɨla amɨnji kɨnda do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma ani.’ On amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn yaŋ dɨma koko pɨsak.”
Kɨlɨ jap noknok bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan kalɨp yaŋ yomgut amɨn yoyɨŋba opni do pi monjɨni yabekban kɨwit. Mani kɨŋ yoyɨŋba op do dɨma galak tawit.
Paron yokwalek arɨpmɨ dɨma pulugaŋ kɨgɨ, uŋun da tɨlak kɨmot da nak abɨdaŋban kɨmakbi tamokon palɨsi kɨgɨm.
Abɨŋ aŋalon aŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi da gak wɨsaŋ.”
Amɨn da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwa bɨsap madep uŋun apdɨsak.”
Yawe bɨsit iyɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨno. Pi madep madep agɨt uŋun dakon geni yoyɨno mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da nandani.
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsitni mɨŋat monjɨyo da kwenon wutjɨŋek don uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Gak dakon gen si teban taŋek guramɨk kɨmokgeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ɨdon da wasosok.
Yaŋba Pilip da kɨŋ Andru iyɨŋban kɨsi Yesukon kɨŋek gen uŋun iyɨgɨmal.
Ji nin da telagɨ paŋmuwukbi Jerusalem ekwaŋ uŋun do paret paŋmuwukgamaŋ uŋun dakon geni kɨlɨ nandawit, do gen dubagɨ dɨma mandakeŋ.
Yo soŋba kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi aŋ dakon alta wasawit uŋun gol baŋ kwenikon wɨtjɨwit uŋun yutgwan tagɨt. Ae Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam wasaŋek gol baŋ kwenikon wutjɨwit uŋunyo kɨsi tagɨt. Ae uŋun tamo tɨmgwan yo yaŋ tawit: kwoba monɨŋ gol baŋ wasaŋbi uŋungwan tagɨt, uŋun kwobagwan mana tawit, ae uŋun tamogwan Aron dakon win kɨrɨŋni kalɨp gugɨ wugɨt, ae tɨp bamot Piŋkop da saŋbek saŋbek dakon gen mandagɨt uŋungwan tawit.
Amɨn da ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gen pikon depni bɨsapmon dɨma pasolni. Ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ni gen dayɨsak uŋun baŋ yoyɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa ji dakon gen dɨma asak, uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon gen asak.
Pailat da yaŋban Yesu abɨdaŋek baljawit.
Mani Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpguron Monji yabekban pɨgɨt. Mɨŋat da aŋalaŋban gen teban da yoŋgamgwan egɨpgut.
Nak gak gol do gen yaŋ aŋteban agɨm. Toktogɨsi nawa gengo dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
