Mani Amɨn Tagɨ gen yosok uŋun dɨmasi yapmaŋdak. Uŋun da ji paŋteban aŋek kɨlasi tagɨsi aŋakwan Yokwi Ami da jikon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Pakbi teban morapmɨ naŋek obɨgɨ abɨgɨ aŋ uŋun da tɨlak tap wakgakon agɨpgwit. Ae tap wakga awɨl do aŋtɨdok awit.
Mani, amɨn dɨwarɨ iyɨ dogɨn nandaŋek gen bamɨ manji ɨmɨŋek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon butjapni abɨdokdaŋ.
Yapmaŋ kɨŋakwan Liwai amɨn kɨnda obɨŋ kaŋek yaŋ gɨn aŋpekwolek yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yo nikon tɨlak ako nandani?
Ae uwal da dɨwarɨ jɨgɨlak gen yoyɨŋek baljawit, ae dɨwarɨ nap teban baŋ paŋteban aŋek dam tebanon yopgwit.
Piŋkop da uŋun Gen naŋ gɨn yo morap kɨsisi wasaŋ mudagɨt. Kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon da yo kɨnda dɨma noman tagɨt.
Ji nandaŋ, Kristo uŋun dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt do abɨŋ noman tagɨt, ae iyɨkon dɨwarɨni mɨnisi.
Uŋudon Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ yɨkgwit uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn. Uŋun da Yesu moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap naŋba kaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ma, uŋun nido takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap noŋ? Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Bɨt kabi madep kɨnda kapmatjok ɨleŋon egek jap naŋek egɨpgwit. Koŋ uŋun bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨk do Yesu bɨsit tebai iyɨŋba nandaŋ yomgut.
“Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn morapmɨ da egɨp egɨpmon wɨgɨk do pini akdaŋ, mani arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ. Do ji yoma kosit gwagak monɨŋɨ naŋ wɨgɨk do pi tebai ani.
Damaskus egɨpgum bɨsapmon Kɨla Amɨn Madep Aretas dakon kɨla amɨni da nak abɨdaŋ dam tebanon nep do aŋek emat amɨni yoyɨŋban kokup pap dakon tɨp dam madep dakon yoma kagakon nak abɨdok do kɨla aŋek akgwit.
Gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat. Do mɨŋat amɨn morap gak do pasolgoŋ amɨn nak nandani bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani dosi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop, nak naga do nandako pɨŋbisi asak uŋun da paret si galak tosol asak. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa but tobɨl aŋ uŋun manji dɨma yomɨsal.
Joda uŋun Joanan dakon monji. Joanan uŋun Resa dakon monji. Resa uŋun Serubabel dakon monji. Serubabel uŋun Sealtiel dakon monji. Sealtiel uŋun Neri dakon monji.
Yaŋban aŋelo da yagɨt, “Nak Gebriel, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon akdat da yabekban gak do gen tagɨsi on gayɨk do abɨsat.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek but galagon da abɨdoŋ.
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Uŋun amɨn, amɨn dɨwarɨ do aŋpak yaworɨ aŋ yom do dɨma nandagɨt. Uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn gat, ae yo do wadak wadak awit amɨn gat, ae butjɨk madepsi nandawit amɨn gat paŋsopmaŋek dapban kɨmakgwit.
Nin nandaŋ gadat aŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, gak Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Demitius gat pi monjɨni gat nandaba yokwi tok aŋek gen dɨ yok do nandaŋ kaŋ, gen pi agak bɨsapmon tagɨ yoni. Yaŋba gen kokwin amɨn madep da geni nandaŋek tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp ani.
Gen yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “ ‘Nak kɨkeŋon arɨpmɨ dɨma apni’ yaŋ uŋun nido yosok? Iyɨ naŋ aŋagek kɨmot do yosok?”
Nak aeno yokeŋ. Ji nak do asi nandaŋ kokwino tagɨ dɨma yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ namni. Mani ji da nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ gɨn. Mani bɨkbɨk namɨŋakwa mano tɨmɨsok dɨ awɨgɨkeŋ.
Uŋun muwut muwut yut dakon mibɨltok amɨni mani Krispus uŋun gat gwakni gat Pol da Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Ae Korin kokup papmon amɨn morapmɨ nandaŋ gadat aŋek telagɨ pakbi sowit.
Uŋun kokupmon pasɨlɨ egek amɨn gulusuŋni mɨni amɨn apba dapban kɨmotni do jomjom asak. Uŋun si pasɨlek amɨn tapmɨmni mɨni paŋupbal ak do yubɨŋ egɨsak.
Yawe da mɨktɨm morapmɨ paŋupbal aŋek kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ dapban kɨmakgwit.
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Pita da amɨn uŋun yaŋban yutnon wɨŋba kɨlani aban pakgwit. Wɨsa dagokdo pɨdaŋ kɨŋakwa Jopa amɨn notni dɨ kɨsi buŋon yolba kɨwit.
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨkeŋ.’ ”
Yesu uŋun mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ kɨŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn bamorɨ da abɨŋ yolgumal. Yolek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨmal, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nim!”
Kosiron kɨŋek emat amɨn da Sairini kokupmon amɨn kɨnda kawit, mani Saimon. Uŋun tebai iyɨŋba Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨkban kɨwit.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji galak tokjikon tagɨ agɨpni, mani nak dakon bɨsap uŋun dɨma kwaŋtak.
Piŋkop da Jekop dakon dɨwatni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimgut. Iyɨ mɨktɨm kɨnda manjɨŋek nin do kɨlɨ nimgut. Uŋun mɨktɨm do nandano yo madepsi asak.
Nak papia uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi wɨtdaljak bo ae kosak yaŋ kaŋek kunam madepsi saŋbek saŋbek morapmɨ takgɨm.
Juda amɨn wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ pɨndagek gen uŋun bamɨ yaŋ nandaŋ. Aŋakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi pɨndat do nandaŋ.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da aŋkɨsiwit.
Yopmaŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ yutnikon aŋkɨwit. Wagɨl dɨma kɨmakgɨt yaŋ nandaŋek butni yaworɨ tawit.
Amɨn Tagɨno dakon meŋi nagon nido obɨsak? Nak mɨŋat tagɨ dɨma.
Yawe, butjapgo bɨsap niaŋ da sigɨn tosak? Oman amɨngo nin do bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi.
Uwal da jɨgɨlak yaŋ namaŋ. Kokup ɨsalno da nak do nandaba yokwitok aŋ namaŋ. Aŋakwa notnoni da nak do pasol pasol madepsi aŋ. Kosiron agapbo nak nandaŋ amɨn uŋun pasal si kwaŋ.
Oman monjɨ pini gɨn asak, do amɨn tagɨni da ya yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.
Yesu yaŋ aŋek aeni pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨ yol aŋaŋ uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Gak da gaga dakon gen do nayɨŋ dekgɨl, do gen uŋun dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm.
Paŋkewalon dɨmasi nipbi. Yokwi Ami da kɨsiron naŋ pulugaŋ nipbi.’
dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da but pɨsogɨ mɨni abɨŋ uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek gen kɨrɨŋɨt amɨn kabɨ gat yopban egɨpdaŋ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Genesaret Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ uŋun da kapmatsisok aŋgwasɨŋek nandawit.
Gen uŋun yaŋba Yesu burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido ninon bret mɨni yaŋ yoŋ? Ji nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨ!
Wamno gami pi tebaisi aŋakwan tapmɨmno mɨnisi asak. Dabɨlno pɨlɨn taŋakwan tagɨ dɨma sɨŋtosot.
Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.” Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat uŋun gen tebai iyɨwit.
Kɨŋ altaŋek Yawe dakon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ Isip mɨktɨmon agɨmal.
Pol saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak kɨŋ gɨldat binap 12 kilok da tɨlagon Damaskus aŋkapmat aŋapbo teŋteŋɨ madep kɨnda Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ aŋbinap aban nak binapmon akgɨm.
Yaŋ do aŋek kɨmagapbo yo morap do dayɨgɨm uŋun do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ tagɨ nandani do aŋek pi tebaisi abeŋ.
Uŋun kɨŋ wup dam tebanon egɨpgwit uŋun do Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
Yɨgakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen morapmɨ yoyɨŋek kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
Kɨmot agɨt uŋun yokwi dakon tapmɨm abɨk do aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kɨnda kɨmakban dagagɨt, mani abɨsok Piŋkop man madep ɨm do egɨsak.
Yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa Kristo kɨlɨ egɨpgut. Ae yo morap iyɨ da kɨsiron da kɨla aŋakwan kosirɨkon toŋ.
Uŋun da yaŋsul sigɨn yaŋ namɨŋek gen yokwisi nayaŋ. Dɨma galak taŋ namɨŋek mam noŋ.
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa gak da dapbɨ kɨmakgwit. Uŋun gɨldat wɨsak tet da mɨrɨm madep da Tarsis amɨn dakon tap wakga paŋupbal asak, uŋun da tɨlak gak da uŋun amɨn paŋupbal agɨl.
Mani mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak, bo kombɨ gen yosok kaŋ, uŋun da busuŋni eni abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak. Uŋun busuŋ daŋgwani kɨsi mandaŋ mudosok yaŋ asak.
Yawe, nak amɨn kɨlegɨ, do aŋpulugaŋek nandaŋ nabi do yaŋ tɨdosot. Nak top amɨn dɨma, do bɨsitno nandaki do nandɨsat.
Ae kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt: “Ji nak dakon amɨn kabɨ dɨma yaŋ yoyɨgɨm tamokon uŋudon gɨn ‘Ji Piŋkop egɨp egɨp teban egɨsak uŋun dakon monjɨ gwayoni’ yaŋ yoyɨkdɨsat.”
Piŋkop dakon galak tok dɨma yolyolɨ dakon gen morap manji yobi. Gen uŋuden da amɨn ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ Piŋkop dakon kosit da dubagɨkonsi sigɨn paŋkɨkdaŋ.
Uŋun Kwen Kokup egek nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋek nak aŋupbal ak do aŋ amɨn uŋun pabɨŋ yopdɨsak. Piŋkop toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek dɨmasi nepmaŋ dekdak.
Yaŋ aneŋ do Jekop dakon Piŋkop da Israel amɨn nin do gen teban uŋun nimgut.
Kalɨp Dewit da Yesu tepmɨ pasak do yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Nak Amɨn Tagɨ koko nak gat saŋbek saŋbek egɨsak. Uŋun nak da kapmatjok egek tapmɨm namɨŋakwan yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkwakwalɨtjak.
Not kabɨ, nin abɨsok Piŋkop dakon gwakni kabɨ ekwamaŋ, ae don egɨp egɨp niaŋ egɨpdamaŋ uŋun dɨma nandano pɨsosok. Mani yaŋ nandamaŋ, Kristo da abɨŋ noman tosak bɨsapmon Kristo bamɨsi kokdamaŋ, do nin iyɨ yombemsi da egɨpdamaŋ.
Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da gen bamɨ yosok yaŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ.
Aŋek daŋgap madep pekba tugoni ae ɨleŋ morap pasɨŋba kositni kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit gɨreŋɨ paŋmɨlɨp aba kɨlegɨsi asak. Ae kosit yokwi paŋmɨlɨp aba wagɨl gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi asak.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Nak Datno dakon gen teban guramɨgek but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun da kagagwan egɨsat. Ji yaŋ gɨn nak dakon gen teban guramɨtni kaŋ, but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat uŋun da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
Ae pi agak dakon kosit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ toŋ, mani Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo do tapmɨm yomɨŋakwan pi uŋun aŋ.
Uŋun amɨn da mɨleŋ asɨp madepsi sogɨt uŋun aba kɨmakgɨt. Ae emat agak sɨba paŋpekwolakwa dɨma dapgwit. Uŋun amɨn tapmɨmni mɨni, mani don tapmɨm pawit. Uŋun emat amɨn tebaisi dagaŋek mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon emat amɨn kabɨni yolba pasal kɨwit.
Bo Dat nagon egakwan nak Daron egɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ dɨma ak? Nak gen dayɨt uŋun naga da nandak nandagon da dɨma dayɨt. Dat nagon egɨsak uŋun da pini asak.
Uŋun da nugɨm yokwisi madep kalɨpsigwan egɨpgut uŋun abɨdagɨt. Mani kɨnda Koŋ, ae mani kɨnda Sunduk yaŋ yoŋ. Aŋelo da nap teban naŋ wamaŋ aŋteban aban bɨlak 1 tausen egɨpgut.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat uŋun gak dakon gɨn. Gak da mɨktɨm gat yo morap uŋudon toŋ gat wasagɨl.
Amɨn Tagɨ da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn yokwi uŋun da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandani.
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ gen kokwin aŋyomɨŋek madepsi dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨla amɨn madep madep obɨsi pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak.
Banabas gat Sol gat pini Jerusalem wasɨp aŋek Jon mani kɨnda Mak uŋun abɨdaŋbal kɨsi Antiok kɨwit.
Nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, on mɨktɨmon Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan nin aŋpak telagɨsi amaŋ ae gen bamɨsi baŋ yomaŋ. Ae jikon yaŋ gɨnsi agɨmaŋ. Nin on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi dɨma yolgumaŋ. Piŋkop da nin nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek paŋpulugagɨt, do nin aŋpak agɨmaŋ uŋun do nandano wɨgɨsak.
Kɨŋapno Rom amɨn dɨwarɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn da nin abamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nin tɨmɨt do kosiron apgwit. Apba kokup kɨnda mani Apius Maket uŋudon nin amɨn dɨwarɨ gat domdom agɨmaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ kokup kɨnda mani Yumaŋ Naŋek Pokgoŋ Yut Kapbɨ uŋudon pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Pɨndagek Pol tapmɨm paŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Yawe yolgaŋ amɨn kosit kɨlegɨ niaŋ agɨpni uŋun yolɨsak.
Dabɨlgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, pɨlɨk mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.
Nin Piŋkop dakon pi amɨn uŋuden paŋpulugoneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi. Yaŋ aŋek kaŋdo nin uŋun gat pi kaloŋɨ aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ joŋɨtneŋ.
Uŋun da Israel amɨn nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgek dɨwarɨnin kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk nimɨsak.
Ae Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt, ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨsi kɨgɨt.
Nak Jon da paŋmuwukbi 7 kabɨ Esia Provinskon ekwaŋ ji do gen on mandɨsat. Piŋkop abɨsok egɨsak, ae kalɨpsigwan egɨpgut, ae don egɨpdɨsak uŋun da nandaŋ yawok damaŋakwan butji yaworɨ tosak. Ae wup 7 kabɨ Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo da ɨŋamon ekwaŋ uŋunyo kɨsi da nandaŋ yawok damaŋakwan butji yaworɨ tosak.
Lot dakon mɨŋatnikon yo noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do nandani!
Dat da Monji do man ɨmgut uŋun wukwisi, uŋun da aŋelo dakon mani yapmaŋ mudosok, do Monjɨ uŋun da aŋelo dakon wukwisini egɨsak.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, sipsipni kaŋ kwosak bɨsapmon but galak madepsi nandakdɨsak. 99 kabɨ dɨma pasɨlgwit uŋun do tagɨ nandɨsak. Mani kaloŋɨ pasɨljak naŋ kaŋ kwokdɨsak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandakdɨsak.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn da obɨgɨsak.”
Gak kaloŋ gɨn pasɨlɨ tamono. Gak da kɨlano asal, do jɨgɨ da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Gak da nak jɨgɨkon naŋ pulugosol, do nak aŋgwasɨŋek akgaŋ amɨn da but kwaktok kap yoŋ.
Mani dɨma. Gak tedepmɨ yaŋgok egɨsal. Gak tedepmɨsi dɨma ae mɨrɨmɨsi yo dɨma. Yaŋ do aŋek gen kaganokon da gak wandɨtdɨsat.
Yaŋ aŋek pakgwit da Sonda wɨsa dagokdo tɨp kɨnamon kɨk do kɨŋakwa gɨldat wɨgɨt.
Piŋkop da namɨn amɨn kabɨ da yɨk yawot kokupmon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨni do gen tebaisi yaŋ aŋteban agɨt? Mɨŋat amɨnyo geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit uŋun dogɨn agɨt.
Timoti, monjɨno, gak do kombɨ gen yawit, nak uŋun do nandaŋek gak da yo abi uŋun do gayɨkdɨsat. Kombɨ gen uŋun da gak aŋteban aŋakwan aŋpak yokwi pabɨŋ yop do emat abi.
Nak amɨn yokwi da yo uŋun aŋ dakon mibɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kok do agɨm, mani aŋtɨdok agɨm.
Bɨsap kɨndakon pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon mɨŋat amɨnyo aeni yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Amɨn madepsi da abɨŋ uŋudon muwugakwa Yesu boron wɨgɨgɨt. Boron yɨgakwan amɨn morap ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgwit.
Jap yet kosiron mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋ dakon tɨlak. Amɨn nandaŋ gadat aba Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do Sunduk da abɨŋ butnikon Piŋkop dakon gen gwayesak.
Wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok aŋakwan aŋakgwit.
Kɨndap da mibɨl taŋ ɨmɨŋek uwalni aŋgwasɨŋek ekwaŋ uŋun soŋban pasɨlgaŋ.
Yawe, kɨla amɨn madepnin aŋpulugaŋaki emaron teban toneŋ. Gak do yaŋ tɨdoneŋ bɨsapmon paŋpulugoki.
Ji kaloŋ kaloŋ notji do jomjom dɨma aŋek jap tepmɨ tɨmɨgek naŋ naŋ aŋek wain morapmɨ naŋek but upbal aŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ jap do aŋ.
Kɨlɨ aeno kaŋ egapbo aŋelo morapmɨsi dakon geni nandagɨm. Uŋun aŋelo dakon tɨlakni milion morapmɨsi ae tausen morapmɨsi da arɨp. Uŋun aŋelo kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo ae yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ae kɨla amɨn kabɨ baŋ paŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Mani uŋun yapmaŋek amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
Mɨrakni toŋ, mani gen arɨpmɨ dɨma nandani. Uŋun tomnoni toŋ, mani yo dakon kɨbaŋɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandani.
Yawe, amɨn yokwi uŋun dukwan dukwan kɨsi agek aŋpak ɨŋani uŋun do yo tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ. Do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlanin tagɨsi aŋaki amɨn yokwi da nin dɨma paŋupbal ani.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun pɨsɨpmɨsi, yaŋ do aŋek aŋtɨdok ayɨŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun monɨŋɨsisok, mastat yet yombem taŋ damɨsak kaŋ, ji kabap on iyɨŋba tuwɨl kɨ tɨmɨ kɨndakon tagɨ kɨsak. Ae pi morap kɨsi tagɨ ani.”
Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni nin gen pikon nipjak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tak. Mibɨltok ninon asak, do mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi manji ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨkon asak bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Pɨgɨ tap wakga kɨnda abɨdaŋek Atalia kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Antiok kokupmon kɨŋ altagɨmal. Kalɨp Antiok paŋmuwukbi da amɨn bamot Amɨn Tagɨ da nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋakwan Piŋkop dakon pi anjil do yabekba kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon pi aŋ mudaŋek aeni
Aŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨsirɨkon yɨpgwit uŋun gwayeŋ busuŋɨkon kosirɨ morapmɨ baljawit.
Mani Segius da Yesu dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak do amɨn bamot uwal aŋ yomgut. (Ba-Yesu uŋun sot wamwam amɨn kɨnda do Grik genon da Elima yaŋ iyɨwit.)
Publius dakon datni uŋun sot aŋek gɨptɨmɨ kɨndapmɨ soŋakwan pakgɨt. Ae kok ɨlɨtyo kɨsi agɨt, do Pol uŋun kok do wɨgek bɨsit aŋ ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨŋek aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni abɨŋ muwutni da dabɨlon nak kalɨp Yawe do yo ak do yaŋ teban tok agɨm uŋun abo pɨndatdaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wutjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn manji kɨlek taŋakwa Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
Paŋkewal jikon noman toŋ uŋun ŋwakŋwarɨ dɨma, uŋun amɨn morap kɨsikon yaŋ gɨn noman toŋ. Ae Piŋkop toktok teban ji gat egek paŋpulugosok, do ji paŋteban aŋakwan paŋkewalon dɨma maŋek tebaisi atdaŋ. Paŋkewal noman taŋ damni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da pulugaŋ kɨni dakon kosit kɨnda yɨpdɨsak, aŋakwan yokwikon dɨma mokdaŋ.
do gen tebai dɨma gayɨkeŋ. Amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak da nit kɨsi tɨmɨkdak, do nak gen yaworɨsok gayɨkeŋ. Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋok asat, ae Kristo dakon pi uŋun do aŋek dam tebanon egɨsat.
Not kabɨno, yaŋsi nandani. Dam tebanon nepmaŋ uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon kosit sopsop dɨma asak. Uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi aŋɨreŋ asak.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨnyo kɨsi paŋobɨŋ yɨkgwit. Uŋun amɨn Jerusalem, ae Galili dakon kokup morap toŋ, ae Judia mɨktɨmon da opgwit. Yesu Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Uŋun aŋpak uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi. Uŋun olip dakon nelagɨ yombem. Olip dakon nelagɨ Aron do tagal ɨmɨŋakwa mogɨm daŋgwanikon pɨgek ɨmal dubakni da dɨwarɨkon pɨgɨgɨt.
Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da dɨma yabekban apgut tam, yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma aban.”
Piŋkop da yaŋ nimgut bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgumaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn egɨpneŋ.
Ji tebai atni. Aŋek gen bamɨ naŋ bobaŋ napmɨ do wamni. Aŋek aŋpak kɨlegɨ baŋ pɨbɨt kutnok yaŋ pani.
Gɨptɨmnin uŋun ɨmal yut kabeŋ yombem. Nin nandamaŋ, uŋun mɨktɨm dakon ɨmal yut kabeŋ uŋun tasɨk tosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da nin do yut ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda nimdɨsak. Uŋun yut amɨn kɨsit da dɨma awalbi, Kwen Kokupmon abɨdaŋapno toktogɨsi tokdɨsak.
“Uŋun amɨn bamot niaŋsi aŋyomneŋ? Uŋun da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abal Jerusalem amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋ do arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋwasɨp aneŋ.
Nak abɨŋ nepdosi nandaŋ teban taŋ, do kandap tamono yolek aŋdɨgat ayɨŋ da ekwaŋ.
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aba burɨ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun do nandaŋ gadatji wɨtdal kɨsak, ma?
Nin Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ Tolemes kokup papmon altagɨmaŋ. Uŋudon Yesukon saŋbewit amɨn kabɨ gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨno uŋun gat gɨldat kɨnda egɨpgumaŋ.
Wup kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn nin morap telagɨ pakbi soŋ niban gɨptɨm kaloŋ agɨmaŋ. Juda amɨn nin, ae Grik amɨn, ae oman amɨn, ae oman amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ amɨn nin kɨsi Wup kaloŋɨ butninon abɨdagɨmaŋ.
Yoni mɨni amɨn ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ egɨpdaŋ, mani nak ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
Uŋun do aŋek on amɨn but teban kɨlɨ awit. Gen kalugɨ dɨ gat nandak do kurak taŋek mɨrakni paŋ sopgwit, ae dabɨlni wamaŋ sopgwit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam, dabɨlni ae mɨrakni ae butniyo da kaŋ nandaŋyo aba pɨsaŋban nagon tobɨlba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp abom.’
Nandaŋ yawot uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt da tosok, do nin kɨsisi gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋpulugaŋakwan gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwamaŋ.
Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek but galak do pi ŋwakŋwat ŋwakŋwat nimgut. Do amɨn kɨnda kombɨ gen yosak do pi ɨmgut kaŋ, nandaŋ gadatni taŋ ɨmɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon kombɨ gen yosak.
Nido yokwi da gen tebanon tapmɨm paŋek nak aŋkɨlɨgek nɨkban kɨmakgɨm.
Ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn kɨsisi da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Yesu Kristo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa Piŋkop Dat da man madep pasak.
Aŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasolgoŋ? Sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, ma?”
Nido Yesu obakon yo tagɨsi morapmɨ tɨmɨkgwit. Paŋpulugaŋban gen yogokji uŋun tagɨsi, ae nandak nandak morapmɨ damgut. Uŋun da nak da Kristo dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨgɨm uŋun ji da nandaŋek yol kɨmakgwit yaŋ nolɨsak.
Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak. Yaŋgɨn abɨsok yokwi pakpak amɨn ekwaŋon yaŋ gɨn altosok.”
Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, mɨŋatgo kwɨnɨk yɨpbɨ kwan wɨli kaluk pasak kaŋ, eni gak da gulusuŋ al, do mɨŋatgo da yumabi asak. Aŋakwan wɨli uŋun kaluk pasak uŋun kɨsi yumabi asak. Do mɨŋatgo yumabi dɨma aŋakwan ɨsal dogɨn dɨma kwɨnɨkgi.”
Nin Betlehem kokupmon egek Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam dukwan tosok uŋun dakon geni nandagɨmaŋ. Aŋek uŋun Kiriat Jearim da mɨktɨmon taŋban kagɨmaŋ.
Aŋelo 5 uŋun kweŋni pɨsoŋakwan gɨk kɨnda kundukon da abɨŋ mɨktɨmon kɨlɨ magɨt kagɨm. Gapma dubagɨsi ae kɨdagɨ mɨni uŋun dakon yoma wɨtdal uŋun gɨk do ɨmgwit.
Mani sakwabat uŋun monjɨni dɨ toŋ bo ae uwani dɨ toŋ kaŋ, paŋpulugaŋbɨ Piŋkop da dabɨlon aŋpak madepsi kɨnda uŋun nandaŋ pɨsoni. Uŋun meŋi kɨlani tagɨsi aŋek meŋ datyo da kalɨp pi madep awit uŋun dakon gomani tagɨ sopni. Piŋkop da aŋpak uŋuden do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Not kabɨ, pik kɨndap da olip sop tagɨ potni? Ae wain nap da pik kɨndap dakon sopmɨ tagɨ potni? Yaŋgɨn pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ da pakbisi arɨpmɨ dɨma dagoni.
Ji uŋun yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndakgwit, do uŋun dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokni.
Ae uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn nandaŋ gadat tebaisi amɨn kɨnda do ɨmɨsak. Ae uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn amɨn kɨnda tapmɨm ɨban sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp asak.
Amɨn yokwi da gen yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop da yo nin da amaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma nandɨsak. Piŋkop Wukwisi da nin dakon aŋpaknin dakon mibɨlɨ nandɨsak dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma tosok.”
Pareŋka kɨndap mibɨlon yɨpbi da tosok. Kɨndap morap bamɨ tagɨ dɨma toni uŋun mandaŋ kɨndapmon maba pɨgɨ sokdaŋ.”
Aba Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨkban wɨŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨni mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
Piŋkop da yo morap ak do yagɨt uŋun arɨpmɨsi akdɨsak. Piŋkop da ji Monji Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo gat egɨp egɨpnikon kaloŋɨ egɨpni do yaŋ damgut.
Uŋun Maria da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi Amɨn Tagɨ da kandapmon tagalek busuŋ daŋgwi naŋ ɨkdɨgaŋban kɨbɨdagɨt. Lasarus uŋun Maria gat peni gat dakon olapmɨ.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi 2 da tebaisi yoyɨŋban amɨn morap dakon kɨsit amɨn tetnikon, ae ɨŋamnikon tɨlak kɨnda yɨpgwit. Amɨn ɨsalɨ, ae mani toŋ, ae yoni morapmɨ amɨn, ae yoni mɨni amɨn, ae oman amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ amɨn, ae oman amɨn ekwaŋ amɨn kɨsi tɨlak yopmaŋ yomgwit.
Ae kɨnda yɨgakwan Piŋkop da gen kɨnda aŋalon aŋɨban kaŋ, gen yosok amɨn gen saŋbeŋek dɨma yosak.
“Jon, monjɨno, gak don Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gayɨkdaŋ. Gak Amɨn Tagɨ mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek kositni yuldɨsal.
Mani amɨn kɨnda Yesu do yaŋ dɨma yosak kaŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da dɨma yabekdak, uŋun Kristo dakon uwalni dakon wup da yabekdak. Uŋun don apdɨsak yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit. Uŋun kɨlɨ abɨk da mɨktɨmon egɨsak.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nido kɨni? Dɨsi jap yomgut.”
Yesu ɨleŋon da pɨŋ kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo morapmɨ da yolgwit.
Amɨn uŋun dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, do Yesu uŋudon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ dɨma agɨt.
Nak gak dakonsi, do yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Nak gengo guramɨt do pini asat.
“Yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yagɨt, ‘Abraham dat, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mani amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda da kɨŋ altaŋ yomjak kaŋ, padɨk padɨkno da but tobɨl tagɨ ani.’
Mani don, Pita Antiok kokupmon apgut bɨsapmon nak da paŋmuwukbi da dabɨlon tebai iyɨgɨm, nido gulusuŋ madepsi agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da amɨn bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nandaŋ kokwinjil tagɨ mɨni. Kombɨ amɨn da gen morap yawit uŋun butjilon da tepmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadamal.
Mani ji Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ pawɨljak kaŋ, gen teban da dam tebanon dɨma ekwaŋ.
Amɨn Tagɨ da pini kɨla abeŋ do nak tɨlak aŋek yaŋdagok aŋ namgut. Nak abɨsok ji da dubagɨkon egek papia on mandɨsat, nido jikon obɨŋ ji dakon aŋpak paŋmɨlɨp ak do gen tebai yok do dɨma galak tosot. Amɨn Tagɨ da ji dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋteban abeŋ do pi on namgut. Nandaŋ gadatji paŋupbal akeŋ do dɨma namgut.
‘Uŋun do aŋek wɨli da meŋi datniyo yopmaŋek mɨŋatni gat muwukbal
Nak dat kɨnda da monjɨ yoyɨsak uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ dayɨsat, ji nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimni.
Ae amɨn kɨnda tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek nak dɨma noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma.
Mani, Yawe da yum pɨndagakwan amɨn dɨ da dɨma pabɨŋ yopgwit. Paŋpulugaŋek kɨla amɨn madep yokwi aŋyom do nandawit uŋun tebai yoyɨgɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda da egɨp egɨpno arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak. Naga dakon galaktok yolek egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ. Egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ ae abɨdokeŋ uŋun dakon yaŋ dagok uŋun nagon tosok. Dat da yaŋsi abeŋ dosi yagɨt.”
Kɨŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.”
Yesu yaŋsi nandagɨt, Dat da yo morap kɨla abeŋ do tapmɨm namgut yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae Piŋkopmon da apgum, do ae Piŋkopmon tobɨl kɨkdɨsat yaŋ kɨsi nandagɨt.
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak abɨsok asisi nandaŋ kɨmokdot, Piŋkop da amɨn morap kɨsi do nandaban arɨpsi asak.
Nagal si gawut do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma jokgaljak. Ae lam kɨmot do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban kɨmotjak. Pi tebai aŋakwan wɨgɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi wutjɨban tapmɨmɨ mɨni akdɨsak.
Yaŋban Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Gen bamɨ uŋun yo kɨnda ni?” Pailat gen uŋun iyɨŋek aeni waŋga Juda amɨnon pɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt do gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ da arɨp dɨmasi kosot.
Amɨnon goman morap agɨl uŋun sopbi. Takis mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yopyopmɨ uŋun yopni. Ae kɨla amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morap do gawak yomɨŋek man madep yomni.
Not kabɨ, nak gen wasɨp aŋek galok gen dayɨsat. Ji aŋpakji paŋmɨlɨp aŋek kɨlegɨsi egɨpni. Geno nandaŋek guramɨtni. But kaloŋon da yaworɨsi egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop but dasi galaktaŋ damɨŋek but yawot damɨsak uŋun da ji gat egɨpjak.
Bɨsap morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigaga muwuk muwuk awit, do uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas kɨsi uŋun pigaga kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt.
Yaŋ kaŋek tap wakga kɨŋ tɨpmon tɨdaŋban wagɨl tuwɨl kɨsak yaŋdo si pasalgwit, do tap wakga da buŋɨkon kɨrat madep tap wakga abɨdaŋban akgaŋ 4 kabɨ yopba pɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek wɨsa tepmɨ dagosak do bɨsit pi awit.
Gen yosol uŋun nandano ŋwakŋwarɨsi asak do mibɨlɨ niyɨŋbɨ nandano.”
yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji yaŋsi yoni, ‘Nin kalbi pak ɨŋtaŋapno paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbeŋ.’
“Yaŋ aba pi monjɨ dɨ gat aeni yabekgɨt. Yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji kɨŋ mibɨltok but pɨso yoyɨŋbi amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨni: Nandani, nak bapalo gat ae bulmakau binap amɨn nelagɨ toŋsi kɨlɨ dapmaŋ mandaŋ soŋ yopmat. Jap morap kɨlɨ soŋ paŋnoman aŋ yopmat. Do ji opba monjino do mɨŋat pagɨm uŋun dakon soŋnok aneŋ.’
Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn kɨla ani do manjɨŋ yopgul, ae nin dakon Piŋkop dakon oman ani do mukwa sogok amɨni manjɨŋ yopgul. Uŋun da kɨla amɨn madep egek mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlani akdaŋ.”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Koŋ uŋuden uŋun yum yolyolɨ dɨma. Bɨsiron da tagɨ yolyolɨ.”
Gak tapmɨmgo yolɨŋaki sot amɨn kɨlek toni. Ae tɨlak tapmɨmɨ toŋ ae wasok masɨ masɨmɨ uŋun telagɨ oman amɨngo Yesu uŋun da manon aki.”
Amɨn yokwi da nak pɨŋan da yaŋ aŋgwasaŋ. Aŋek kɨsit kandapyo nokon ɨnjɨŋba geni da gɨptɨmnogwan pɨgeŋ.
Yaŋek Yesu Kristo da manon telagɨ pakbi soni do yoyɨgɨt. Telagɨ pakbi soŋ mudaŋek Pita gɨldat kabi dɨ gat uŋudon egɨpni do iyɨwit.
Yo kalɨpmɨ uŋun toktogɨsi dɨma tagɨt, mani uŋun tɨlɨmni gat apgut, do yo kalugɨ toktok teban tokdɨsak uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da madepsi daman teŋteŋosok.
Nido, on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi morap uŋun Piŋkop da pɨndakban nandaŋ kokwin tagɨ dɨma aŋ. Piŋkop da papiakon uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn iyɨ do nak nandaŋ kokwino tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da iyɨ pat yopmaŋgaŋon yopban yokwalba tɨmɨkdak.”
Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da kɨŋ Pita yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon tek nandano asi gak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon kokup ɨsalni kɨnda yaŋ asak, do gak uŋun da kabɨkon nani yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Yesu dakon paŋdetni dɨ Sisaria egɨpgwit uŋun gat kɨsi wɨgek uŋun da nin paŋkɨ Nason da yutnon nipba egɨpgumaŋ. Nason uŋun kalɨp Yesu kɨlɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut. Mɨktɨmni uŋun Saiprus.
Do ji nak dakon aŋpak kokwin ani, bo amɨn da gen pikon nak dakon aŋpak kokwin ak do nandaŋ kaŋ, nak uŋun do nandaba kɨkjok kɨnda dɨma asat. Nak nagayo kɨsi aŋpakno kokwin dɨma asat.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji on mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yesu yaŋ yaŋek kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi amɨn kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak gayɨsat, gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon gwakni kɨla tagɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dakon kɨla arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi naŋakwa jap nawit dakon dɨwarɨ tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨgɨ 12 yaŋsi tugawit.
“Nayɨŋban kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, arɨpmɨ dɨmasi dapmaŋ nokeŋ. Nak bɨsap kɨndakon jap kɨnda Juda amɨn da gen tebanon dɨma noknogɨ kɨnda dɨmasi nagɨm.’
Nak dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek jɨgɨ pasak uŋun yolɨko pɨndatjak.”
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo yoldat do aŋek dam tebanon egɨsat. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti, nit da papia on Pilimon gak do mandamak. Gak notnin tagɨsi ae pi ɨsalnin.
Aŋek kabap gat ae tɨp gat do yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Ji nin da kwenon maŋ wɨtjɨŋ nimɨŋakwa pasɨlɨ egɨpneŋ. Pasɨlɨ egapno Amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak uŋun dɨma nindasak, ae Sipsip Monɨŋ butjap damani nandaŋek kobogɨ yokwi dɨma nimjak.
Mukwa Yawe da tomnokon da pɨdawit. Aŋakwan mɨleŋ asɨp gen kaganikon da baljaŋek yo morapmɨ sowit. Aŋakwan kɨndap patdet yaban dukwan dukwan kɨsi kɨwit.
Pakbi ɨsal dogɨn tagal kɨ mudoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak tapmɨmno mɨnisi aŋ. Kɨdatno dakon saŋbekni kɨsi kalkalaŋ mudoŋ. Bɨt nelak da pakbi dagoŋ uŋun da tɨlak butno wagɨlsi tapmɨmɨ mɨni pakbi ɨdap asak.
Ae aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋsi kɨnda kaŋapbo gen papmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Namɨn amɨn kɨlegɨsi kɨnda dasi kendol pakbi baŋ paŋteban abi pakdegek papia tagɨ wɨtdaljak?”
Piŋkop Yawe, Tapmɨm Ami, tepmɨsi abɨŋek nak aŋpulugoki. Gak Israel amɨn dakon Piŋkop, tepmɨsi abɨŋ amɨn kabɨ morap egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ tepmɨ pi yobi. Uŋun jamba but amɨnsi, do bupmɨ dɨma nandaŋ yobi.
nandaŋek amɨn kɨsisi nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Uŋun da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak paŋmuwukbi Laodisia kokup papmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋeloni do gen yaŋ mandaki: Nak Piŋkop dakon geni gat ae yaŋ teban tok geni gat do gen uŋun asisi yaŋ yogok amɨn. Nak Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ geni bamɨsi gɨn yaŋ teŋteŋosot. Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt dakon mibɨlɨsi nak da gen on yɨpbo gagon obɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ni tɨlak gen kɨnda naŋ dayɨko amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋpak do nandaba pɨsosak? Uŋun niaŋen amɨn dɨ da ekwaŋ?
Uŋun abɨŋek but yawot dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Gen uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji Piŋkop da dubagɨkon egɨpgwit gat ae Juda amɨn nin kapmatjok egɨpgumaŋ amɨn gat kɨsi do yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Gɨkwem gat ae pɨlɨn gat da aŋgwasamal. Aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨla asak.
Mani dɨsi Moses dakon gen maba kwanek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋi bo datni yaŋ iyɨsak, “Nak yo on kɨlɨ Piŋkop do manjɨgɨm. Dɨma tam tagɨ paŋpulugokom.” ’
Amɨn da monjɨ ŋakŋak Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨsak do paŋopgwit. Uŋun pɨndagek paŋdetni da kɨrɨŋɨk yomgwit.
(Amɨn jap nawit uŋun 4 tausen yaŋ da nawit.) Yaŋ aŋek Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yabekban kɨŋakwa,
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn kabɨ madep Jerusalem egɨpgwit da gen pɨsɨgon da gen yawit. Dɨwarɨ da “Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi” yaŋ yawit. Ae dɨwarɨ da “Dɨma, uŋun amɨn top paŋkewaldak” yaŋ yawit.
Uŋun dɨma kaŋ, ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Amɨn kɨnda da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni mani toŋsi pagɨt uŋun kok do kɨwit? Dɨma, kɨla amɨn madep da yutnon uŋuden amɨn da ekwaŋ.
Butgo oman amɨngo nagon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Butdasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do uwal da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpakni tagɨsi noman gɨn toŋ. Mani, amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun noman dɨma toŋ, uŋun don noman tokdaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap, yaŋ sɨmɨl aŋek Yawe dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae tapmɨm madepni gat do yoni.
Piŋkop, butnokon da gak do tebai nandaŋ gadasat. Asi, nak wagɨl gakdosi nandaŋ gadasat. Nak mango awɨgɨk do kap yokdɨsat.
Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
Pol uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat, ae amɨn iyɨ do kɨla aŋek aŋpak kalɨpmɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋek egɨp egɨp dakon gen gat, ae Piŋkop da don gen pikon nipdɨsak uŋun do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋakwan Peliks da nandaŋ pasalek yagɨt, “Gak nipmaŋ dek kɨki. Don bɨkbɨkno kɨnda taŋban kaŋ opbi do gen yɨpbo opjak.”
Wupnin gɨldat paŋop do noman toŋ da gɨldat pɨgakwan pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak nak pasɨl do asat. Nak pɨlak pɨlak kɨnda mɨrɨm da aŋkɨ maban kɨsak uŋun yombem.
Josep uŋun mɨktɨm tɨmni kɨnda amɨn do yomɨŋek moneŋ tɨmɨk paŋkɨ yabekbi kabɨ do yomgut.
Uŋun but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsak. Uŋun pasɨlɨ tamono, ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Uŋun pasɨkno tebaisi, do aŋkutnaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨsat. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Sunduk uŋun Kwen Kokup da mal da yaŋ maŋban kagɨm.
Iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ egapbo tapmɨmno wagɨlsi maŋ mudoŋ. Kalbi morap kunam pakbino da tamono wagɨlsi aŋgɨk asak. Kunam tagapbo busuŋ kɨdɨŋno madepsi gɨk tosok.
Aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Moses, kandap gwɨlgo ɨlɨk yopmaŋ. Mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun bamaŋ akdal uŋun telagɨ mɨktɨm.
Mani gen teban da nak kɨmoron nepgut, do abɨsok egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok. Nak Kristo gat kɨsi tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨmakgɨmak.
jɨgɨ morapni altaŋ ɨmgwit uŋun aŋpulugaŋek kukwaŋ ɨmgut. Aŋakwan Josep da Isip dakon kɨla amɨn madep Pero gat gen yagɨmal bɨsapmon Piŋkop da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi ɨmɨŋakwan kɨla amɨn madep da kaŋban tagɨsi agɨt. Yaŋ kagɨt do Isip mɨktɨm ae yutni dakon yo morap kɨla asak do yɨpgut.
Yaŋban Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk gak nepmaŋ det! Kosit sopsop dɨma aŋnam. Gak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak naŋ dɨma yoldal, gak amɨn dakon nandak nandak naŋ yoldal.”
Samuel da bɨsapmon Piŋkop da kɨla amɨn madepni kɨnda aŋalon aŋyomjak do Israel amɨn da yawit. Yaŋba Samuel da Sol, Kis dakon monji naŋ aŋalon aŋ yoban uŋun da kɨlani aŋakwan bɨlak 40 yaŋ agɨt. (Sol uŋun Benjamin da jalapmon nani kɨnda.)
Piŋkop dakon aŋpak uŋun wagɨl kɨlegɨsi. Yo kɨnda ak do yaŋ teban tok asak kaŋ, geni uŋun bamɨ noman tokdaŋ. Yawe uŋun pasɨk yombem, do amɨn morap uwal da dɨma pɨndatni yaŋ do uŋudon kɨŋ pasɨlakwa tagɨsi paŋkutnosok.
“Buŋon don mɨŋat kabɨ pakbi do kɨwit uŋun abɨŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn tagɨ, abɨŋ yoma wɨtdal nim!’
Gagon opbeŋ do nayɨsal, do Yawe nak kɨlɨ uŋun obɨsat.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn morap joŋ tɨmon yɨtni do yoyɨgɨt. Aŋek bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamot pabɨdaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek bret jokgalek paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yomgwit.
Piŋkop da nin iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, do namɨn da gen pikon nipjak? Piŋkop da iyɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak.
Gak kɨla amɨn madep egek aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨlani aŋek gen kokwin pi kɨlegɨsi asal. Gak mɨŋat amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek gengo aŋteban aŋek tagɨsi paŋpulugosol.
Altaŋek Pega kokupmon Piŋkop gen yoyɨŋek Atalia kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal.
Yaŋban Saimon da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nak do bɨsit abal Amɨn Tagɨ da nak do nandaŋ yawok namɨŋakwan yo uŋun yomal uŋun nagon dɨma noman toni.”
“Amɨn kɨnda nagon toktogɨ dɨma saŋbesak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨŋɨ yokwi yombem. Kɨlɨŋɨ uŋuden amɨn da mandaŋ yopba kɨbɨdaŋba paŋ muwuk kɨndapmon sosoŋ.
Yaŋdo, ji abɨsok aŋ, yaŋ gɨn notji paŋpulugaŋek butni paŋteban aŋ aŋ ani.
Top gen kɨnda dɨmasi yawit. Gulusuŋni mɨni egɨpgwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ bamɨsi yosol. Yaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdɨsal.”
Pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki nak abɨŋ nep do yoŋ amɨn da dɨma aŋupbal ani. Yaŋ aŋaki gengo guramɨkgeŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋakwan mɨŋat dɨma paŋek tagɨ egɨpni.
Mɨktɨm dɨwarɨ taŋ aŋ aŋ kwaŋ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo do yaŋ dɨma agɨt. Nawa geni dɨma nandaŋ. Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini!
Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yagɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon don nokeŋ. Do abɨdaŋek dɨsi kokwin aŋek noni.”
Pita gat notni bamot gat dɨpmɨn do yokwisi awit. Mani dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋ Yesu tɨlɨmni gat ae amɨn bamot gat kɨsi akba pɨndakgwit.
Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ uwal da nak gen yokwi nayaŋ. Tasɨk tokeŋ do yaŋek yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ.
Asisi dayɨsat, kalɨp kombɨ amɨn morapmɨ gat ae amɨn kɨlegɨ morapmɨ gat da yo ji da abɨsok pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ uŋun pɨndat do but kɨndap pawit, mani dɨma pɨndakgwit. Ae abɨsok ji da gen nandaŋ uŋun nandak do but kɨndap pawit, mani dɨma nandawit.”
Nak da uwalni paŋmayak akdɨsat. Mani kɨla amɨn madepno tɨlɨm madepni gat yɨtdɨsak.”
Iyɨ da nandak nandagon da kundu ae yo morap kwen toŋ uŋun wasagɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Nandani. Jap nosok amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn bo jap pɨlɨkdak amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn? Jap naŋek yɨkdak amɨn uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn asak. Mani nak ji da binapmon oman monjɨsi egɨsat.
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun yaŋ gɨn kɨlɨ agɨt. Amɨn da oman aŋ tyuɨmni do dɨma pɨgɨt. Iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap paŋpulugokdo, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨmnaŋ paregek yumaŋ naŋ yop do pɨgɨt.”
Ɨmɨŋba abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨmal garagɨ mɨni kɨnda naŋ wamaŋek
Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun yo yokwisi kapbɨ da dɨma dapba kɨmakgwit amɨn but tobɨl dɨma awit. Koŋ gat ae kokup kɨdat iyɨ kɨsit da wasawit gat sigɨn gawak yomgwit. Kokup kɨdat uŋun gol ae silwa ae ain kɨnda mani bras ae tɨp ae kɨndap baŋ wasawit, uŋun dɨma sɨŋtoŋ ae gen dɨma nandaŋ ae kosit dɨma akwaŋ.
Nak uŋun do butdasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek uŋun paŋpulugok do bɨsit asat, mani gen yaŋ namaŋ.
Gak da aŋpak kɨlegɨ asal uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabi morapmɨ kɨsi gak gawak gamdo muwukgaŋon yoyɨsat. Yawe gaga nandɨsal, nak gen mapmɨt dɨma asat.
Yaŋ di aŋakwa kɨla amɨn morapmɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Mani Parisi amɨn do pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit. Parisi amɨn da muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ yolba waŋga egɨpni uŋundo si pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Kristo dakon paŋmuwukbi morap Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit uŋun da nak dɨma nandaŋ namgwit.
“Mani kɨla amɨn da monji kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do aŋatno kɨmagakwan wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
Apban kokup ɨsalni gat ae yo do bɨsit yaŋakwan kawit amɨn gat da yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn uŋun kalɨp yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt uŋun amɨn bo?”
Jiyo kɨsi Kristokon gadaŋba Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨni gat paŋmuwukban Piŋkop dakon yutni awit. Piŋkop Telagɨ Wupmon da uŋun yutnon egɨsak.
“Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jerusalem kokup papmon yo morap agɨt uŋun nin kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmaŋ. Ae tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Mɨnam monɨŋ uŋun yo monɨŋɨsok, 5 kabɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun moneŋ gɨman tabɨlɨ bamorɨ gɨn. Mani Piŋkop da mɨnam monɨŋgok uŋun dakon kɨndasok dɨmasi ɨŋtaŋ ɨmgut.
Do yaŋ yosot, “Nak gagon kɨlɨ abɨsat. Kalɨp nak do gen kɨlɨ mandabi uŋun yaŋ,
“Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn, awa! Nandak nandak pakpak tamo dakon yoma wɨtdal dɨsi kɨlɨ gwayewit. Dɨsi uŋungwan dɨma wɨgɨwit. Aŋek uŋungwan wɨgɨk do awit amɨn ji da kosit sopsop aŋyomgwit.”
Erastas uŋun kokup pap Korinon sigɨn egɨsak. Aŋakwan Tropimus uŋun sot agɨt, do kokup pap Miletus uŋudon yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm da egɨsak.
Gak monɨŋɨsok egɨpgul bɨsapmon Piŋkop dakon gen telagɨ papianikon toŋ nandak nandak uŋudon wasaŋek pagɨl. Papia uŋun da nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tagɨ gamjak. Nandak nandak kɨlegɨ uŋun yaŋ: Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋaki Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosak.
Mani amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek dɨma guramɨkdak amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun yutni teban tokni mɨni ɨsal mɨktɨm kwenon gɨn agɨt. Don pakbi ɨgek yut uŋun tɨdaŋban uŋudon gɨn tuwɨl kɨ madepsi tasɨk tagɨt.”
Yoyɨŋba amɨn kɨsisi Yesu kok do abɨŋ mudawit. Abɨŋ kaŋek mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋek kɨsak do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, nak gen gayɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asak. Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon Dat gawak ɨmɨm uŋun on ɨleŋon dɨma tokdɨsak, ae Jerusalemyo kɨsikon dɨma tokdɨsak.
Gak dasi mɨktɨm morap dakon wasɨpni yopgul. Ae bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ dakon gɨldat ae sɨkak bɨsap yopgul.
Amɨn da gɨldat wɨsak ae si pɨgɨsak tet, ae not tet ae saut tet da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon abɨŋek jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
Yesu uŋun niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ kok do pi tebai agɨt. Mani Sakius uŋun amɨn pɨsɨpmɨ, ae amɨn morapmɨ da muwugek kosit sopgwit, do Yesu kok do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
Uŋun yo morap wasagɨtgwan amɨn nin da wukwini egɨpneŋ do aŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek gen bamɨ niban mɨŋat monjɨni dagagɨmaŋ.
Not kabɨ, Kloi da kabɨkon amɨn dɨ da ji da binapmon pɨdok pɨdok taŋakwan ekwaŋ yaŋ nayɨwit.
Uŋun do ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo paŋpulugaŋba nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno dagoni. Aŋek Dat ae Monji ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun da manon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomni.
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ yoni: ‘Dat, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak. Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbi kɨnda da on papia mandɨsat. Piŋkopnin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin gat ae Yesu Kristo uŋun nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋek ekwamaŋ uŋun bamot da nak yabekbi pi abeŋ dosi nayɨgɨmal.
Ae Piŋkop da uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn manjɨgɨt bɨsapmon, uŋun gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek manjɨgɨt. Mukwa sogok kalɨpmɨ do yaŋ dɨma agɨt.
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨsi morap pɨndakban egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ekwaŋ, do Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon Piŋkop.”
Josep nandaŋ gadat aŋek si kɨmot do aŋek yagɨt “Israel amɨn don Isip mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek kɨkdaŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek don kɨmakban iyɨ dakon kɨdarɨ tɨmɨgek niaŋ ani uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋban koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek monjɨ uŋun maban bumjot yombem pagakwan koŋ yɨpmaŋek wɨŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kuŋwakni.”
Uŋun Rom abɨŋek nak nandak do pi madepsi aŋek wɨsɨgɨt aŋek don nak nandagɨt.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn uŋun nak aŋmɨlɨp ak uŋun da yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ ”
Amɨn kɨnda yumabi aŋpak asak do kaŋ kɨmotni. Bo amɨn kɨnda Iso da Piŋkop manji ɨmgut uŋudeŋ asak do kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun jap bɨsap kaloŋ noknogɨ uŋun tɨmɨt dogɨn aŋek yo kabɨni monjɨ mibɨltogɨ amɨn da tɨmɨrɨ uŋun kɨsi ɨmgut.
Yesu gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋba Yesu mɨŋat kɨnda gat gen yaŋbal pɨndagek wɨrɨpdakgwit. Mani “Gak yo nido galak tosol?” bo “Nido on mɨŋat gat gen yomal?” yaŋ kɨnda da Yesu dɨma iyɨwit.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da on amɨn nagon aŋabɨŋ uŋun da amɨn kwen wɨgɨk ani do yoyɨsak yaŋ nayeŋ. Mani kɨsin egek uŋun yo morap dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨt. Ji da gen morap yaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun nak da koko bamɨ dɨma asak.
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon nandaŋ gadat wɨtdal kɨsak kaŋ, nak yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ.”
Amɨn kɨnda da ‘Nido yaŋ amal’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da pi kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok’ yaŋ iyɨŋbal uŋun da tepmɨ daban paŋopjil.”
Do aŋwa gɨldat do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. Gɨldat kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon jɨgɨ uŋun iyɨ da arɨpmon taŋ taŋ aŋ.”
Aban amɨn morap kɨsi pasalek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kombɨ amɨn madepsi kɨnda nin da bɨkbɨgon altaŋban komaŋ. Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni Israel paŋpulugok do abɨk.”
Mani, Piŋkop da yaŋ yolɨgɨt, yo morap noman tokdaŋ do kombɨ gen yawit, uŋun da bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni. Abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn ji da bɨsapmon noman toni do yawit. Telagɨ Wup Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup naŋ yabekban pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn tapmɨm yoban Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek Piŋkop da yo asak do kɨlɨ dayɨwit. Aŋelo kɨsi Piŋkop da ji do yo tagɨsi agɨt uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo akdo tagɨsi nandaŋ.
Ae aŋelo kɨnda Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon da abɨgɨ amɨn uŋun gɨkwemon yɨkgɨt uŋun tebaisi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sɨbago abɨdaŋek jap bamɨ taŋ balja. Mɨktɨmon jap morap kɨsi kɨlɨ pik taŋ, do abɨsok jap uŋun baljoki dakon bɨsap.”
“Gen kagani uŋun kɨmakbi tamo yombem. Top gen morapmɨ yoŋ.” “Tuŋon amɨn dakon pakbi emarɨ toŋ gen dulumnikon da moŋ.”
Ae Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nakyo kɨsi aŋpulugosak. Aŋakwan geni nak da gen kagakon yɨpmaŋakwan pasol pasol abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon gen pasɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Bɨsap kapbɨ nak kɨndap kɨrɨŋ baŋ baljawit. Bɨsap kɨndakon tɨp baŋ nɨkgwit. Bɨsap kapbɨ tap wakgakon agapbo tuwɨl kɨwit. Kɨnda da tuwɨl kɨgɨt bɨsapmon nak tap ɨdapmon pɨlɨn kɨnda ae gɨldat kɨnda pakbi da awɨlgɨt.
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ ae yokwiyo kɨsi don kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdokdaŋ uŋun do nandaŋ teban taŋek egɨsat. On amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo’ yombem asak.”
Jikon jap dɨma tɨmɨtneŋ yaŋon da dɨma. Jap nimnisi do tagɨ dayɨnom, mani yaŋ dɨma agɨmaŋ. Nido, aŋpak tagɨsi dɨsi yolek ani, nin uŋun dolɨk do aŋek uŋun do yaŋ agɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨ aŋnɨŋnɨŋ aban kɨlek taŋ kɨsirɨ terɨ kɨnda yombem gɨn agɨt.
Yawe bɨsitno nandaki. Mɨrakgo yopmaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nandaki. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma nepmaŋ dekdal, do bɨsitno nandaki.
Yesu uŋun gat gɨldat bamorɨ egɨ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Dɨma. Joŋ yokwi pɨlɨtni kaŋ, jap bamɨ dɨ kɨsi pɨlɨtdaŋ.
Spen mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep gat ae tap binap mɨktɨm tɨm toŋ uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep kɨsi da gawat gawat aŋ ɨmɨŋek yo tomni madep baŋ ɨmni. Arebia mɨktɨm gat ae Seba mɨktɨm gat dakon kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak mano Amɨn Kabɨ Madep. Nin morapmɨ da ekwamaŋ.”
Mani uŋun kokup papmon amɨn kabi bamorɨ pudaŋ kɨwit. Kabi kɨnda Juda amɨn gat akgwit, ae kabi kɨnda yabekbi bamot gat akgwit.
Nin nandaŋ gadatnin gat ae yo tagɨsi do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋek ekwamaŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ do nandaŋ gadatnin tebaisi abɨdaŋek but bamot dɨmasi aneŋ. Nido, yo morap Piŋkop da ak do yaŋ teban tok agɨt, uŋun asisi akdɨsaksi.
Nak gapma dubagɨsikon maŋ neŋak kagagwan egapbo Yawe da ɨlɨkban wɨgɨm. Awɨŋ tɨp kwenon nepban kosit tagɨ agɨpgum.
Asi, gen yogokno tagɨsi dɨma, mani nandak nandakno uŋun tagɨsi. Uŋun nandak nandakno aŋpak morap agɨmaŋon kɨlɨ dolɨgɨmaŋ.
Yawe on gɨldat uŋun nin do nimɨk. Nin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek but galak nandaneŋ.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨgek sɨŋtaŋban pɨŋakwan mɨktɨmon amɨn morap pɨndakdak.
Sunduk dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun da iyɨ do nin Juda amɨn yaŋ yoŋ, mani uŋun Piŋkop dakon amɨn dɨma, uŋun top amɨn. Nak da uŋun amɨn yabekgo abɨŋ gak da kandap mibɨlon ŋwakbeŋ aŋek nak da ji but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat yaŋsi nandani.
Uŋun Grik amɨn da Pilip kɨŋ kawit. (Pilip uŋun Galili provins Betsaida kokupmon nani.) Yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn tagɨ, nin Yesu kok do abamaŋ.”
Ae jɨgɨ abɨsok paŋ uŋun paŋyawot aŋakwan yaworɨ egɨpdaŋ, ae ninyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn. Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu aŋeloni tapmɨmɨ toŋ gat ae kɨndap teban gat Kwen Kokup yɨpmaŋ degek noman tosak bɨsapmon Piŋkop da yo yaŋ akdɨsak.
Kɨla amɨn madep gak monjɨgo morapmɨsi altokdaŋ. Uŋun da datgoni dakon tamo tɨmɨgek man madep paŋek mɨktɨm morapmon mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨla akdaŋ.
Uŋudon gɨn Yesu da paŋdetni yoyɨŋban boron wɨgek Betsaida kokupmon mibɨl taŋ kɨŋakwa Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yoyɨŋban waseŋ kɨwit.
Piŋkop aŋkɨlɨt do aŋek yaŋ awit, jap si galak tawit uŋun si yomjak dosi tebai iyɨwit.
Ji kɨla amɨn madep gat ae amɨn gat ae gapman gat ae kɨla amɨn morap gat,
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Pi uŋun on mɨktɨm. Aŋek jap yet tagɨ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan ekwaŋ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo. Ae joŋ yokwi uŋun Yokwi Ami dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo.
Kɨlago asak, do arɨpmɨ dɨma maŋ pokgi. Kɨlago aŋek dɨpmɨn dɨma pokdok.
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo, Yawe da nin uwal da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nipgut, do yaŋsi yaŋek mani aŋkɨsini.
Piŋkop da kokup papni telagɨ kabapmon agɨt.
Ji aesi kalɨp Piŋkop dakon teŋteŋɨ abɨdawit bɨsap uŋun do nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ tepmɨyo madepsi pawit, mani ji tebaisi akgwit.
Ae aŋelo kɨnda gat Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep Kwen Kokup tosok uŋun yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨgɨt. Uŋunyo kɨsi jap bamɨ pakpak sɨbani geni tepmɨsi kɨnda abɨdagɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon dabɨl aŋupbal asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon dabɨlniyo kɨsi aŋupbal ani. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon geni aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon geni kɨsi aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtni.’
Nak Amɨn Tagɨ dakon galaktok yolek gen on dɨma yosot. Nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dagaŋek naga dakon man awɨgɨsat.
Amɨn egɨp egɨpni moneŋon gɨn toŋ yaŋ nandaŋek pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋ amɨn uŋun da nak aŋgwasɨŋek aŋupbal ak do aŋ. Mani uŋun aŋ amɨn do dɨma pasolgeŋ.
Yaŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon galaktokni yolek pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ uŋun da japno asak.
Ae ji ‘Namɨn da kɨmakbi tamokon pɨgɨsak’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Gen uŋun yoni uŋun da Kristo kɨmakbi tamokon naŋ awɨk do nandaŋ yaŋ asak.”
Tap Ɨdap Gami Israel amɨn pɨndagek pasal kɨgɨt. Ae Jodan Pakbi ɨsal taŋek dɨma pak kɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da Mata yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mata, gak yo morapmɨ do nandaba kɨk aŋek butgo yokwi tosok.
Piŋkop da yo uŋun akdɨsak, ji uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ. Mani abɨsok bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok dogɨn paŋkɨlɨt mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da noman taŋ damɨŋakwa tepmɨ paŋ.
Nin bɨlak 70 yaŋ da arɨpmon gɨn ekwamaŋ. Ae tapmɨmnin toni kaŋ, bɨlak 80 da arɨp tagɨ egɨpneŋ. Mani uŋun bɨlak morap ekwamaŋon, nin pi madepsi amaŋ, aŋek jɨgɨ morapmɨ paŋalon amaŋ. Uŋun bɨlak morap tepmɨsi kɨŋ mudaŋakwa nin tepmɨsi pasɨlgamaŋ.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gen yaŋ gamaŋ amɨn da abɨŋ altaŋakwa gengo don nandakeŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek obip amɨni yoyɨŋban Pol kɨla amɨn madep Erot da kalɨp yut madep agɨt uŋudon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani ani do yoyɨgɨt.
Dabɨl da kagɨmal, mani uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmal.
Gaga dakon aŋpak ae yoyɨŋdet agakgo do kɨla tagɨsi abi. Si teban taŋek sigɨn abi kaŋ, Piŋkop da gaga gat ae gengo nandaŋ amɨn gat kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: Kristo uŋun tepmɨ paŋek gɨldat kapbɨ egek kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.
Mɨktɨmon amɨn morap gak gawak gamaŋ. Kap yaŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋbal gen kokwin amɨn da saŋbeŋek but pasol gen dɨwarɨ yoyɨŋek amɨn do pasalek yopba kɨgɨmal. Amɨn da wasok agɨmal uŋun do Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit. Do ni jɨgɨ naŋ tagɨ yomneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandawit.
Piŋkop da butnin paŋkɨlɨk nindaŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoneŋ dakon pi nimgut. Yaŋdo, mɨŋat amɨnyo da nindaba pi tagɨsi aŋ yaŋ nindani do dɨma amaŋ. Piŋkop nin dakon but pɨndat pɨndat amɨn uŋun da nindaban tagɨsi amaŋ uŋun dogɨn nandaŋek amaŋ.
Gen tebango guramɨgek emat pɨdokyo aŋ amɨn dakon aŋpak manji yomgum.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn iyɨ yokwi agɨt bo ae meŋ datniyo da yokwi agɨmal uŋun do dɨma. Piŋkop da wasok kɨnda on amɨnon noman aban amɨn da koni do dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt.
Yawe da toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak ae amɨn kabɨni tagɨsi paŋpulugosok, do ya yaŋsi iyɨni.
Yaŋ aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨktɨmni amɨn kabɨni Israel do yomgut.
Pita da gen yaŋakwan gɨn gɨkwem teŋteŋɨni madep da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomɨŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat, ae uŋun do nandabo wagɨl tagɨsisi asak. Ji geni nandani.”
Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da abɨŋ amɨn paŋkewalba yokwi aŋek maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani uŋun yokwi ani do dayɨkdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Piŋkop tɨp madepno yaŋ iyɨsat, “Gak nido ɨŋtaŋ namɨsal? Yum pɨndagaki uwal da abɨŋ nepmaŋakwa butno nido obɨsi jɨk tosok?”
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ ɨlɨk pigaga da waŋga aŋaŋ abɨgɨ aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Terɨ terɨ kɨsi da nak aŋgwasɨwit, mani Yawe da manon dapbo pasɨlgwit.
Teŋteŋɨgo gat ae gengo bamɨ gat yopbɨ nagon obɨŋek kosit nolɨnjil. Nolɨŋbal kaŋek nomansi telagɨ ɨleŋgokon gaga egɨsalon wɨgɨkeŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mesaia, mani Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ, uŋun don apjak yaŋ nandɨsat. Uŋun da abɨŋ yo morap niyɨŋ paŋteŋteŋ aŋ mudokdɨsak.”
Geno on yosot uŋun do nandaki, aŋaki Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandakgo aban pɨsaŋban gen morap uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandabɨ pɨsokdɨsak.
Asi, Juda amɨn ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban abɨdawit, ae amɨn da gɨptɨmji mandawit. Mani ji gen teban kɨrɨŋɨkgaŋ kaŋ, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon aŋpak tagɨ da Juda amɨn ji amɨn yokwi yaŋ dolɨkdɨsak, nido iyɨ gɨptɨm mandak dɨma aŋ mani gen teban guramɨkgaŋ.
Gak toktogɨsi nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun dakon geni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ wɨgɨkeŋ. Gak gengo aŋteban aŋek nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosol. Uŋun aŋpak kundu da tebai tosok uŋudeŋ toktogɨsi tokdɨsak.
Paŋmuwukbi da muwut muwuron mɨŋat gen yoni kaŋ uŋun mayagɨ, do gen kɨnda dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do kaŋ, yutnikon eni baŋ yoyɨŋba tagɨ yoyɨni.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit.
Aŋek kɨndɨrɨŋ kɨnda wagɨl mani toŋsi tomni wukwisi kɨnda kosok bɨsapmon kɨŋ yo kabɨni taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun kɨsisi amɨnon yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋɨ baŋ uŋun kɨndɨrɨŋ tagɨsi yumgut.”
Yaŋ nandaŋakwan iyɨgɨt, “Maria, dɨma pasolgi. Piŋkop da gak do nandaban tagɨsi asak.
Nin ji dandak do tepmɨsi nandagɨmaŋ, do gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek nit Atens kokupmon egek
Mani Yesu Jerusalem kɨkdɨsak yaŋ nandawit, do uŋun kokupmon amɨn da Yesu abɨdok do dɨma galak tawit.
Mani nak toktogɨsi gak nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨŋek aŋpulugoki do jomjom abeŋ. Mango madepsi sigɨn awɨgɨkeŋ.
Nido, Yawe da mɨŋat amɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma yopmaŋ detjak. Asisi, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do manjɨgɨt uŋun manji arɨpmɨ dɨma yomjak.
Ae Kristo Kwen Kokup kɨlɨ wɨgɨgɨt da abɨsok Piŋkop da amɨn tet do yɨkdak. Yɨgakwan aŋelo ae kɨla amɨn madep, ae yo morap tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun da pɨŋbini ekwaŋ.
Ji Yawe da nagalgwan Piŋkop da yutnon omani aŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Wasaŋek gomani paŋkɨlek aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun amɨn goman moneŋ 50 milion danari.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn da kɨŋ “Niaŋ aŋek Yesu aŋatneŋ?” yaŋon da gen paŋkosit awit.
Aŋek Yesu da kandap mibɨlon gawak ɨmɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Amɨn uŋun Samaria amɨn kɨnda.
Uŋun da joŋ kɨlap do jap yomɨsak, ae mɨnam pɨdɨkyo kɨsi yaŋ tɨdaŋba jap yomɨsak.
Epaprodaitas ji dandak do tepmɨsi nandɨsak, ae but yokwi yo kɨsi asak, nido sot madepsi da abɨdagɨt dakon geni ji kɨlɨ nandaŋek bupmɨ madepsi nandawit, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do bupmɨ nandɨsak.
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa mɨŋat wɨliyo morapmɨ da Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbewit.
Kaŋapbo nayɨgɨt, ‘Babɨknin dakon Piŋkop da gak da niaŋsi abi do nandɨsak uŋun golɨŋban koki do manjɨŋ gepgut. Ae Amɨn Kɨlegɨ kaŋaki uŋun da iyɨ gen gayɨŋban nandaki do manjɨŋ gepgut.
Ji nak da aŋpak uŋun at dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ uŋun nandaŋ. Ji yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ.
Yesu uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon yo yaŋ agɨt, do Juda amɨn da wasaŋek yo yokwi aŋɨmgwit.
Ae bɨsap si yɨpguron nak da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon Monji do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ do Monji nolɨgɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨgɨm.
Morapmɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ kɨnda burɨkon egakwan but upbal asak. Ji nido geni nandaŋ?”
Uŋun aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek, wagat wagat, ae nandaba yokwi tok, ae pɨndak galaktok, ae amɨn dapba kɨmot dakon aŋpak, ae emat, ae top gen, ae gwayeŋ yok uŋun amɨnon tugosok.
Gen dayɨsat uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi do yosot. Kaŋ kɨmotni.”
Yaŋ aŋakwan uŋun kokup papmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi awit.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop da butni kaŋban tagɨsi asak uŋun amɨn Juda amɨn bamɨsi. Gɨptɨm mandak dakon aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen teban guramɨt aŋpak da dɨma aŋalon asak, Piŋkop dakon Wup da amɨn buron aŋalon asak. Uŋun amɨn amɨn da mani dɨma awɨkwaŋ, Piŋkop da mani awɨgɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi uŋun yokwi ak do nandaban teban toŋ. Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do tagap tok asak, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ top yosok.
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨni paŋtagap aban bɨsap morapmɨ ae kosit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨkon da geni yoyɨŋban babɨknin da nandawit.
Yo kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn andeŋ do niyɨwit. Nit yoni mɨni amɨn uŋun do nandaŋ yomɨŋek paŋpulugondeŋ do niyɨwit. Uŋun dakon pi ak do tagɨsi nandagɨm.
Mani nak do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨki do nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dakon yaŋ tɨdok aŋek burɨ tagɨsi toni dosi nandɨsat. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaŋ yoni, “Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi! Oman amɨni tagɨsi egɨpjak do but galaksi nandɨsak.”
Butjapni pakbi da yaŋ ɨgek tɨmɨkban tagɨ pasɨlnom.
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek dam tebanon yɨp do awit, mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Amɨn bamot Debe kokup papmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋakwal amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Aŋek uŋudon da tobɨl Lista ae Ikoniam ae Antiok kɨgɨmal.
Ji Taitus kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgwit. Taitus uŋun nak gat gadat gadaron da ji paŋpulugok do pi kaloŋɨ amak. Ae amɨn bamot do yaŋsi nandani, uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon ɨŋam tɨmɨgek akwamal, ae Kristo man madep ɨmamal.
Yesu Lasarus da sot agɨt uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek kokup egɨpguron gɨldat bamorɨ gat egɨpgut.
Juda amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
Konilias da uŋun amɨn kapbɨ yo morap altaŋ ɨmeŋ uŋun kɨsi yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yabekban Jopa kɨwit.
Aŋek yɨpban yut madepni gat ae yo morapni kɨla asak do man madep ɨmgut.
Gen morap uŋun do kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da papiakon kɨlɨ mandawit uŋun da arɨpmon aŋ mudawit. Yaŋ aŋek bumjotni don tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ kukwaŋ aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamokon yɨpgwit.
Yokwi da saŋbeŋek kɨlasi dɨma akdɨsak, nido ji gen teban da kɨsiron dɨma ekwaŋ. Ji Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot da kagagwan ekwaŋ.
Uŋun iyɨ dakon man awɨgek yumabi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨt. Do yokwi morapmɨ uŋun agɨt, uŋun da arɨpmonsi tepmɨ madepsi ɨmɨŋakwa kunam morapmɨsi tatjak. Uŋun iyɨ dakon man awɨgek yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak mɨŋat madep egɨsat, do mɨŋat madep da yɨtyɨt tamo madepmon nak uŋudon yɨkdat. Nak mɨŋat sakwabat da yaŋ ɨsal dɨma egɨsat. Jɨgɨ abɨsok dɨma altaŋ namni aŋakwa kunam arɨpmɨ dɨma takgeŋ. Arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.’
Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba baŋ dɨma wɨtjɨŋba toŋ. Kwen tamonikon yopba yut kagagwan amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋaŋ yomaŋ.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn dukwan egɨsak?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
“Amɨn Tagɨ, oman monjɨno yutnon pokdok. Kɨdarɨ alek taŋ, ae tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kokupmon kɨŋ kaŋbal amɨn kɨnda pakbi kwoba kɨnda guramɨk apban jil gat domdom akdaŋ. Jil uŋun amɨn naŋ yol aŋkɨnjil.
Yaŋban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ninon bret mɨni uŋun do bo yosok?”
Aŋakwa bɨsap kɨndakon koŋ kɨnda da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Yesu nandaŋ ɨmɨsat, ae Pol yo kɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Mani ji namɨn?”
Amɨn kɨlegɨ da uŋun yo noman taŋ gaba pɨndagek si pasoldaŋ. Gak do jɨkgo yanjaŋ gamɨŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ,
Saŋbek saŋbek kalɨpmɨ da bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn morap gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ agek pini aŋ aŋ awit. Uŋun mukwa kaloŋ naŋ gɨn bɨsap morapmɨ soŋ soŋ awit, ae uŋun da yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨrɨrɨrɨ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋba amɨn kɨsi muwut muwut yut yɨpmaŋek yomakon pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa Juda amɨn morapmɨ gat ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani morapmɨ Juda amɨnon saŋbeŋek Piŋkop but dasi gawak ɨmgwit amɨn gat kɨsi Pol gat Banabas gat yolgwit. Yolakwa amɨn bamot da Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni do nandaŋek tebaisi agek egɨ aŋaŋ kɨni do yoyɨŋ paŋteban agɨmal.
Piŋkop da yaŋ abeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do amɨn uŋun ji da kɨsiron yɨpgut. Yɨpban ji da amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron yɨpba uŋun da abɨdaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot, do nandaŋ nabi dosi nandɨsat. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon nandak nandak tagɨsi nabi.
Yawe kundu ae mɨktɨm wasagɨt uŋun Saion egɨsak, uŋun da yo tagɨsi aŋdamjak dosi nandɨsat.
Not kabɨ, nak kalɨp ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon gen dayɨgɨm uŋun Telagɨ Wup yolgaŋ amɨn yoyɨsat uŋun da arɨpmon dɨma dayɨgɨm. Amɨn but kalɨp aŋpak aŋakwa yoyɨsat uŋun da tɨlagon dayɨgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji Kristo da aŋpagon amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon egɨpgwit.
Amɨn yokwi uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn gat ae wadak wadak aŋ amɨn yam do emat agak sɨbani yɨknikon baŋ ɨlɨkgaŋ, ae obip paŋɨlɨkgaŋ. Uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ yolgaŋ amɨn dapba kɨmot do aŋ.
Kristo da nak amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yobeŋ do dɨma yabekgɨt. Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ do yabekgɨt. Ae amɨn da mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsikon da gen yoŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma yosot. Yaŋ asat yaŋ Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndapni yɨpbo tapmɨmɨ mɨni dɨ aban.
Idom amɨn, ae Ismael amɨn, ae Moap amɨn, ae Akri amɨn,
Gak Kɨla Amɨn Madepno ae Piŋkopno. Gak da yaŋaki Jekop dakon amɨn kabɨ da emaron teban toŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da Amɨn Kɨla Asat uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon yo dɨma. On mɨktɨm dakon tam nak dakon oman monjɨno gat emat wamaŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da nak Juda amɨn da kɨsiron arɨpmɨ dɨma nepbam. Nak da Amɨn Kɨla Asat uŋun kokup ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon yo.”
“Asisi dayɨsat, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak amɨn da nak da pi asat uŋun akdɨsak. Nak Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat, do nak da pi agɨm si yapmaŋek madepsi akdɨsak.
Nak dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo, ji nak dakon nawa gen pakyaŋsi nandani. Gen yokdɨsat uŋun do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopni.
Mani, Piŋkop da papiakon gen uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Yo kalɨp dabɨl da dɨma pɨndakgwit, ae mɨragon da dɨma nandawit, ae nandak nandagon dɨma noman taŋbi, uŋun Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn do paŋnoman agɨt.”
Uŋun kaloŋgɨn dagok dagogɨ mɨni tapmɨm morap kɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak. Uŋun asi.
Amɨn kɨnda yokwi pakpak amɨn da yabet aŋakwa uŋun yolek dɨma agɨsak, ae amɨn yokwi gat kɨsi dɨma akgaŋ, ae Piŋkop do manji gen yoŋ amɨn gat kaloŋɨ dɨma yɨkgaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Yesu nandaban jɨgɨ madepsi aŋakwan bɨsit tebai sigɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kɨŋkɨŋni yawi da yaŋ mɨktɨmon mawit.
Yaŋ yaŋbal nandaŋek Yesu da gen kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsawit.
Ae ais yopban maŋek bulmakauni dapba kɨmakgwit.
Aŋakwa amɨn da yo niaŋensi kɨnda da altagɨt, uŋun kok do apgwit. Abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn uŋun koŋni kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit kawit. Kaŋba amɨn uŋun Yesu da buron burɨ kɨlɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Jonakon tɨlak aban Niniwe kokup pap amɨn da asi Piŋkopmon da abɨk da asak yaŋ kawit. Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo Amɨn Dakon Monjikon noman taŋ ɨba apmiap amɨn da kaŋek asi Piŋkop da yabekban abɨk yaŋ kokdaŋ.
“Asi, not kabɨ ji gat ae kɨla amɨn kabɨsi gat dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek Yesu aŋakgwit.
On mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep Saion gat emat aŋek abɨŋ yɨp do awit bɨsapmon muwugek Saion da kapmatjok apgwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Bɨsit yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Piŋkop Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin uŋun da yaŋ aneŋ do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madepmon pi agak bɨsapni mudaŋakwan tobɨl kokupnikon kɨgɨt.
Nido, amɨn yokwi da uwal aŋ namɨŋek amɨnon nak do top gen yoyaŋ.
Dat gat nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak.”
Nin mɨnam da yaŋ amɨn kɨnda da pat yɨpguron yokwalgɨmaŋ da pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ. Pat uŋun tuwɨl kɨgɨt, do nin pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ.
Nin but kaloŋ ekwamaŋ kaŋ, uŋun jap yet kwaokgamaŋ yombem. Do uŋun but kaloŋ aŋpagon jap da pigaga kwoŋ uŋun da tɨlak aŋpak tagɨsi da egɨp egɨpninon noman tokdaŋ.
Pilip uŋun kɨŋ Nataniel kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Moses da gen teban papiakon amɨn kɨnda do gen mandagɨt, ae kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kaŋ kwamaŋ. Uŋun Yesu, Nasaret kokupmon amɨn, Josep dakon monji.”
Juda amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni tɨp tɨmɨgek aŋakba kɨmotjak do awit.
Yaŋ aŋek nap naŋ baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Mani gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa aeni kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Not kabɨ, ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Not kɨnda ji da binapmon nandak nandak yokwi dɨ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadatni yɨpmaŋ degek Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ manji dɨ ɨban.
Mani Piŋkop da ji yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨk iyɨ dakon oman amɨn depgut da ekwaŋ. Do iyɨ paŋpulugaŋban telagɨsi egek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdaŋ.
Mani tɨlɨmni toŋ uŋun toktogɨsi aŋkɨsino. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ tɨlɨmni tugok tugogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Uŋun bamɨ, uŋun asi.
Abɨsok abɨŋ Saion kokup pap do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋpulugoki. Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨbi dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tak. Abɨsok bupmɨ bɨsap.
Uwal da gen yaŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugaŋek yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun yolek egɨp egɨp nabi.
Paŋmuwukbi kɨnda dakon tapmɨm mosok bɨsapmon nak dakon tapmɨm kɨsi mosok. Ae Yesu yolyol amɨn kɨnda amɨn kɨnda da yokwi asak do iyɨŋban yokwikon mosok bɨsapmon nak uŋun do japmɨsi nandɨsat.
Mani gen morap gat ae aŋpak morap gat kokwin tagɨsi ani. Aŋek yo tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Do yaŋ gɨn ji yaŋ nandani, “Nin kɨmakbi yombem da yokwi da kɨsiron dɨma ekwamaŋ. Nin Yesu Kristokon gadagɨmaŋ, do Piŋkop man madep ɨm do ekwamaŋ.”
Ji kɨŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak ɨmalnaŋ wabi bulmakau ɨdapmon potdɨsak do wɨsɨŋ koni. Uŋun kaŋek bamɨ dayɨsat yaŋ nandani.”
“On uŋun oman monjɨno, nak da naga manjɨgɨm. Nak uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat. Nak da Wupno yɨpmaŋ ɨbo amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun gen kokwin kɨlegɨsi dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
Yawe, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo paŋpulugaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi bɨsapmon, nakyo kɨsi abɨdoki.
Butjikon da nandaba yokwi tok, ae butjapmon da gen pap yogok, ae butjap, ae but sɨgok, ae yaŋba yokwi tok, ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun wagɨlsi yopmaŋ mudoni.
Mani Yawe, gak dakon tapmɨmgo uŋun pɨdaŋbisi. Tap pakbi madepsi tamalɨkgaŋ uŋun dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak, ae ɨleŋɨkon tɨdoŋ uŋun dakon tapmɨm yo kɨsi yapmaŋdak.
Uŋun pɨlɨn kaga ae gɨldat kalba amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon ae kabapmon egek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gɨptɨmɨ tɨpbaŋ mandagɨt.
Nak kaŋapbo Kwen Kokup wɨtdal kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan os kwakwagɨ kɨnda akban kagɨm. Uŋun oskon amɨn kɨnda yɨkgɨt, mani uŋun yaŋ: Pini Do Butdasi Nandaŋek Aŋegɨsak Amɨn, ae Aŋpak Bamɨsi Asak Amɨn. Gen kokwin pi asak, ae emat asak, uŋun aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi naŋ yolek asak.
Mukwa sogok dakon mibɨltok amɨn kalɨpmɨ uŋun gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ mukwa soŋ soŋ awit. Mibɨltok iyɨ dakon yokwini mudoni dakon mukwa sowit, aŋek don mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon yokwini mudoni dakon mukwa sowit. Mani Yesu pi yaŋ dɨma asak. Uŋun bɨsap kaloŋgɨn iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni wagɨl parekgɨt.
Nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gapmanon ae kɨla amɨn madepmon paŋkɨkdaŋ. Paŋkwa kɨla amɨn madepmon ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni.
Juda uŋun Peres gat Sera gat dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Tamar.) Peres uŋun Esron dakon datni. Esron uŋun Ram dakon datni.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, ji bret dabo naŋek butji tugawit uŋun do aŋek nak wɨsɨŋ aŋaŋ obeŋ. Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dolɨko pɨndagek uŋun tɨlak dakon mibɨlɨ nandawit, uŋun do aŋek dɨma obeŋ.
Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egek man madepni taŋ ɨmɨsak. Tapmɨmni madep gat ae yo morapni kɨldani tagɨsi telagɨ yutnikon taŋ ɨmaŋ.
Not kabɨ, butningwan da nin gwaljɨgɨ mɨni yaŋsi nandamaŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon pasol pasolɨ mɨni atneŋ.
Maŋakwa dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋ pɨndakban dam teban yut dakon yoma kɨsi pɨsawit. Yaŋ pɨndak amɨn kɨsi abɨgɨ mudaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nak kɨla tagɨ dɨma at yaŋon da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨk iyɨ naŋ sugok do agɨt.
Piŋkop da yaŋ tagɨ aneŋ do nandɨsak kaŋ, tagɨ aneŋ.
Ae nandaŋapbo altakon da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, gak da amɨn gen pikon aŋpakni kokwin aŋ yomɨsal. Asisi, gen pikon yopyopgo uŋun wagɨl bamɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi gɨn asal.”
Kristo uŋun paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon busuŋɨ egakwan paŋmuwukbi uŋun gɨptɨmni. Iyɨ paŋmuwukbi dakon egɨp egɨp dakon mibɨlɨ. Uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit da binapmon da mibɨltaŋ pɨdagɨt do iyɨ yo morap dakon busuŋɨ arɨpmɨ tagɨ egɨpjak.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun silbat da yaŋ madepsi tagaŋek bamɨ tokdaŋ. Sida kɨndap Lebanon mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun da tɨlak tagokdaŋ.
“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Pi dɨma akeŋ.’ Mani don nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek kɨŋ pi agɨt.
Nak paŋdet kabɨgokon aŋkɨko aŋmɨlɨp ak do aŋtɨdok ayɨŋ.”
Yaŋ aŋek kap kalugɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yawit, “Gak da papia gɨroŋɨkbi abɨdaŋek kendol pakbi baŋ paŋteban abi uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ pakdekgi. Nido gɨkba kɨmagek yawigo naŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop do ɨm do aŋek yumaŋ nagɨl. Asi, amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ekwaŋ, ae geni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae gɨptɨmni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ kɨsi yumaŋ nagɨl.
Ji abɨŋek Piŋkop da yo agɨt uŋun pɨndatni. Yo masɨ masɨmɨ amɨn da binapmon agɨt uŋun do pɨndatni.
Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da agɨt, aŋakwan nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’ ”
Yo morap egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ jap do aŋ bɨsapmon gagon sɨŋtaŋba wɨkwan jap upmokdol.
Gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Kwen Kokup aŋelo morapmɨsi da pɨŋ notnikon muwugek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit:
Amɨn Tagɨ iyɨ Kwen Kokup da pɨŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen teban kɨnda yosak. Aŋakwan aŋelo mibɨltogɨ da gen yaŋakwan Piŋkop dakon kweŋ yosak. Aŋakwan Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨmakgwit amɨn da kalɨp pɨdokdaŋ.
Jap gat ae yo morap gat arɨpnikon yomaŋaki tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Ji nin do bɨsit ani. Piŋkop da dabɨlon butningwan gwaljɨgɨ mɨni yaŋsi nandamaŋ, ae yo morapmon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi baŋgɨn ak do nandamaŋ.
Mani namɨn amɨn dosi pasolni uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat. Ji Piŋkop do pasolni. Piŋkop da gɨptɨm dapban kɨmagakwa Tɨpdomon maban pɨgɨni uŋun dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak. Asisi dayɨsat, ji Piŋkop dosi pasolni.
Mani nak yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda notni do butjap nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda notni do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ madepmon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni!’ yaŋ iyɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom dakon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda sipsip dam dakon wigat naŋ dɨma pɨgek kosit ŋwakŋwarɨkon da dam ɨrak pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋuden amɨn uŋun kabo noknok ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn.
Ji kalɨp nak da manon da yo kɨnda abɨdok do bɨsit kɨnda dɨma awit. Ji bɨsit ani. Yaŋ aŋek yo tɨmɨgakwa kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da butjikon tugosak.”
Paŋdet dɨwarɨ da Tomas yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin Amɨn Tagɨnin kamaŋ!” Yaŋ iyɨŋba Tomas da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨsirɨkon birɨŋ tamo dɨma pɨndagek wɨtjɨkeŋ, ae gekgegɨkon wuda gwaljɨk dɨma wɨtjɨkeŋ kaŋ, ji da gen nayaŋ uŋun do nandabo bamɨ dɨma asak.”
Yaŋban Saimon Pita da boron wɨgek tap kɨlap yɨk ɨlɨkban ɨleŋɨkon wɨgɨgɨt. Yɨgon tap kɨlap madep madep 153 yaŋ da pɨgɨ tugawit, mani yɨk uŋun dɨma dagagɨt.
Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan emaron teban toneŋ. Iyɨ uwalnin pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, amɨn kɨsi da dandaba ji nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno akdaŋ.”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋsi nandani.
“Ason Kwen Kokup Piŋkop aŋkɨsino. Mɨktɨmon amɨn galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun kabɨkon but yawot tosak.”
Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat kɨnda kaŋek uŋun do galak taŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn butnikon da yumabi kɨlɨ ak.
Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Iyɨŋban koŋni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do “Amɨn Kabɨ Madep” yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ nandaŋ egek Yawe yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “O Yawe, pulugaŋ nepbi!”
Mani Pinias da pɨdaŋ agek binap amɨni egɨ yomɨŋakwan sot madep uŋun pasɨlgɨt.
Ae uŋudeŋ gɨn Moses da telagɨ ɨmal yut gat ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon yo morap toŋ uŋudon yawi pawɨlakwan mawit.
Dɨkdɨk gat ae gwawiya gat tɨmɨgek nak aŋ sopmaŋgaŋ amɨnon emat abi. “Nak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨngo!” yaŋ nayɨki.
Mani amɨn dakon yokwini dɨma yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Datji da yokwisi dɨma yopmaŋ damjak.”
Ninyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn, gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋek egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon on mɨktɨm dakon gen teban ae aŋpakni uŋun dakon oman monjɨ egɨpgumaŋ.
Aban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak emat agak sɨbago yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl. Emat agak sɨba pawɨlgaŋ amɨn uŋun emat agak sɨba da mandaŋ yoba kɨmokgoŋ.
Ae Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmni mɨni amɨn nin paŋpulugosok. Nin yo nido bɨsit aneŋ uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ, ae gen kaga da ni gen naŋ yoneŋ uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ. Mani Telagɨ Wup da iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek nin paŋpulugok do iyɨ bɨsit asak.
Yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwal Jems da yaŋ yagɨt, “Not kabɨ mɨrak pani.
Ae Piŋkop da paŋmuwukbikon pi ani do amɨn manjɨgɨt. Mibɨltok yabekbi, ae uŋun da buŋon kombɨ amɨn, ae uŋun da buŋon yoyɨŋdet, ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak amɨn, ae sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp ak amɨn, ae amɨn paŋpulugok amɨn, ae pi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kɨla agak amɨn, ae gen amɨn da dɨma nandagɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yogok amɨn kɨsi manjɨgɨt.
Mani sot awit bɨsapmon bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek bupmɨ dakon ɨmal wamgum. Nak jap kelek egek gak da paŋpulugoki do bɨsit agɨm.
Yawe, namɨn da gak da telagɨ yutgwan tagɨ wɨgɨsak? Telagɨ kabapgokon namɨn da tagɨ egɨpjak?
Yesu da amɨn kɨnda koŋ kɨnda da aŋkadɨm aban gen dɨma yagɨt, uŋun koŋni yol ɨmgut. Yol ɨban amɨn kadɨm uŋun gen yaŋakwan amɨn da kaŋba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Nido nin nandamaŋ, nandaŋ gadat kosiron dagɨn amɨn kɨlegɨ amaŋ. Gen teban yolyol kosiron da dɨma.
Nak pi tebaisi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨm. Kalbi morapmɨ pi aŋek dɨpmɨn dɨma pakgɨm. Nak jap pakbiyo do madepsi aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ japmɨ mɨni egɨpgum. Ae bɨsap morapmɨ mɨrɨmɨsi nandaŋek mɨrɨm ɨmalno mɨni da egɨpgum.
Yawe da nin sigɨn nandaŋ nimɨŋek gɨsamɨtjak. Uŋun da Israel mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat ae Aron dakon amɨn kabɨ kɨsi gɨsamɨtjak.
‘Manji gen yogok amɨn ji yo abeŋ uŋun kaŋek but morap aŋek wagɨl tasɨk toni. Ji da bɨsapmon yo ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda akdɨsat. Amɨn kɨnda da yo uŋun akdɨsat uŋun do dayɨsak kaŋ, ji arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadakdaŋ.’ ”
Gɨldat morapmɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Juda amɨn da muwugek Sol aŋat do gen yawit.
Yaŋ aŋek amɨn bamot tɨmɨk yut burɨ monɨŋɨ yɨkgɨmal uŋun yɨpmaŋek yut burɨ madep do pabɨgɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn bamot, niaŋ aŋapbo Amɨn Tagɨ da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosak?”
Uwalni da emat agak sɨbabaŋ dapba kɨmagakwa joŋ pɨŋan da gɨptɨmni nokdaŋ.
Nandaki. Don bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon uwalgo da gak aŋgwasɨŋek mɨktɨm paŋabɨŋ dam madepgokon yopba tugaŋ wɨgɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa terɨ terɨ da abɨŋ paŋdagat akdaŋ.
Pita gat Jon gat nagalgwan pɨgɨk do aŋakwal moneŋ ɨmjil do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋek uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Uŋun kabɨkon altaŋ yomɨŋek don mibɨ do nagon altaŋ namgut. Nak monjɨ kɨnda altok altok bɨsapmonsi dɨma altaŋbi yombem.
Do bɨsit asat bɨsapmon, yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni ji do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da iyɨ pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ji tekni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma nandawit, bo tomni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma kawit.
Nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot. Do nak do bupmɨ nandaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Israel dakon Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn, gak Josep dakon amɨn kabɨ sipsip baŋ yaŋ kosit yolɨsal. Bɨsitnin nandaŋ nibi. Aŋelo madep serabim bamot da binapmon kɨla amɨn madep yɨgek tɨlɨmgo mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo do yolɨŋbɨ pɨndatni.
Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon yoma wɨtdal gabeŋ. Gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ aŋteban abi, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ aŋteban asak. Ae gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ wɨtdalbi, Kwen Kokup-mon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ wɨtdaljak.”
Kristo kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt uŋun dakon geni yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ, do jikon amɨn dɨwarɨ da mibɨlɨ nido “Amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdokdaŋ” yaŋ yoŋ?
Aŋakwa amɨn bamot uŋun nandaŋakwal amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokupgwan da tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ɨdon wɨnjil.” Yaŋakwan uwalni pɨndagakwa amɨn bamot gɨkwem kagagwan wɨgek Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨmal.
Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok, “Wup uŋun Piŋkop da nin da butgwan yɨpgut uŋun yo morap yopmaŋ mudaŋek iyɨ dogɨn galaktaŋ kɨmotneŋ do nandɨsak.” Gen uŋun gen ɨsalɨ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Iyɨŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨŋat on yum koni. Nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
Nak da Atemas bo Tikikus kɨnda gak do yabekgo opjak bɨsapmon gak nak do Nikopolis kokupmon op do kosit wɨsɨk dakon pi madepsi abi. Nido nak ais bɨsapmon Nikopolis egɨp do nandɨsat.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen kɨnda yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨtjak. Uŋun dɨmasisi, uŋun dɨwarɨni mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Notgo do galagɨ niaŋ nandɨsal uŋun si yapmaŋek Piŋkop do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ ɨmni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ uŋun do nandaŋek ae oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi. Uŋun gen bamot da mukwa sogok mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yapmaŋ mudomal.”
Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan kɨla amɨn kɨsi da kunam tagek Pol bedaŋ mandaŋ nawit.
Juda amɨn ae Grik amɨn morap Epesas egɨpgwit uŋun yo altagɨt dakon geni nandaŋek madepsi pasalgwit. Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon man do nandaba wukwisi agɨt.
Mani gen yoyɨgɨt dakon mibɨlɨ nandabal dɨma pɨsagɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun nido kwen wɨgɨk ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ? Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun nido ɨsal dogɨn yokwi ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ?
Yaŋ niyɨŋba notnin dɨ da tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ yo mɨŋat da niyeŋ yaŋ gɨn taŋba pɨndaŋ. Mani Yesu iyɨ dɨma kaŋ.”
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon bret ae wain kapni aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da dɨma nosak kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨptɨm ae yawi yokwi aŋɨmɨsak dakon gulusuŋni taŋ ɨmɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak. Datno da uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak. Aŋakwan nit op do uŋun amɨn gat egɨpneŋ.
Nak gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ uŋun dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon gen kokwin ak do pɨgɨm. Yaŋdo, dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun sɨŋtoni, ae dabɨlɨ sɨŋtoŋ amɨn uŋun dabɨlɨ mɨni ani.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun mani Josep. Yabekbi kabɨ da Banabas yaŋ iyɨwit. Banabas dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: “But paŋteban ak amɨn.” Uŋun Liwai amɨn kɨnda, kokupni uŋun Saiprus.
Piŋkop yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋek emat agak sɨba geni tepmɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria kɨnda gat tɨp kɨnam da kapmatjok yɨgek yo agɨt uŋun nomansi kagɨmal.
Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.
Piŋkop iyɨ da telagɨ kokupmon egek mɨŋat monjɨyo datni kɨmakgwit uŋun kɨlani asak, ae sakwabatyo kɨsi kɨlani asak.
Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak japno toŋ, uŋun jap dakon mibɨlɨ ji dɨma nandaŋ.”
Amɨn da goman aŋ ɨba dɨ gat saŋbeŋek ɨmni do dɨma yosok. Ae amɨn da topni paŋteban aŋek si yumaŋ naŋakwa amɨn kɨlegɨ gen pikon yop do aba geni dɨma nandaŋ yomɨsak. Uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ morap yolgaŋ amɨn uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ.
Yesu gen on Pita kosit niaŋon da kɨmagek Piŋkop man madep ɨmjak uŋun do yagɨt. Yaŋ yaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Nak nolgi.”
Aŋek uwal joŋ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt uŋun Sunduk, ae jap pakpak bɨsap uŋun mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep. Ae jap bamɨ pakpak pi monjɨ uŋun Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨni.
Butjɨk morapno uŋun si pap tosok, do wɨrɨrɨk namɨŋaki yaworɨ egɨpbeŋ. Aŋpulugaŋaki jɨgɨ da dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bret tɨmɨ 5 bali baŋ wasaŋbi naŋ dɨwarɨkgwit uŋun yɨk madep 12 kabɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
Mani dɨma. Kɨsi morap kosit kɨlegɨ kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Kɨsi morap arɨpgɨn, uŋun amɨn wagɨl yokwisi. Kɨnda da aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨmasi asak.
Amɨn Dakon Monji niaŋon da kɨmotdɨsak do yaŋbi uŋun da tɨlak kɨmotdɨsak. Mani uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa!”
Amɨn kɨlegɨ ji butji tagɨsi taŋakwan Yawesi aŋkɨsini. Butji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni amɨn, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdoni.
Aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi baŋ amaŋ, ae nandak nandak tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Jɨgɨ noman taŋ niba but yaworon da ekwamaŋ, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomamaŋ. Telagɨ Wupmon tapmɨm uŋudon tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Amɨn do bamɨsi but dasi galaktaŋ yomamaŋ.
Nak da yo ani do dolɨsat, uŋun kaŋek uŋun naŋ gɨn ani.
Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.” Yaŋ yaŋek nagalon da wigat mibɨlon pɨgɨgɨt.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham dakon yawi dɨwatni da Israel mɨktɨm don abɨdoni do yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut. Kɨlɨ mɨktɨm abɨdoni dakon bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan Israel amɨn Isip mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit uŋun madepsi ɨreŋ tawit.
Mani gɨptɨm dakon galaktok kɨlani arɨpmɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, mɨŋat eyo agagɨsi. Mɨŋat eyo dɨma aŋek yumabi dɨ abam.
Gen teban uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp yom do noman tagɨt. Mani uŋun da egɨp egɨp dɨma namgut, kɨmot namgut.
Nin Mukwa Sogok dakon Mibɨltok Amɨnin egɨsak. Uŋun wukwisi ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap kɨlani asak.
Piŋkop, gak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt Piŋkopnin. Man madepgo do nandaŋek nin paŋpulugaŋek dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨkgi.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ yosak, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ nandaŋ gadat aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpak tagɨ aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ yokdɨsat, “Gak nandaŋ gadat aŋek aŋpak tagɨyo kɨsi dɨma abi kaŋ, nak niaŋon da gak dakon nandaŋ gadat kokeŋ? Mani, nak dakon aŋpak tagɨ da nandaŋ gadatno golɨkdɨsak.”
Not kabɨ, ji Juda amɨn dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek nak yombemsi dagoni do tebai dayɨsat. Nak naga gen teban yɨpmaŋek ji yombemsi agɨm. Yaŋ aŋapbo ji da gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋ namgwit.
Pakbi tɨbɨt madep daman 100 lita da tɨlak tɨp baŋ wasaŋbi 6 kabɨ yaŋ tawit. Juda amɨn da aŋpakni yolek Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok do uŋun pakbi tɨbɨt baŋ koleŋ soŋ soŋ ani do tawit.
Iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Elisabet monjɨ burɨgwan yɨkgɨt uŋun wɨgɨ mok agɨt. Aŋakwan Elisabet Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon pɨgɨ tugaŋban
Kɨla amɨn madep Tiopilas, amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop da yo morap nin da binapmon agɨt uŋun dakon geni papiakon mandak do awit. Yo morap wasaŋek altaŋakwa dabɨl da si pɨndagek yaŋ teŋteŋok awit amɨn dakon gen yolek mandawit. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen do pi awit. Ae nak uŋun yo morap si wasaŋek noman taŋ aŋaŋ opgwit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi nandak do pini madepsi agɨm. Do gen morap on papiakon kɨlegɨsi mandaŋ yɨpbo gagon opjak kaŋ nandabo tagɨsi asak.
“Don Piŋkop da Sol yaŋ dagaŋ ɨban ɨsal egakwan Dewit da kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak do manjɨgɨt. Piŋkop da yaŋ aŋek Dewit do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak Dewit Jesi dakon monji uŋun kaŋek butno tagɨsi asak. Uŋun da geno tagɨsi guramɨtjak yaŋ kosot.’
Gɨldat kɨnda do amɨn kabɨ madep Yapyap Bɨlak kok do apgwit uŋun da Yesu Jerusalem kokup papmon abɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
Aŋek yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yom do nak uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek kɨnda abeŋ.”
